instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
It is reported in the sound narrations from the final messenger of God about Paradise that "its soil is musk" and "its soil is saffron." Those two marvelous ingredients are presented in this floriental gourmand composition.
Top notes: Azerbaijan rose from 1972, jasmine grandiflorum, ylang, and vintage deer musk pods (grains and skins)
Heart notes: tuberose, raani flower, Siberian deer musk, cocoa, and saffron
Base notes: aged Cambodian oud, Indian and Indonesian sandalwood
output: Paradise Soil by Areej Le Dor is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Paradise Soil was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Top notes are Natural Musk, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang and Rose; middle notes are Tuberose, Natural Musk, Cacao and Saffron; base notes are Mysore Sandalwood and Cambodian Oud.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
About The Lead Character
No wonder A Wondrous Flight souls always lift your spirits; after all, they get the energy from the sun. It is the sun that can turn a gloomy day into a joyous one; it is the life force that energizes and fills you with hope. But what good is the sun if it werent for the moon that shies away during the day and reflects the suns light to Earth at night, showing her love for him?
This is a harmonious dance of the sun and the moon, led by eternal infatuation.
Let A Wondrous Flight unleash your charismatic bright side, and join this dance that will sweep you off your feet.
Olfactory Notes
The citrusy notes of A Wondrous Flight are like a partner who inspires and energizes you to live to the fullest. Complemented by earthy notes such as patchouli, leather, amber and musk, the bold and spicy notes of pink pepper, jasmine, iris, and ginger make this perfume the one for the naturally charismatic souls.
The poem of the perfume:
Infatuations dance,
An enchanting trance.
You are my sun,
Ever shining, ever light.
Enchanted by you,
Our souls take flight.
output: A Wondrous Flight by Mes Bisous is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Wondrous Flight was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is zge Erdomu Altnel. Top notes are Grapefruit, Bergamot, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Ginger, Pink Pepper, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Musk, Moss, Patchouli, Vetiver, Amber and Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: A bottle of boldness to cast off the shackles of shyness. Audacious orange blossom surprises vanilla and incense; how fancy! Spritz sparingly (or not  we dare you).
output: Eau de Audacity by Penhaligon's is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eau de Audacity was launched in 2023. Top notes are elemi, Black Pepper and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Frankincense, Saffron and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Leather and Ambergris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
With Pure Perfumes, Louis Vuitton imagines a way of personalizing one's fragrance signature with a gesture of absolute refinement. Inspired by the tradition of layering several fragrances, these intense compositions can be used as a finishing touch to your perfume ritual. Woven from exceptional essences and concentrated to the extreme, they celebrate the raw beauty of legendary ingredients in perfumery.

A traveling material by its very nature, ambergris has fascinated mankind since the dawn of time. Jacques Cavallier Belletrud pays tribute to the absolute sensuality of its scent by marrying an infusion of natural ambergris with the woody, musky, velvety vibrancy of Ambroxan. A scintillating burst of freshness gradually reveals a complex scent shimmering with animalic, woody and iodized facets. Endowed with an unparalleled power of attraction, Pur Ambre captures the utmost mystery of ambergris, captivatingly exuding seduction in successive waves.
output: Pur Ambre by Louis Vuitton is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pur Ambre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Imperial Malt invites you to indulge in its deeply gratifying blend of gourmand and boozy notes, supported by smoky, aromatic woods. Close your eyes, surrender to its sillage, and imagine enjoying a fine whiskey, prunes steeped in liquor, and bitter dark chocolate, while sitting in a cozy leather armchair near a crackling fireplace.
A warm, rich, sensuous fragrance that conjures up images and sensations of ideal comfort and pleasure.
Made in Greece with plant based alcohol.
IMPERIAL MALT is a collaboration with NOKTA COSMETICS , exclusively available in their physical stores in Istanbul, Turkey and online through the Manos Gerakinis e-shop only.
output: Imperial Malt by Manos Gerakinis is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imperial Malt was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Ioanna Tanionou. Top notes are Brown sugar, Dark Chocolate and Coconut Water; middle notes are Plum, Malt, Vanilla and Whiskey; base notes are Patchouli, Leather, Woodsy Notes and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Get ready to shine with the panache of Odyssey Spectra. This soothing scent wraps you in a unique floral amber blend, creating a warm and inviting aura. Rich and multifaceted, it combines delicate floral notes with a cozy heart that makes you feel instantly relaxed. The finish is smooth and sophisticated, leaving a lasting impression that lingers all day.
Notes Detail:
Top Note: Apple, Bergamot & Cinnamon
Heart Note: Orange Blossom, Lily of the Valley, Cinnamon and Lavender
Base Note: Vanilla, Tonka bean, Patchouli, Tobacco and Amber
output: Odyssey Spectra by Armaf is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Odyssey Spectra was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cinnamon, Apple and Bergamot; middle notes are Cinnamon, Lavender, Orange Blossom and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Tobacco, Patchouli and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Turath belongs to the Oriental Orientaly fragrance family, offering a captivating olfactory experience that combines rich and luxurious notes.
The fragrance opens with a burst of sophistication, as the spicy warmth of black pepper intertwines with the luscious sweetness of red fruit. Saffron adds a touch of exoticism, creating an initial impression that is both inviting and intriguing. The heart notes reveal a rich and indulgent blend. Decadent chocolate weaves its way through the composition, intertwining with the resinous and spiritual aura of incense. The velvety softness of rose petals adds a floral elegance, balancing the intensity with a delicate touch. The fragrance concludes with Orientalgris, with its deep and golden warmth, forming the foundation of the fragrance, leaving an indelible impression of luxury. Moss adds an earthy complexity, while musk contributes a sensual and lingering trail, enveloping you in an aura of timeless sophistication.
Turath, with its Oriental Orientaly character, is a timeless and evocative fragrance that captures the essence of tradition and luxury. It is a symphony of notes that come together to create a sensorial experience that is both opulent and inviting.
output: Turath by MAISON ASRAR is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Turath was launched in 2023. Top notes are Saffron, Black Pepper and Red Fruits; middle notes are Chocolate, Rose and Incense; base notes are Ambergris, Musk and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Gucci Guilty Black Pour Homme has been rebranded as Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme. Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme by Gucci, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for men and belongs to the fougere, citrus, and woody families.
output: Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme by Gucci is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Gucci Guilty Essence Pour Homme was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender and Coriander; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Neroli; base notes are Patchouli and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Today I remembered travelling
my favorite place to visit  the past. The sweet allure of it.
The destination of predestination. Going nowhere, fast.
I recall the image of the Tyrrhenian, while we were on tower tops. I looked at you like a kid seeing the sea for the first time.
Or me seeing it the last.
If you look back at that beauty, youve most likely already lost it. Or is it me?
Douce melancholy breeze, of summers never lived, of places never been, of sunshine melting skin 
You cast such a shadow.
Take a seat. Have a treat. Hurry up.
We are late.
output: Annacamento by Toskovat' is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Annacamento was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Blood Orange, Verbena, Orange and prickly pear; middle notes are Pancake, Whipped Cream, Rum, Raisin, Frangipani and Broom; base notes are Mastic or Lentisque, Cypress, Oak, Cistus Incanus, Cedar, Crithmum and Poplar buds.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Paccino is a fragrance that features a blend of aromatic and woody notes. The top notes include rosemary, sage, and pine needle, which give it a fresh and invigorating opening. The heart of the fragrance is composed of geranium and neroli, adding a floral touch. The base notes of musk, cedar, and oakmoss provide a warm and earthy finish.
output: Paccino by Henry Jacques is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Paccino was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pine, Sage and Rosemary; middle notes are Geranium and Neroli; base notes are Oakmoss, Cedar and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover Symphony, a luxurious and evocative fragrance that transports you to a sun-kissed grove, where the warmth of saffron and the lush sweetness of ripe peaches and apples blend together in an unforgettable harmony. This scent is an olfactory celebration of contrasts, where vibrant fruitiness meets the deep, golden richness of exotic spices, creating an aura of sophistication and sensuality.
A delectable harmony of luscious fruits, saffron and sandalwood .A true testament to luxurious pleasure.
output: Symphony by House of Iyrah is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Symphony was launched in 2024. Top notes are Black Currant, Peach, Candied Fruits, Dried Fruits, Bergamot and Apple; middle notes are Saffron and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli, Vanilla and White Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Whispered in reverence, the name Tafaseel denotes meticulous craftsmanship and attention to detail. At its inception, incense blends with the zesty pink pepper and bergamot. The heart notes reveal the earthy allure of orris roots, oud, sandalwood and patchouli, while the base notes of amber, vanilla, cedarwood and vetiver lend a subtle sensuality to your enigmatic persona. Together, they narrate a scintillating story of opulence.

As you hold the bottle in your hand, you can feel the weight of its significance. An emblem of elegance, the regal shade of burgundy, and the silver accents on the packaging cast a spell of enchantment upon those who behold it.
output: Tafaseel by Nabeel is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tafaseel was launched in 2024. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Incense and Bergamot; middle notes are Patchouli, Sandalwood, Orris and Oud; base notes are Cedarwood, Vanilla, Vetiver and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Theres not only one black tea in the world. I wanted to bring out the various facets of this complex aroma to make my own accord using an extract of black tea as an infusion together with a mat tea absolute. What I love about black tea is its subtlety. The way the airiness plays against the earthiness and the bitter, fresh notes play against the floral aspect, all with a light touch, said perfumer, Geza Schoen.
output: Molecule 01 + Black Tea by Escentric Molecules is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Molecule 01 + Black Tea was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Geza Schoen.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Ajayeb Dubai captures the essence of tradition and modernity, evoking a sensation of unparalleled warmth and sophistication.
Notes
Top : Saffron, Pineapple
Heart : Coffee Arabica, Violet Leaves
Base : Sandalwood, Vanilla, Butterscotch
output: Ajayeb Dubai by Lattafa Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ajayeb Dubai was launched in 2023. Top notes are Saffron and Pineapple; middle notes are Coffee and Violet Leaves; base notes are Butterscotch, Sandalwood and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The woody notes of powerful vetiver, lifted by spicy ginger and warm sage. A streamlined formula composed only of essentials, like an ode to the elements, which triggers an instant addiction. In this new Eau de toilette Intense, vetiver root exudes its woody generosity.
output: LEau dIssey pour Homme Vetiver by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. LEau dIssey pour Homme Vetiver was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Guided by the sharpness of its namesake mathematical formula, rule of 72 combines the muted elegance of saffron and geranium with vigorous natural Thai oud and creamy guaiac wood. Leather notes, along with vetiver and pachouli, whisper confidence rather than scream it  for a scent as resolute as it is ambitious.
output: Rule of 72 by 27 87 is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rule of 72 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gal Montero. Top notes are Saffron, Cardamom, Geranium and Cypress; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Guaiac Wood, Cedar and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Leather, Vetiver and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"First, youll probably feel a slight acidity, but then sweetness will follow Werent those white candies pineapple-flavored? But wait! Theres a hint of tobacco, did grandpa carry them in his pocket along with his pipe? You close your eyes, trying to reassure yourself about their taste, and suddenly the time machine starts.

Time Machine is an exception in the entire Le Frag collection. This time, Im not taking you on a journey through my memories or childhood fascinations, but I invite you on your own journey through time.

Take a sniff and let the Time Machines gears run

Perhaps it will remind you of the workshop where Dad repaired the cabinet, the one Mom constantly nagged him about. Or an old wooden trunk with brass fittings, which hid everything your imagination suggested. A small-town pharmacy, where your pharmacist aunt hid secret potions in hundreds of wooden drawers. Or maybe your beloved grandfather, who was a craftsman and spent every spare moment in his workshop. So often, that he soaked up the scent of the tools, and the space soaked up his cologne, which you will forever associate with love and a sense of security."
Notes: lime, lavender, pineapple, cardamom, oud Vietnam, rum, immortelle, hamamelis, amber, tobacco, musk, ambrette seeds and gear train.
output: Time Machine by Le Frag is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Time Machine was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Renier R. Mendez.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Nitro White Dumont is a fragrance for men featuring a blend of intriguing notes. The composition opens with cypress, iris, and juniper berries, leading to a heart of patchouli and myrrh. The base is enriched with musk, amber, honey, vanilla, and leather.
output: Nitro White by Dumont is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Nitro White was launched in 2024. Top notes are Juniper Berries, Iris and Cypress; middle notes are Myrrh and Patchouli; base notes are Honey, Vanilla, Amber, Musk and Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum by Prada is a fragrance that blends classic perfumery art with modern technology, symbolizing the ability to push boundaries and redefine what is possible. The scent captures this essence with a powerful and sophisticated Orientaly Fougre fragrance that reflects the wearer's character uniquely.
The perfume starts with a top note of lemon essence, providing a refreshing scent. In the heart, the freshness combines with a saffron accord. The base note has an oak wood nuance, adding a smoky note to the fragrance. This scent experience is further enhanced by the molecule OrientalXtreme.
Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum by Prada is refillable, available in 50ml and 100ml bottles and a 150ml refill.
output: Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum by Prada is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Luna Rossa Ocean Le Parfum was launched in 2024. Top note is Lemon; middle note is Saffron; base notes are Amber Xtreme and Oak.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Carnal and solar. Forever love. Forever summer. Forever flowers. Fresh-soft corollas exhaling fleshy scents: gardenia melting skin and petals, radiant magnolia, exotic champaca conjure the mad intensity of a season of passion on the beach...
output: Un Bel Amour Dt by Parfum d'Empire is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Un Bel Amour Dt was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Marc-Antoine Corticchiato.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: ARC represents a confluence of Eastern and Western natural perfumery. Perfumers Antonio Lasheras and Rajesh Balkrishnan combine rare to obtain natural absolutes and create a fantastical mythical flowering plant that is fully contained in the bottled juice only as a unique fougere. Calming and spiritual, ARC takes its wearers to distant mountainous places where wild herbs and flowers caress the lofty pines.
output: ARC by Mallo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. ARC was launched in 2023. ARC was created by Antonio Lasheras and Rajesh Balkrishnan. Top notes are Pine Tree, Rosemary, Thyme and Basil; middle notes are Lavender and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Siam Benzoin, Styrax, Oakmoss and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Explore the captivating essence of Azzaro The Most Wanted EDT Intense, a fragrance that seamlessly blends invigorating freshness with irresistible sensuality. Crafted for the modern man who fearlessly charts his own course.
Embark on a journey of allure and allure with Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Toilette Intense. It begins with the invigorating burst of green Mediterranean bergamot, infusing a sense of refreshing vitality. Lavender from Provence follows, imparting a warm, sensual aura that captivates the senses. The composition culminates in a rich, woody moss liqueur accord, leaving an indelible impression that lingers.
The result is an unforgettable olfactory experience that envelops the wearer in confidence and charisma.
The bottle of Azzaro The Most Wanted Eau de Toilette Intense is a testament to style and self-assurance. Its iconic black barrel design, juxtaposed with the light hue of the fragrance within, reflects both elegance and contrast. The sleek, contemporary design mirrors the bold essence of the fragrance, making a visual statement of modern sophistication.
output: The Most Wanted Intense by Azzaro is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. The Most Wanted Intense was launched in 2024. The Most Wanted Intense was created by Nicolas Bonneville and Honorine Blanc. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Liquor and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A primal new member of the esteemed Library Collection  Opus XV - King Blue is a perfume of endless questions, of curious detours and unforeseen revelations.
An opening of vibrant mandarin leads unexpectedly to a bold, animalic and effortlessly sophisticated base of oud. Surrealism in Scent - Opus XV explores the primordial nature of contrastive ingredients that blend together to evoke a sense of mystery and intrigue.
output: Opus XV  King Blue by Amouage is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Opus XV  King Blue was launched in 2023. Opus XV  King Blue was created by Alexis Grugeon and Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Black Currant and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Frankincense and Amber; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Leather, Oak, Patchouli and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Here, in Cappadocia, at the heart of Trkiye, the earth retains the memory of an unblemished emotion, a shiver of saffron, sandalwood and myrrh surfaces on the skin. Impressive, ancestral formations rise up like exclamations to the sky. They are known as fairy chimneys, natural pillars of soft, friable rock shaped by volcanic eruption, the passage of time and the weathering of the elements. They watch over the mountains, craters, plateaus and gorges, over the underground and cave-dwelling cities.
The palette of Cappadocia is organic, carnal: white jasmine, ochre benzoin, Turkish rose, gold vanilla and tawny sandalwood. Come nightfall, a purple iris arrives and then the chimney tops secretly open, releasing the caressing perfume of flowers, resins and woods: a message to the stars. A multi-coloured hot-air balloon appears on the horizon; the passengers in its basket sail above the landscapes varied facets, swept away by its airy, scent-filled beauty. The fragrance Cappadocia makes this a dream come true.
output: Cappadocia by Memo Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cappadocia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gal Montero.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The experience: a passion fruit tasting in remote oud wood forests.
The surprising contrast: the richness of oud wood, contrasted by exotic and luminous passion fruit notes.
Fragrance family: exotic, woody and fruity (vegan).
Key raw materials: passion fruit accord, saffron, rose absolute from Turkey ORPUR, oud accord, benzoin from Laos ORPUR, cistus absolute from Spain ORPUR, leather accord, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, vanilla, akigalawood.
The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house.
output: Oud Maracuj by Maison Crivelli is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Maracuj was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernndez. Top notes are Passionfruit, Fruity Notes, Saffron and Turkish Rose; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Indonesian Patchouli Leaf and Benzoin; base notes are Leather, Akigalawood, Amber, Vanilla and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Acqua di Praga Bohemia is a sensual journey that defines the freedom and independence that characterize every bohemian.
Acqua di Praga is created from the finest fragrance ingredients using traditional techniques. The result is a masterpiece that celebrates the bohemian spirit and the art of perfumery. From the citrus notes of grapefruit and mandarin to the warm, woody scent of oud and sandalwood. Each ingredient tells its own story and contributes to the harmonious composition of the fragrance.
Acqua di Praga is a challenge
"With Acqua di Praga, we invite you to go beyond the ordinary and discover a fragrance that truly captures the essence of our city, its history, and its spirit. "
Acqua di Praga is a gender-free fragrance that is more than just a scent; it's a reflection of your individuality and your personal style. By wearing Acqua di Praga, you're making a statement about who you are and what you stand for. You're embracing the art of self-expression and showing the world your true self.
Whether you're exploring the streets of Prague or simply enjoying a night out with friends, Acqua di Praga is the perfect accessory for any occasion. It's a fragrance that exudes confidence, elegance, and sophistication, and it's sure to leave a lasting impression on everyone you meet.
output: Bohemia by Acqua di Praga is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bohemia was launched in 2023. Top notes are Grapefruit, Tangerine, Ginger and Cardamom; middle notes are Aquatic notes, Violet, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Leather, Sandalwood, Nutmeg and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Ralph Lauren Polo Earth Austral Sandalwood is a new fragrance for both women and men, launched in 2024. This aromatic, woody fragrance is crafted with 97% natural raw materials and features farm-to-fragrance ingredients sourced globally. The perfume is packaged responsibly with an FSC-certified wooden cap and label, and the bottle is refillable.
output: Polo Earth Austral Sandalwood by Ralph Lauren is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Polo Earth Austral Sandalwood was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Bergamot and Black Pepper; middle notes are Eucalyptus, Clary Sage and Lavender; base notes are Sandalwood, Musk and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Gambit is designed for the modern player, daring and inspiring, with virile energy that takes command and pursues victory from the out-set. A confident and unapologetically fiery scent with distinctive notes of spice tossed with hints of fruity sweetness and wrapped in a soothing warmth. Bursts of fresh geranium linger in a deep haze of lavender before settling into the glowing base notes of sandalwood and amber.
"Gambit delivers a modern masculine boldness, contrasting the soothing, soft floralcy of geranium and lavender against the distinctive spice of clove and cardamom with a hint of patchouli. The warm fruity spice notes melt into a back of sandalwood and Ambrostarradiating with layers of warmth." - Carlos Vials, Perfumer.
output: Gambit by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gambit was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Carlos Vials. Top notes are Cloves, Lavender and Petitgrain; middle notes are Cardamom, Geranium and Mimosa; base notes are Ambrostar, Patchouli and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Exuding a unique elegance, Bvlgari Man in Black Parfum takes the original Eau de Parfum to a new level of density, richness and refinement, embodying a contemporary masculinity through its ambery woody signature.

With addictive and vibrant spicy top notes that smoothly morph into the lavish florality of tuberose and iris, before yielding to the intensity of a dark wood accord, Bvlgari Man in Black Parfum is a contrasting and textured composition. Crafted by Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas, it is the richest and most concentrated fragrance in the Bulgari Man collection to date.

The all-black flacon delivers an intense interpretation of the Bulgari Man in Black aesthetic codes. The dramatic and audacious use of black personifies the higher concentration of the Parfum, differing from the more marked contrast between the black and rose gold of the Eau de Parfum.
TOP NOTES: Vibrant Spice Accord & Elemi Essence
HEART NOTES: Tuberose Absolute & Iris Essence
DRY DOWN NOTES: Dark Wood Accord & Benzoin of Siam Absolute
output: Bvlgari Man In Black Parfum by Bvlgari is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bvlgari Man In Black Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Spices and elemi; middle notes are Iris and Tuberose; base notes are dark woodsy notes and Siam Benzoin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Once upon a time... A middle summer garden afternoun. The calm of a sunny nap. And the childrens snack. Jany. Shes getting busy in the kitchen, between sugar and flour. What she loves to prepare, above all other delicacies, is tarte tatin. The butter melts on the glass. She drops grains of brown sugar into it, in the silence of a fine, icy rain. Its scent swirls around the room, echoes to the veranda, travels to the path. Baked apples and cinnamon sticks fade into the exhalations of puff pastry. Then come caramel, almonds and vanilla, powerful aromas that linger into the evening.
Antoines daughter, Jany carries the fragrance of his recipes, cakes, madeleines and cookies. An original childhood pastry, Jany delivers the aromatic memories of all our unforgettable delicacies. Heres to your emotions.
output: Jany by Sora Dora is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Jany was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Margaux Le Paih Gurin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Encapsulating Miami, Fl in Red
Topaz is a completely unisex, Citrus, Oriental fragrance.
Inspired by the idea of an afternoon on the beach transitioning to a night out on the town. Experience the vibrant energy of Miami with our captivating fragrance, "Topaz."
Guided by the city's lively spirit and the fiery hue of red, this scent is a celebration of life and passion. Let the zesty Lime and luscious Coconut transport you to sun-kissed shores, while the spicy Saffron adds an exotic touch.
Immerse yourself in the sultry allure of Rum, evoking Miami's glamorous nightlife, and feel the warmth of Tobacco, mirroring the city's rich history.
With Topaz, the essence of Miami comes alive, enveloping you in a captivating blend that ignites your senses and leaves a lasting impression.
output: Topaz by Prisma Parfums is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Topaz was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Isaac Hilton. Top notes are Lime, Saffron and Coconut; middle notes are Sugar Cane, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Osmanthus; base notes are Tobacco, Rum, Ambergris, Tonka and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The Calahorra perfume marks the beginning of the Liquid Architecture collection, inspired by an architectural project born from a competition to design a cafeteria in the historic surroundings of Elche.
Top Notes: Green Mandarin, Papyrus, Allspice
Heart Notes: Katafray, Masthin Thyme, Witch Hazel, Sugar Cane, Rosewood
Base Notes: Guggul, Java Patchouli, Copaiba Balsam, Hemlock, Estoraque, Ho Wood.
output: Calahorra by Woha Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Calahorra was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alejandro Pons. Top notes are Green Mandarin, Allspice and Papyrus; middle notes are Thyme, Sugar Cane and Palisander Rosewood; base notes are Patchouli, Copaiba balm, Ho Wood and Hemlock.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the famed Gladiators of Ancient Rome, tactical warriors who dominated and entertained in the
Coliseum, Gladiator Oud opens with a powerful and thrilling accord of salty, elemental ambergris. Cardamom
combines with the cool of Egyptian geranium for an impression of steel and strength. Hay absolute, Haitian vetiver
and cumin seed capture the sun warmed earth of the gladiatorial arena. Oud oil and cedarwood bring nobility and
elegance to the battle, with the gold and glory of victory elicited through accords of intense saffron and honey.
output: Gladiator Oud by Electimuss is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gladiator Oud was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Saffron and Cumin; middle notes are Hay, Immortelle, Honey and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Ambergris, Patchouli, Atlas Cedar and Haitian Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Acne Studios X Frdric Malle represents a fusion of fashion, perfumery, and art. This unique collaboration yields a fragrance that delivers a neoclassical olfactory experiencevibrant yet comforting, magnetic yet bold.
Created by Suzy Le Helley, the sophisticated blend seamlessly combines notes of peach, orange blossom, aldehyde, and vanilla. Epitomizing elegance and refinement, this fragrance captures the luxurious aesthetic of Acne Studios, promising an unforgettable sensory journey.
Available in 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Acne Studios by Frederic Malle is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Acne Studios was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Suzy Le Helley. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot and Mandarin; middle notes are Peach, Orange Blossom, Violet, Rose, Lily of the Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Frankincense, Iso E Super, Musk, Vanilla and Heliotrope.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Both charismatic and subtle, this fragrance unveils an exclusive accord where daring violet leaves gently merge with luxurious suede to create a remarkable effect.
output: Vibrant Leather & Violet Elixir by Zara is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vibrant Leather & Violet Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jrme Epinette.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Profumum Roma Acqua di Sale Acquerello 2024 is a new collector edition fragrance designed for both women and men. This aquatic scent evokes the imagery of sea waves crashing against the shore, leaving behind a myriad of shells on the sand under the August sun. It captures the essence of freedom and carefreeness on an isolated beach.
output: Acqua di Sale Acquerello 2024 by Profumum Roma is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Acqua di Sale Acquerello 2024 was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Majestic Amber by Pana Dora is a complex and rich fragrance that combines a variety of notes to create a unique scent experience. The perfume opens with a spicy and floral blend of pink pepper, nutmeg, orris root, violet, and saffron. The heart reveals a warm and woody mix of cashmere wood, tuberose, orange blossom, ambergris, fir resin, and amberwood. The base is a deep and lasting combination of papyrus, dry wood, vanilla, leather, benzoin, cedar, ambroxan, and oakmoss.
output: Majestic Amber by Pana Dora is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Majestic Amber was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Ibrahim Al Zoabi. Top notes are Orris Root, Saffron, Nutmeg, Pink Pepper and Violet; middle notes are Amberwood, Ambergris, Orange Blossom, Cashmere Wood, Fir Resin and Tuberose; base notes are Leather, Ambroxan, Dry Wood, Benzoin, Vanilla, Oakmoss, Papyrus and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A hymn for eternal youth, bold, exciting, and seductive, torn between innocence and guilt, when lust and love rule the day.
Top notes: davana oil, cedarwood, orris absolute
Heart notes: patchouli, gaiac wood, suede
Base notes: vanilla absolute, oud oil Laos, benzoin Siam
Available as a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Raw Gold Extrait de Parfum by Thomas de Monaco is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Raw Gold Extrait de Parfum was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Maurus Bachmann. Top notes are Orris Root, Davana and Cedar; middle notes are Suede, Patchouli and Guaiac Wood; base notes are Vanilla, Siam Benzoin and Saffron.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Following the mysterious facet of Phanton Parfum, a bolder face of PHANTOM comes alive as the story continues. With PHANTOM Intense, discover a fresher incarnation in an aromatic ambery accord of vivid lavender, a vanilla addiction and a frosted orange blossom twist.
When the daylight fades embrace the your dark side with PHANTOM Intense by Rabanne. More Intense, bolder, powered by your most daring side. Vivid lavender surrenders to a vanilla addiction and a frosted orange blossom twist to capture the enigmatic aura within you.
output: Phantom Intense by Rabanne is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Phantom Intense was launched in 2024. Phantom Intense was created by Dominique Ropion, Anne Flipo, Juliette Karagueuzoglou and Paul Guerlain. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Bergamot and Rhubarb; middle notes are Lavender, Cedar, Patchouli and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Tolu Balsam and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The elemental fragrance of Ann Demeulemeester centres around the cypher A, the designers initial and the first letter of the alphabet. A symbol founded in core and constancy, it is employed to signify the essence of an expression: a visual and emotional language distilled into a singular genderless parfum.

Crafted personally by Ann Demeulemeester through a lifelong instinctive study of notes and associations, the fragrance transmits the poetic purity and structural serenity of the designers enduring oeuvre. It is a unique and intriguing composition embodied by the primordial and mysterious obscurities of nature.

Created from instinct, it is a beguiling fragrance refined from ingredients in their rarest, purest form. This perfume was created from essential oils derived from the cold pressing of the finest quality of natural, raw materials.
output: A Parfum by Ann Demeulemeester is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. A Parfum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Cloves, Calabrian bergamot, Ceylon Cinnamon, Cumin and Sicilian Lemon; middle notes are Leather, May Rose, Birch Tar and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Sandalwood, Vetiver and Palisander Rosewood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Reasons by The House of Amouage is part of the Amouage Essences collection, crafted by Bertrand Duchaufour. This fragrance is an olfactory expression of the value of time, featuring a double-infusion process with sandalwood and artisanal oakwood barrels. The scent opens with a warm hazelnut note, transitioning into a complex blend of davana and smoky palo santo, creating a deep and layered experience. The fragrance is housed in a refillable bottle, representing a pinnacle of olfactory artisanship.
output: Reasons by Amouage is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Reasons was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Hazelnut, Pink Pepper, Cardamom and Cinnamon; middle notes are Pine, Davana, Cypriol, Cashmeran, White Amber and Patchouli; base notes are Palo Santo, Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Myrrh, Musk, Oakmoss, Labdanum, Benzoin and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Stupefacente (Astonishing) is the fusion between a fougre base and an accord of narcotic flowers with orange peel and cognac.
The basic idea is: to merge two worlds I love, fougre and narcotic, to give life to a new smell and make it unisex.
The name is an alternative to the more overused narcotic, and I liked its duality of meaning: You realize that it's narcotic, so you expect it to surprise you.
output: Stupefacente by Bruno Perrucci Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Stupefacente was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Bruno Perrucci. Top notes are Flowers, Anise, Orange and Cognac; middle notes are Lily of the Valley, Flowers, Lavender, Green Tea, Geranium and Rose; base notes are Gray Musk, Vetiver, Patchouli, Amber, Myrrh and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The olfactory identity of BORDERLINE NEROLI takes inspiration by the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
THE FIGHT BETWEEN TWO OPPOSITE WHITE FLOWERS: the clean kindness of NATURAL NEROLI against the violence of NATURAL TUBEROSE essential oils.
The first is supported by a COMFORTABLE SOAPY CLEAN SMELL of NATURAL BERGAMOT CALABRIA OIL, while the second is sharpened by a GREEN FRUITY note of FIG.

We have taken inspiration from an aspect of the Borderline Personality Disorder which is the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
output: Borderline Neroli by La Serra is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Borderline Neroli was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp. Top notes are Neroli, Calabrian bergamot and Fig; middle notes are Tuberose and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Russian Oud is a gourmand oud lover's dream. It is a perfume built around a chocolaty agarwood oil distilled in India according to an old traditional method.
Top notes: a touch of natural deer musk and ambergris
Heart notes: cacao and Indian oud
Base notes: resins and cedar
output: Russian Oud II by Areej Le Dor is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Russian Oud II was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Top notes are Natural Musk and Ambergris; middle notes are Cacao Pod and Indian Oud; base notes are Resins and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vieri, the nobleman who captivated Lionora's heart with grace and prowess, transports you to the breathtaking Mediterranean landscape where their love story flourished. A surge of crimson lemongrass, vivacious citron, and effervescent pink pepper initiates the perfume's fragrance. As the scent of the perfume evolves, floral notes of lush peony and camellia tea emerge against a backdrop of enticing musks, mystical incense, and rich Orientalwood, reflecting Vieri's subtle virility and avant-garde approach to love. Allow Vieri to enchant you with its captivating first impressions and enduring charm that withstands the test of time.
"A duality of contrasts. Bright, uplifting and warm, Vieri pairs our natural Lemongrass Madagascar with sparkling citron and pink pepper around a heart of Camellia Tea. To enhance the natural warming effect, we finished it with a smoky, Orientalwood and musk effect for allure and trail." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Vieri by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vieri was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Lemongrass, Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Tea, Red Fruits, Peony and Camellia; base notes are Musk, Amberwood and Incense.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "The fragrance shines with two exclusive innovations in modern perfumery: an incandescent black lacquer accord that captures a smoky, dimensional opulence, and a Makassar ebony wood note that evokes aspects of leather and birch. Beneath the glossy surface blooms the irrepressible mystery of a dark peony accord."
output: Black Lacquer by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Black Lacquer was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Guillaume Flavigny. Top notes are Ink, Vinyl, Black Pepper and Rum; middle notes are Ebony Wood, elemi, Apricot and Peony; base note is Olibanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Today I remembered what I was taught and how wrong it was.
I was told so many rules. What was wrong, what was right, what was natural, what was expected. Make a move.
I want the old love of my grandparents and the freedom of my children.
I dont want to see in black and white anymore.
We are all so vulnerable in the grand scheme of things but we keep craving and carving a plan
They say if you want to make fate laugh, you should tell her your plans.
output: F2 by Toskovat' is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. F2 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Aldehydes, Lily-of-the-Valley, Narcissus, Neroli, Pine, Turmeric, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Plum, Heliotrope, Galbanum, Palmarosa, Orris, Labdanum, Wisteria, Cinnamon, Mimosa, Rose and Opoponax; base notes are Synthetic Civet, Copaiba balm, Musk, Oakmoss, Amber, Patchouli, Vanilla, Benzoin and Myrrh.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Voluptuous Oud by Francesca Bianchi is an opulent and voluptuous interpretation of oud, offering a sweet and caramelized experience with slightly fruity and leathery aspects. This extrait de parfum captures the essence of abundance with its complex blend of woody, animalic, and gourmand notes. The fragrance is designed to evoke a sense of richness and intimacy, with a warm and comforting presence.
output: Voluptuous Oud by Francesca Bianchi is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Voluptuous Oud was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are Green Mandarin and Bergamot; middle notes are Plum and Heliotrope; base notes are Oud, Caramel, Leather, Tolu Balsam and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Artist Andrea Maack launches Jest in March 2024.
"JEST is that happy state that carries us into the moment where the soft, warm spring seems right around the corner. Along this exhilarating path of exploration, the sweetness of the plum and apple soon gives way to the feverish power of the Rhum and chocolate. An experience of all senses that the smooth vanilla and the wild musk enrich with their earthy envelope."
Created by perfumer Julien Rasquinet, this 'sweet boozy' fragrance also features cardamom, heliotrope, and ambroxan notes.
Available in a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Jest by Andrea Maack is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Jest was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Apple, Plum and Cardamom; middle notes are Rum, Chocolate and Heliotrope; base notes are Vanilla, Musk and Ambroxan.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Vanilla Stallion is a fragrance that captures the essence of refined masculinity, inspired by the distinguished Althar by Parfums de Marly. Launched in 2023, it was crafted by perfumers Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis. The scent opens with a fresh and spicy blend of bergamot, cardamom, orange blossom, and cinnamon. The heart features Bourbon Vanilla and elemi, leading to a smooth base of praline, musk, ambroxan, and guaiac wood.
output: Vanilla Stallion by Alexandria Fragrances is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Stallion was launched in 2023. Vanilla Stallion was created by Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis.
