instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Creed Original Vtiver 2024 is a modernized interpretation of the classic vetiver fragrance for women and men. This aromatic, spicy, and woody scent utilizes the leaves and roots of the vetiver plant, offering a refreshing green fragrance with earthy and leathery nuances. The fragrance features an intensely woody base accompanied by invigorating citrus notes, reminiscent of an everlasting summer.
output: Original Vetiver 2024 by Creed is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Original Vetiver 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Notes, Lemon and Ginger; middle notes are Cypress, Vetiver and Coriander; base notes are Guaiac Wood, Cedarwood and White Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Lorenzo Pazzaglia x House of Merlo: Incenso Notturno perfume is an olfactory sacred, the most sublime fragrance in the artist's achievements to date, filled with an electrifying aura of mystery. Anyone who got to know House of Merlo a little better quickly noticed our fascination with mysticism and everything mysterious. It will therefore come as no surprise that the result of this unique Polish-Italian cooperation is an incredibly enigmatic scent, thoroughly incense-like, completely enveloped in wisps of thick smoke.
From the House of Merlo diary: The dreamlike opening looms like a dreamy priest just after dusk, looking at the smoking elemi resin in which fragments of refreshing bergamot and lemon peel have congealed. The first aromas announcing the beginning of the ancient ritual quickly gain intensity when freshly ground pepper enters the censer, first a slightly more subtle, white variety, and then giving space to a much more wild and untamed black variety. The all-encompassing darkness encourages you to look towards the infinite universe, from the depths of which the ancient starlight illuminates the gray ribbons rising towards them, emerging from the glowing noble agarwood resin covered with damask rose petals, intricately combined with patchouli, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Just before dawn, when the night becomes darkest and everything around is pitch black, powerful, dark Frankish incense supports the ceremonial vigil. Arranged on cedar and sandalwood, wrapped in vanilla, sensual amber, and seductive musk, it recalls ancient times when man discovered fire and simultaneously experienced the extraordinary phenomenon of escaping smoke. Since the dawn of time, we have associated it with divinity, spirituality, and energy, and by observing it we believe that man is part of something bigger, not only the universe perceived through the senses. We are no longer surprised that in most parts of the world, the rite of incensation has become part of the most important ceremonies and rituals. The synergy of these completely spectacular essences brings scent-provoking metaphysical experiences, for all initiated hearts who have always "see more", but also for open minds who dare to break conventions and constantly look for answers hidden in the universe.
Top note
white pepper, elemi resin, lemon peel, bergamot
Heart note
black pepper, patchouli, oud (agarwood), cinnamon, nutmeg, damask rose
Base note
incense, cedar tree, sandal tree, vanilla, ambergris, musk

Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum is exlusive for House Of Merlo Perfumeria Niszova store, as 50ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum by Lorenzo Pazzaglia is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Incenso Notturno Extrait de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Lorenzo Pazzaglia. Top notes are White Pepper, Elemi resin, Lemon Peel and Bergamot; middle notes are Agarwood, Oud, Black Pepper, Patchouli, Nutmeg, Damask Rose and Cinnamon; base notes are Incense, Ambergris, Sandal, Musk, Vanilla and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Maison Martin Margiela is introducing a fresh addition to its Replica line, titled Under the Stars.
With its blend of oud and amber, Under The Stars captures the cozy ambiance of a campfire crackling beneath a mesmerizing tapestry of stars. This fragrance evokes a sense of warmth and wonder, made to transport you to a night under the open sky.
The year is 2022, and the location is Namibia. The description of the composition is "oud and leather."
Replica Under the Stars is available as a 30 ml and a 100 ml Eau de Toilette.
output: Under the Stars by Maison Martin Margiela is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Under the Stars was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Meabh McCurtin. Top note is Black Pepper; middle note is Leather; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"An amalgamation of the words British and Cologne, the classic cologne structure is re-imagined and magnified with complex chords and accords with intensive projection and longevity. All fragrances in this collection are categorised as Cologne Elixir defining an inventive and playful interpretation.

The logo is inspired by British heraldry and cypher. The two calligraphed t pay respect to heritage with the left t and creating the classics of tomorrow with the right t. 

The cube shaped bottle is in clear frosted glass, signifying Thameen Londons luxury order of heralding and defining a new era of olfactive zeitgeist. Blue letterings are used on the bottle making a nod to the brands signature blue. Its adorned with a solid gloss silver magnetic cap.

Embracing a sustainable practice of presenting responsible luxury, the hinged box has less components, more compact in size, and recyclable in one piece. Made with a removable inner frame, the box is created to be reused to store ones personal valuables, such as rings, earrings, necklaces or cufflinks. A sleeve with abstract photography will cover the box to identify the fragrance."
output: Chords by Thameen is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Chords was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Bergamot, Orange Blossom and Neroli; middle notes are Honey, Tobacco and Ylang Ylang; base notes are Leather, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mirto di Panarea by Acqua di Parma is inspired by an island suspended in time, combining sparkling citrus accents with notes of myrtle and the freshness of juniper. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle, basil, and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
"An original motif of circles, triangles and swirls, created by Dorothe Meilichzon, decorates the special packaging of Mirto di Panarea eau de toilette in a tribute to the serene beauty of the sea and the vibrant energy of the sun that touches the waves. The fragrance recalls the joyful spirit of summer with the aromatic warmth of myrtle that combines with basil and the sparkling citrus notes of lemon and Calabrian bergamot. Accents of sea breeze and fresh juniper meet with rose and jasmine, instilling a sensation of peace and harmony.
Mirto di Panarea is presented in the unmistakable Acqua di Parma bottle, embellished with a decorated cap. An icon of Art Deco, the bottle is made of pure glass in shades of deep blue, which in a play of reflections evokes the transparency of the sea."
output: Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Mediterraneo Mirto di Panarea Limited Edition 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Italian Lemon, Bergamot, Myrtle and Basil; middle notes are Jasmine and Damask Rose; base notes are Amber, Cedarwood and Juniper.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Born in Roma The Gold Uomo is a fragrance inspired by the vibrant color of gold with solar and spicy notes. The scent features a blend of warm spices, an ambery vanilla accord, and the warm elegance of Virginia cedar essence. Inspired by a summer in Rome, this fragrance captures the golden warmth that sets the eternal city alight.
output: Born in Roma The Gold Uomo by Valentino is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Born in Roma The Gold Uomo was launched in 2024. Top notes are Solar Notes, Spicy Notes and Nutmeg; middle note is Virginia Cedar; base notes are Vanilla and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
She awakens as the sun bids farewell to the horizon. Moonlight kisses her skin, and the night fills her with passion, shedding all the shackles of restraint. She craves celebration, and the entire world freezes in anticipation of her enchanting curves.
Her magic and sensuality captivate everyone, leaving behind a morning trail of joyful memories and twilight carefreeness, echoing like a love message, I wanna be loved by you.
Top Note:
Forest berries, Plum sake
Middle Note:
Rose, Grey Oriental, Apple hookah
Bottom Note:
Osmanthus, Vetiver, Oud
output: I Wanna Be Loved By You by Haute Fragrance Company HFC is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. I Wanna Be Loved By You was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Benot Bergia. Top notes are Wild Berries, Sake and Plum; middle notes are Amber, Rose and Apple; base notes are Oud, Osmanthus and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Power, opulence, creativity, originality, high quality. This is Orientalbomb. The very first collaboration between Laboratorio Olfattivo and Arturetto Landi. A fragrance made to impress  able to amaze and fascinate. Orientalbomb, with its mix of fruity, floral, dry woody and amber notes, intrigues and seduces. A long-lasting perfume with a great projection. Its vibrant opening with fruity notes is diluted by bitter notes of coffee, which give depth while melting with an enveloping floral heart, composed of powerful flowers such as rose, iris, jasmine and lily of the valley. This floral harmony reveals an ethereal and refined scent that softens the base: thats the deepest secret of the fragrance. The warm and sensual notes of amber and vanilla match the earthy, woody notes of patchouli and sandalwood, while leather and nagarmotha provide mystery and seduction. Orientalbomb draws attention while leaving a memorable trail.
Luxury and magnetism
This new fragrance is the result of the collaboration between Laboratorio Olfattivo and Arturetto Landi and it introduces a brand new collection, the Extreme Collection. Extreme because these fragrances will be characterized by richer and more expensive raw materials, powerful and exclusive formulas, in line with the style of Laboratorio Olfattivo. Roberto Drago.
output: Amberbomb by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amberbomb was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Arturetto Landi. Top notes are Coffee, Plum, Coconut, Strawberry and Apple; middle notes are Iris, Jasmine, Lily of the Valley and Rose; base notes are Leather, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Cedar, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Amber, White Musk, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"KILIAN PARIS presents its new limited edition summer perfume, inspired by monoi oil and tiare flower infused in coconut oil: Sunkissed Goddess. Our founder revisited this Polynesian elixir to give it an unparalleled radiance with floral notes as fresh as they are captivating that revive the sensory memories associated with the summer season. A fragrance that evokes the smells of summer, of tanning oil and the warmth of the sun radiating on the skin.

The fragrance opens with this happy marriage between a white tiar with delicious creaminess and a terribly sensual essence of ylang-ylang, before giving way to the warm roundness of coconut and vanilla, and ending with notes of guaiac and labdanum cistus, two emblematic scents that KILIAN PARIS loves for their resinous character, their energy and their persistent charm."

Fragrance Notes: Ylang Ylang Essence, Tiare Flower, Coconut.
output: Sunkissed Goddess by By Kilian is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sunkissed Goddess was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Bergamot and Neroli; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Tiare Flower; base notes are Coconut, Vanilla, Guaiac Wood and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tinos, Greece, the Aegean breeze that blends with the balsamic and invigorating notes of the eucalyptus that grow lush throughout the island. A monastery at the top of a hill, where you can hear the silver ticking of votive
offerings moved by the warm Mediterranean wind. The smell of beeswax candles fills the rooms of this sacred place and mixes with frankincense.

We are in one of the most sacred and precious Orthodox monasteries in all of Greece where people come on their knees to give thanks for the numerous miracles received. Suscepto is a hymn to the mysterious and unique sacredness of this place, where the impenetrable silence is the background to numerous paranormal manifestations. EX VOTO SUCEPTO, is the Latin phrase that means UNDERTAKING an ex voto, a spiritual thanks.
output: Suscepto by Spiritica is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Suscepto was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Eucalyptus, Sea Notes, Peppermint, Ozonic notes and Bergamot; middle notes are Frankincense, Metallic notes, Damask Rose, Benzoin and Smoke; base notes are Eucalyptus, Beeswax, Honey, Metallic notes, Sandalwood and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
We are in the Valley of the Moon, a ghostly, mystical and unusual landscape in northern Chile.
The warmth of the red earth blends with the alcoholic reminiscence of the Pisco sour (a typical South American cocktail) and the bitter notes of coca leaves (a plant that is legally and habitually used by the native populations to
make up for the lack of energy due to the high altitude of the Andean plateau).
Numerous paranormal phenomena of the most disparate nature occur here. WEON, an ancient word coming from the Indian language, and widely used throughout Chile: its primary meaning is that of "friendship". A bit like saying
"comp" in southern Italy.

Weon is a hymn to the spiritual mysteries of a memorable place that can generate very strong internal shocks.
The subsoil of the Atacama desert is rich in lithium, a mineral used in drugs that stabilize mood. In the sky of this red desert, it is common to observe lights and strange shapes moving quickly in space. A specific area of this desert has been used to listen to the "sounds of the universe" through numerous receptive phono dishes, the purpose of which is to go in search of the primordial sound of the bigbang, or perhaps, who knows what other unknown mysteries.
output: Weon by Spiritica is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Weon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Pisco Sour cocktal and Coca; middle notes are Ice cream, Mint, Milk, Vanilla and Copahu Balm; base notes are Ozonic notes, Sea Salt, Metallic notes and Earthy Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "Maison Guerlain invites you to its new exceptional event in a numbered edition dedicated to the Chinese New Year. Each year, a new collaboration will celebrate the astrological sign of the Chinese calendar. Guerlain thus inaugurates the first edition with its 2024 vintage under the sign of the dragon, symbolizing the year to come. Dressed in red for the occasion, the legendary Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a sumptuous golden dragon adorned with Swarovski crystals designed by Parisian jeweler Francesco Truscelli. This exceptional piece welcomes the powerful trail of Nroli Outrenoir in the image of the imperial dragon."
output: Nroli Outrenoir (2024) by Guerlain is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Nroli Outrenoir (2024) was launched in 2024. Nroli Outrenoir (2024) was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser. Top notes are Petitgrain, Bergamot, Lemon, Tangerine and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tea, Neroli, Earthy Notes, Orange Blossom and Smoke; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla, Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Myrrh and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Le Labo invites us on a bold journey with LAVANDE 31a captivating twist on lavender that reshapes our perceptions and redefines the tradition of this scent.
LAVANDE 31 revitalizes lavender, shedding its nostalgic connotations and elevating it to new heights. Infused with bergamot and neroli essential oils, it unveils an unexpected freshness, accentuating the purity of lavender flower buds through vertical distillation. The perfume's base, a Le Labo signature, mixes amber, musk, and tonka, creating a uniquely classic yet rebellious scent.
According to the brand, LAVANDE 31 exemplifies perfume as art, reinventing familiar notes into olfactory masterpieces that ignite the senses and inspire the mind.
Releasing on 1st October 2023, Lavande 31 is available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Lavande 31 by Le Labo is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lavande 31 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daphn Bugey. Top notes are Neroli and Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Musk, Tonka and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover the limited edition of Stronger With You Eau de Toilette, a unique and addictive fragrance encapsulated in a new bottle adorned with the iconic Emporio Armani eagle, reinterpreted in a pixel design. An eau de toilette with spicy and amber notes.
The Marron Glac accord, unprecedented in perfumery, expresses a surprising, magnetic, and generously masculine association with an extreme addiction. Vanilla, the olfactory signature of Stronger With You, is worked here in a very masculine way: woody, spicy, and smoky. In the background, notes of pink pepper combine with an aromatic heart of sage and give it a sensual and elegant trail.
Top note: Cardamom, Pink Pepper
Heart notes: Sage
Base Note: Essence of Vanilla & Marron Glac Accord, Oriental
Available as a 50ml Eau de Toilette. Limited Edition.
output: Stronger With You Limited Edition by Giorgio Armani is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Stronger With You Limited Edition was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle note is Sage; base notes are Marron glace, Vanilla and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Feroce Pour Homme by Fragrance World is a dynamic fragrance for men, set to be released in 2024. This scent opens with vibrant notes of grapefruit and lemon, followed by a spicy heart of pink pepper. The base is grounded with warm amber and woody notes.
output: Feroce Pour Homme by Fragrance World is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Feroce Pour Homme was launched in 2024. Top notes are Grapefruit and Lemon; middle note is Pink Pepper; base notes are Woody Notes and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the Brazilian heritage of drinks, the caipirinha, the Caipi dArgent perfume is the newest creation by Cond Parfum.
Fbio Cond emphasizes the originality of the fragrance and the bottle by choosing the silver color, represented by the cocktail shaker.
The perfume is an aromatic fougere, invigorating with a cold look but with the proper taste of the drink.
Its opening brings Sicilian lemon, alcoholic notes, lemon verbena, lime, bergamot and litsea cubeba.
The body is composed of lavender, mint, mint, rhubarb and basil.
The base he sought to bring the sugary aspect of the drink with coumarin and woody at the same time with an accord of guaiac wood, vetiver, ambroxan and virginia cedar.
Cheers!
Top notes: Boozy notes, Sicilian Lemon, Verbena, Lime, Bergamot and Litsea Cubeba.
Middle Notes: Lavender, Mint, Mint, Rhubarb and Fig Leaves.
Base Notes: Coumarin, Guaiac Wood, Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Ambroxan
output: Caipi d' Argent by Cond Parfum is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caipi d' Argent was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fbio Cond. Top notes are Lime, Boozy Notes, Lemon Verbena, Sicilian Lemon, Bergamot and Litsea Cubeba; middle notes are Mint, Peppermint, Lavender, Rhubarb and Basil; base notes are Ambroxan, Coumarin, Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Guaiac Wood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vivamor All Over Spray is an uplifting way to wear the Vivamor Extrait De Parfum fragrance. Layer over Vivamor Extrait De Parfum or wear the Vivamor All Over Spray on its own. Enjoy the specially designed atomiser ensuring wider application all over.
From the Latin words of Viva meaning Life and Amor meaning Love, Vivamor is a celebration of life and love. Vivamor Parfum is the perfect expression to keep you confident and alluring. Invigorating freshness is introduced through pink peppercorn, lemon, rosewood and pineapple adding brightness which is then joined by a sensual rose, saffron, patchouli and oakmoss heart. Sandalwood, Leather, Dark Orientalwoods and Musk thereafter bring out allure and complexity to the fragrance lasting for many hours and taking the wearer on a blissful journey.
Created by Master Perfumer Jorge Lee in collaboration with Rashed Belhasa (MoneyKicks).
output: Vivamor by Navitus Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vivamor was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jorge Lee. Top notes are Pineapple, Lemon, Palisander Rosewood and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Patchouli, Saffron, Oakmoss and Rose; base notes are Sandalwood, Leather, Musk and Amberwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Get ready to refresh with the energizing spirit of Odyssey Limoni! This invigorating fragrance delivers a burst of zesty floral goodness, leaving you revitalized and ready to seize the day. With bright top notes of lemon, sweet orange, bergamot, and mandarin, it awakens your senses. The heart adds a lively kick of ginger, orange blossom, and marine notes, while a warm base of amber, musk, and blue tea creates a lasting, uplifting impression.
Notes Detail:
Top Note: Lemon, Sweet Orange, Bergamot & Mandarin
Heart Note: Ginger, Orange Blossom & Marine Notes
Base Note: Amber, Musk & Blue Tea
output: Odyssey Limoni Fresh by Armaf is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Odyssey Limoni Fresh was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lemon, Sweet Orange, Mandarin and Bergamot; middle notes are Marine notes, Orange Blossom and Ginger; base notes are Tea, Musk and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Meet the first fragrance in our new luxury line: Nightcap. Designed for chilly date nights, long winter walks, firesides with old friends, and late night lounging. Perfect for a night like tonight.
Nightcap is unlike anything we've ever released. Its rich, intoxicating combination of Bourbon, Leather, and Vanilla results in something truly special and lasts all day.
Nightcap is something completely new for GUY FOX. After previously focusing on versatile, everyday fragrances, we set out to create a multi-layered, rich scent with classically masculine notes and serious longevity. Good news: We nailed it.
Nightcap is so unique we created a brand new collection to release it. Founder's Reserve will feature limited quantity, high-end fragrances that are too exciting to keep to ourselves.
output: Nightcap by GUY FOX is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Nightcap was launched in 2024. Nightcap was created by Marc Daniel Heimgartner and Sidonie Grandperret. Top notes are Tobacco, Bitter Orange, Malt, Nutmeg, Coriander and Ginger; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Milk, Bourbon Whiskey, Leather, Oak and Pimento; base notes are Smoke, Amber, Vanilla, Sandalwood and White Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Command the crowd with this warm, spicy scent. Notes of clove, cinnamon, and apple richly layer into earthy notes of cashmere wood, orris, labdanum, patchouli, and vetiver. Base notes of sandalwood, cedarwood, vanilla, birchwood, and tonka bean round out a classic sweet, yet woody finishmasculine with an air of confidence. Boldly walk into any room with charm and authority.
output: Editor in Chief by Michael Malul London is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Editor in Chief was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Richard Herpin. Top notes are Clove, Cinnamon and Apple; middle notes are Cashmere Wood, Patchouli, Labdanum, Orris and Vetiver; base notes are Birch, Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The enchanting melody of the fire in the heart of the night, radiating its captivating aura
Surrounds by the glow of warm spices imbued with saffrons exotic charm, the light sweetness of ripe peaches, the rich sensuality of sandalwood and sultry traces of amber, while inviting to the symphony of sensations.
output: ANKA by Vertus is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. ANKA was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Grapefruit and Peach; middle notes are Clove, Cistus Incanus, Nutmeg and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Amber, Fir, Sandalwood and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
HACIVAT X is the new interpretation of NISHANEs global hit HACIVAT (launched in 2017), paying homage to the traditional shadow play character with a chypre structure that exudes elegance, competence, and love of art. This fragrance is a celebration of life, with stimulating notes of pineapple and bergamot backed by woody notes. It features top notes of juicy pineapple, zesty bergamot, and spicy pink pepper, leading to a heart of refreshing lime, delicate jasmine,and orange blossom. The base notes include earthy patchouli, woody cedarwood, and vetiver from Haiti.
NISHANE is looking forward to hearing the thoughts of the crowded HACIVAT fans worldwide about HACIVAT X and is sure that it will quickly become a new favorite amongst the fragrance enthusiasts with its highly addictive and noticeable scent.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - pineapple - pepper pink
HEART NOTES
lime - jasmine - orange flower
BASE NOTES
patchouli - cedarwood heart - vetiver oil haiti
output: Hacivat X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Pineapple, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lime, Tunisian Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Haitian Vetiver, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mizensir Perfect Oud evokes the memory of bright red embers of oud wood burning to release the full intensity of woody smoke. Master Perfumer Alberto Morillas uses the rare Alaskan cedar to dominate the heart of the scent, while cardamom and bergamot essence cool down the fragrance. This extrait de parfum blends notes of rose oxide and rum absolute, which gracefully lifts the scent of smoke to invigorate the senses.
Available as a 100ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Perfect Oud Extrait by Mizensir is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Perfect Oud Extrait was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bergamot and Cardamom; middle notes are Rose Oxide, Cedar Essence and Rum; base notes are Oud, Incense and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
HEAD - Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Rum Pure Jungle Essence
HEART - Banana Bread, Melted Caramel
BASE - Tonka Bean Absolute, Cypriol Essential Oil, Orcanox
output: Nanatopia by BORNTOSTANDOUT is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Nanatopia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alex Lee. Top notes are Rum, Cinnamon and Nutmeg; middle notes are Banana, Caramel and Bread; base notes are Tonka Bean, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Orcanox.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: It is a classic, bold and energetic combination. Its opening notes feature the elegance of Italian bergamot with a vibrant touch of pepper and rosemary. In its heart we find refined notes of Neroli and Rosemary, which provide elegance and class. Finally, the powerful and sophisticated combination marked by notes of Vetiver and Tonka Bean, which make this fragrance suitable for all occasions.
output: Dom Pour Homme by Flora Pura is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Dom Pour Homme was launched in 2024. Top notes are Sicilian Bergamot, Pepper and Rosemary; middle notes are Neroli and Rosemary; base notes are Vetiver and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Sauvage Eau Forte by Dior is a fresh and spicy fougre fragrance. This innovative scent features an alcohol-free formula, blending cold spices, bleached lavender, and musky woods. The fragrance is inspired by the symbolic power of water, creating a highly concentrated and milky-colored eau.
"The emblematic freshness of Sauvage intensified and extended by the power of water. A striking blend of cold spices and blanched lavender, deepened by the strength of musky woods in an exclusive water-based formula."
Available in bottles of 60 and 100 ml.
output: Sauvage Eau Forte by Dior is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Sauvage Eau Forte was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top notes are Elemi resin and Spices; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Musk and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is an intensified, premium take on the iconic original fragrance CK One from 1994. Launched 30 years after the original, this fragrance modernizes its fresh notes while paying homage to its DNA. It is an olfactory symbol of timeless unity, described as explosive, energetic, and captivating. Master perfumer Alberto Morillas formulated this fresh edition, amplifying the concentration for long-lasting, powerful freshness.
"The intense fragrance for all. fresh. provocative. unapologetic. Twice as concentrated as the original icon. ck one essence features top notes of sparkling italian bergamot and blood orange for vibrant intensity. organic green tea accords are drenched in a warm base of natural sandalwood and musk. the feeling is clean and sensual. The iconic bottle is fully recyclable, reimagined with a modern translucent metallic finish."
Calvin Klein CK One Essence is available in 50ml, 100ml, and 200ml bottles.
output: CK One Essence by Calvin Klein is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. CK One Essence was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Bergamot, White Tea, Blood Orange and Black Pepper; middle notes are Green Tea, Mint and Geranium; base notes are Musk, Australian Sandalwood, Incense and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This creation originates from the memory of a trip to the heart of the French Riviera, between the shimmering blue of the Mediterranean and the hills dotted with olive trees, in Saint-Tropez.
Paolo and Tiziana visited this town with its timeless lifestyle of gentleness and freedom and were inspired by the joyful and vibrant character of this seaside resort.
Saint-Tropez was a fascinating journey through the golden age of life on the Riviera in the 1960s.
In those years, the Italian and French Rivieras were the protagonists of an extraordinary cultural transformation: the life of the all-Italian playboys, known as Les Italiens, who were taking over the Riviera in the 1960s to the cry of Bare feet, jeans, hair in the wind and go!
This iconic image perfectly captures the defiant attitude and desire for freedom of the time.
These young people took over the Riviera with a daring spirit and a liberating attitude, embracing a lifestyle of relaxation and fun, while a blazing fire of passion burned within them, driving them to live every moment to its fullest.
When the film And God Created Woman hit the big screen, it captured the hearts of audiences around the world thanks to the unforgettable young Brigitte Bardot.
Torp is a tribute to the timeless glamour of that period, when Saint Tropez became a popular destination for the international jet set. Torp, on the other hand, was the name used by the resorts trendiest rebels in the 1960s. This creation is a fresh, vibrant fragrance whose marine notes remind us of unforgettable summer evenings full of laughter with not a care in the world. Each note is dedicated to the sea and its magic, a journey of the senses to one of the most fascinating places in the world. Anyone wearing it can close their eyes and find themselves transported to the cobbled streets of Saint Tropez, amidst the laughter of children at play, the scent of the salty air and the warmth of the sun on their skin.
The fragrance opens with a fresh, citrusy bouquet, thanks to Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sorrento Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin, and combines with Marine notes, which add depth to the perfume.
The heart of the fragrance, the true essence of this creation, opens with the muted scents of Bulgarian Rose, Cte dAzur Lavender, French Iris and Provenal Violet, intertwined with the delicate elegance of Saint Tropez Peony, the sweetness of Sicilian Orange and juicy Romagna Peach.
The entire creation is built on a solid foundation of fine woods such as African Ebony and Australian Sandalwood combined with Musk, Orientalgris, Indian Patchouli and Tuscan Oakmoss, creating a beguiling and sensual base that envelops the wearer like a lasting embrace.
Torp captures the vibrant, lush essence of the Mediterranean coastline.
Its accords are reminiscent of when the turquoise sea meets the sun-kissed olive groves, creating an unforgettable olfactory experience.
TOP NOTES: Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sicilian Mandarin, Sorrento Lemon, Marine Notes
MIDDLE NOTES: Bulgarian Rose, Cte d'Azur Lavender, French Iris, Provenal Violet, Saint Tropez Peony, Sicilian Orange Blossom, Romagna Peach
BASE NOTES: Orientalgris, Musk, African Ebony, Australian Sandalwood, Indian Patchouli, Tuscan Oakmoss
output: Torpe by Tiziana Terenzi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Torpe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Marine notes, Calabrian bergamot, Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Peach, Sicilian Orange, Lavender, Peony, Violet and Iris; base notes are Ebony, Ambergris, Musk, Australian Sandalwood, Oakmoss and Indian Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Summer in a bottle to be enjoyed 365 days a year and at all latitudes, even when it's cold outside and warm temperatures are just a mirage. A fresh and juicy mango pinacolada enriched with warm and tropical vibes, supported by an airy floral bouquet and a solid base with green notes and enriched with the creaminess of sandalwood. An immediate and playful fragrance, designed to convey happiness, light-heartedness and will to live!

Top notes: mango, pineapple, coconut, tropical notes, bergamot, white rum
Heart notes: coconut milk, marine notes, white flowers
Base notes: vetiver, musk, sandalwood, Indian amber
output: Summer Hammer by Lorenzo Pazzaglia is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Summer Hammer was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lorenzo Pazzaglia. Top notes are Mango, Pineapple, Coconut, Bergamot and White Rum; middle notes are Coconut Milk, White Flowers and Marine notes; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Amber and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
From the blazing sunshine and into the reflective waters.
An exhilarating summer romance with your soulmate is about to begin.
Get ready to make memories of a lifetime.
This season, Calvin Klein Fragrances introduces two fresh summer additions to the iconic Eternity fragrance pillar: Eternity Reflections for Men Eau de Toilette and Eternity Reflections for Women Eau de Parfum.
The Calvin Klein Eternity Reflections fragrances are inspired by the spontaneous, intimate moments shared between a couple at the beach. Against the backdrop of a hot summer day, the campaign captures two lovers indulging in acts of playfulness, creating memories in the sparkling waves and salty sea air. The quintessential summer romance.
The Eternity Reflections flacons pay tribute to the colors of summer. A tranquil blue mens bottle and a serene seafoam green womens bottle are made from lacquered glass and topped with silver caps, evoking the summer sky and sea while remaining true to Calvin Kleins minimalist aesthetic. The black and white outer packaging glistens with ocean-like sparkles to symbolize the reflections of summer love shared between a couple. Both cartons share the same design, further linking the mens and womens fragrances.
To reimagine the mens fragrance, perfumers Carlos Vinals and Alienor Massent of Symrise were inspired to create a smell and feel like liquid magic with a mint chocolate and absinthe signature.
Crisp. Surprising. Fresh.

Calvin Klein Eternity Reflections for Men Eau de Toilette, an aromatic woody fougere, opens with a green fairy absinthe. At heart, an addictive chocolate note adds an unexpected center. Oak moss swirled with sensual sandalwood provides a substantive structure, a key signature of the Eternity fragrance line.
output: Eternity for Men Reflections by Calvin Klein is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eternity for Men Reflections was launched in 2023. Eternity for Men Reflections was created by Carlos Vials and Alienor Massenet. Top note is Absinthe; middle note is Chocolate; base notes are Oakmoss and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Inspired by Paddingtons favourite treat, Orange Marmalade by Jo Malone London is a cologne that offers a vibrant and zesty fragrance experience. The scent is reminiscent of freshly made orange marmalade, capturing the essence of citrus with a sweet and tangy profile.
output: Orange Marmalade by Jo Malone London is a Citrus Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Orange Marmalade was launched in 2024. Orange Marmalade was created by Nicolas Bonneville and Marie Salamagne. Top note is Orange Peel; middle note is Bitter Orange; base notes are Clary Sage and Cashmere Wood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
When the wind blows, the leaves of patchouli rustle with a gentle sound, liberating an inebriating perfume simultaneously woody, earthy, and dry with smoky accents. The sumptuous Patchouli Sauvage represents the freedom of nature.
The fragrance opens with sparkling, luminous top notes of bergamot, grapefruit and a hint of pink pepper that flow into a sumptuous, precious heart built on notes of patchouli linked to labdanum and a crunchy dried fruit accord. In conclusion, cedar wood and golden amber are combined with vetiver and tonka bean for greater longevity.
Let yourself be carried away by the almost palpable scent of Patchouli Sauvage. Feel the wind blowing gently, hear the soft rustle of leaves, Patchouli Sauvage symbolises the freedom of nature.
output: Patchouli Sauvage by Houbigant is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Patchouli Sauvage was launched in 2023. Patchouli Sauvage was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Bergamot and White Grapefruit; middle notes are Patchouli, Labdanum and Dried Fruits; base notes are Cedar, Java vetiver oil, Sandal, Amber and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Kopi Luwak by Fragrance World invites you into a world of opulence and mysterious aromas. Freshly roasted coffee beans wake you up, the heart hides an unexpected floral secret with delicate rose, and the base notes reveal the true magic of the Orient with oud, cistus, and patchouli.
output: Kopi Luwak by Fragrance World is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Kopi Luwak was launched in 2024. Top note is Coffee; middle note is Rose; base notes are Agarwood, Oud and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Step into a parallel universe where mystery possesses the mind in a dark and decadent experience that casts subliminal shadows on the wearer.
The second chapter of the almighty collaboration between the greatest riff master of all time, Black Sabbaths legendary guitarist and rock composer, Tony Iommi and Xerjoffs esteemed founder, Sergio Momo.
A combination of forces that play on the palindromic nature of sound, scent and sensorial sequences, Tony Iommi Deified parfum is the new Xerjoff Blends venture that presents Deified perfume with a soon to come soundtrack and music video.
Created on a duality of leather and spice, Deified plays in a loop with no beginning and no end, accompanying the wearer with its omnipresent aura. Authentic and warm accents of saffron meet powdery and leathery facets that dance with the delicate touch of gourmand freshness. Cinnamon exalts spicier notes, complemented by gentle rose at the heart.
The woody base of papyrus and patchouli leaves the senses longing for more in a rhythmic exchange of back and forth.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available sa 50ml Parfum.
output: Deified Tony Iommi Parfum by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Deified Tony Iommi Parfum was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Apple and Cinnamon; middle notes are Leather and Rose; base notes are Papyrus, Patchouli, Musk and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Dubai is a vibrant and culturally diverse city with amazing scents and experiences. One fragrance that captures the essence of this city is Haramain Amber Oud Gold 999.9, Dubai Edition. As you take in the city's amazing sights and smells, the fragrance begins to unfold like a journey through time. Each note reveals a different aspect of Dubai's rich heritage. From the top notes of pear, orange, bergamot, and lemon to the heartwarming scent of melon, pear, jasmine, cardamom, caramel, and green apple, every note is a chapter in the captivating story of this metropolis. And, as you breathe in the grounding base notes of amber, vanilla, patchouli, and cedarwood, you'll feel a sense of rootedness amidst the excitement. It's a scent that invites you to immerse yourself in its captivating story and discover the true essence of Dubai.
output: Amber Oud Gold 999.9 Dubai Edition by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Gold 999.9 Dubai Edition was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Tho Belmas. Top notes are Orange, Pear, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Caramel, Melon, Pear, Green Apple, Cardamom and Jasmine; base notes are Amber, Vanilla, Patchouli and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
CITRUSES WITHIN BURNING WOODS
It is at first a flash of Lemon, insanely vibrant and bright, striking like lightning in the middle of the night. Fluttering notes of Lime, lively and shrill, soon come forth, welded into the metallic zing of Mandarin, its leathery zest and bittersweetness.
 
Shackled in a cage of dark woods, the Citrus fight with a newfound strength, their light shining brighter as delicate notes of Elemi and a heavenly touch of Hojari Frankincense burst open.
 
Even as the smoke rises and crashes in waves of burnt Cake, spicy Guaiac wood and incandescent Vetiver, the Citrus bouquet carries its brilliance proud, undefeated, and undimmed.
 
A tale of trying and reaching, of life overcoming shade, Search captures the virile energy of resilient minds unafraid to fight their inner darkness to become their ideal self.
output: Search by Amouage is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Search was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexis Grugeon. Top notes are Lime, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Olibanum, elemi and Black Pepper; base notes are Vetiver, Cade oil and Guaiac Wood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: A*Men Fantasm by Mugler is an amber aromatic gourmand fragrance for men. This scent opens with an explosion of citrus and luminous notes of bergamot essence, contrasted by the spicy freshness of pink pepper. The heart features an intense and mysterious accord of Grand Cru Dark Chocolate, enhanced with clary sage and modernized patchouli. The fragrance is housed in a black bottle adorned with a silver star, capturing the essence of masculine pleasure.
output: A*Men Fantasm by Mugler is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. A*Men Fantasm was launched in 2024. A*Men Fantasm was created by Louise Turner and Jacques Huclier. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Citrus and Bergamot; middle notes are Dark Chocolate and Clary Sage; base note is Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Montblanc calligraphy with Patchouli Ink, a captivating fragrance that captures the essence of ink on paper. The smoky, earthy notes of patchouli mingle with delicate musk and vanilla, creating a unique olfactory experience that evokes the sensation of writing with a fountain pen.
output: Patchouli Ink by Montblanc is a Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Patchouli Ink was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Ink; base notes are Patchouli and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Oud Taiwan is an exquisite fragrance inspired by extraordinary oud oil distilled from highly matured oud, naturally grown in Taiwan. The composition opens with a bitter green leaves accord, full of vibrant verdant and slightly fresh nuances, with a tropical indolic touch. The heart notes feature extremely condensed, matured, and complex Taiwan oud radiating a bitter green medicinal aura, enhanced by boronia absolute. The base notes include smoky and leathery fossil amber, seaweed, spices, sandalwood, and animalic musks, creating a vision of tropical mossy woods and a photorealistic transportation to a night jungle.
output: Oud Taiwan by Areej Le Dor is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Taiwan was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Leaves and Indole; middle notes are Oud and Boronia; base notes are Spices, Amber, Sandalwood, Musk and Seaweed.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is an enchanting amber-sweet gourmand fragrance that exudes playful sophistication. The scent opens with a warm blend of cinnamon, sugar, and rum, creating an inviting sweetness that instantly captivates. The heart reveals a rich and indulgent mix of cacao, coffee, caramel, and oakmoss, adding depth and complexity. Finally, the base notes of tonka bean, cashmere, labdanum, and vanilla linger on the skin, offering a luxurious, lasting finish. Whether worn alone or layered, Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the perfect balance of sweetness and elegance in their fragrance collection.
Top Notes: Cinnamon, Sugar, Rum.

Middle Notes: Cacao, Coffee, Caramel, Oakmoss.

Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Cashmere, Labdanum, Vanilla.
output: Artisan Ethnique by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Artisan Ethnique was launched in 2024. Top notes are Rum, Cinnamon and Sugar; middle notes are Caramel, Cacao, Coffee and Oakmoss; base notes are Vanilla, Cashmere Wood, Tonka Bean and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Enjoy this breathtaking stroll through time in the fascinating atmosphere of Middle East, Oud Or awakens your senses with its rich warm woody and smoky facets.
A fresh and sparkling start where rose, raspberry and orange blossom blend into a rich and full-bodied heart composed of nuanced notes such as labdanum, saffron, patchouli and geranium. Guaiac Wood, Oud and Cedar Wood mingle with Vanilla in an opulent and elegant base.
Feel the captivating atmosphere that surrounds you, feel the rich history of people who have lived through the centuries and kept the tradition alive. Oud Or is a breathtaking journey back in time, into the fascinating atmosphere of the Middle East.
output: Oud Or by Houbigant is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Or was launched in 2023. Oud Or was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Raspberry, Rose and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Saffron, Iso E Super, Geranium, Cashmeran, Labdanum and Patchouli; base notes are Oud, Guaiac Wood, Cedar and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The extrait de musique collection aims to describe with incense the many sounds of the registers of the Great Organ of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris.
The sixth new fragrance to be presented speaks synaesthetically of the trumpet register, belonging to the reed family, one of the oldest organ registers. The first documented attestation of this register is found in a description of a large organ from the first century B.C., placed in a gladiator arena.
Reed registers the sound due to the vibration of a tab (the reed) on two walls.
Characterized by a particularly metallic and scratchy sound just like real trumpets, they enrich and complement the instrument.
The cap, like the previous extrait de musique, faithfully reproduces the stops of the registers of the Parisian Grand Organ.
Trompette 8 is enclosed like its predecessors inside an entirely handmade wooden box, reminiscent of the wooden case of large pipe organ soundboxes.
output: Trompette 8 by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Trompette 8 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Incense, Black Pepper and Labdanum; middle notes are Chili Pepper and Cedar; base notes are Elemi resin, Pink Pepper and Bergamot.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Kamikura by DI SER is a Clean Citrus Woody and Aromatic fragrance. Kamikura is launched in 2024 as a limited edition celebrating the 20th anniversary of Swedish brand GENTS, specializing in niche perfumes and barber products.
Kamikura is a tribute to spiritual and physical purification, Nordic tradition, and masculine beauty rituals. In Japanese culture, "Kamikura" is a sacred place and a home for gods and spiritual beings. At these sacred sites, purification rituals are held, dances and songs are performed, and offerings are made to Kami, the human's higher state after death. The perfume was created with the intention of bringing hope of happiness, success, and peace, and by spraying the perfume, the place you find yourself in transforms into a sacred Kamikura. Therefore, it is a fragrance that is meditative, spiritual, and calming with a natural minimalism.
Kamikura opens with fresh, crisp citrus notes and balsamic Ezo-pine and Todo-pine (Abies sachalinensis). The heart features hints of aromatic camphor and lavender, along with soapy oakmoss, while the base consists of woody, earthy accords. It is a scent that initially reveals the typical Japanese roots of Di Ser but then evolves into a classic woody perfume with a European touch, as a nod to Swedish nature and the culture of purity.
output: Kamikura by DI SER is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Kamikura was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Yasuyuki Shinohara.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
KILIAN launches the latest addition to its Smokes Collection called Smoking Hot in late September 2023. The fragrance offers a fusion of sweetness and smokiness, reminiscent of delectable caramel.
With a contemporary take on the smoky essence, this creation not only redefines the genre for modern sensibilities but also encapsulates an element of scorching allure. The heart of the fragrance is steeped in the lusciousness of caramel, blending the robust depth of Kentucky tobacco absolute and apple shisha. The bold undertones of Bourbon vanilla further contribute to the untamed and opulent nature of this olfactory composition.
The scent opens with apples, and the warm cinnamon bark essence is added to the mellow apple hookah. Then, slowly over time, smoked Kentucky tobacco absolute emerges. A rich tobacco absolute blends with oak moss, followed by Bourbon vanilla with balsamic notes. Orkanox is added to Bourbon Vanilla, also known as Pure Jungle Essence, to express its powerful and sensual charm with a scent.
The exquisite "Smoking Hot" is elegantly presented as a 50ml Eau de Parfum, encapsulating the essence of this alluring fusion within its meticulously crafted formulation.
output: Smoking Hot by By Kilian is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Smoking Hot was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Apple, Smoke and Cinnamon; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla and Moss; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Licorice, Orcanox, Iso E Super and Clary Sage.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
When Spanish sailors first explored Cuba in 1492, they returned with accounts of tall forests, chattering birds and men and women going from place to place with a firebrand of weeds in their hands to take in the fragrant smoke. Before long, Spanish colonists were growing and smoking tobacco too. As the demand for tobacco spread, the weeds became profitable. Cuba opened its first cigar factories in the early 1800s. Cuban Tobacco is an oriental, fruity scent. It embodies the smell of a tobacco aroma at its best. Starts with Mandarin Orange, Vanilla, and Mojito. Jasmine and Plum Wine unite with Tobacco and woody notes to create an olfactive journey through the history of Cuba. Salt is a note that you can notice throughout the whole experiment.
Funny Fact, Honey was used with cigars as a natural filter, adding a sweet flavor to the tobacco.
MANDARIN ORANGE  VANILLA  MOJITO
JASMINE  PLUM WINE  SMOKE  TOBACCO
TOBACCO BLOSSOM  WOODY NOTES  SALT
output: Cuban Tobacco by Alghabra Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuban Tobacco was launched in 2023. Top notes are Vanilla, Mojito and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Tobacco, Smoke, Plum Wine and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes, Tobacco Blossom and Salt.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Extreme naturalness transformed into perfume. The aromatic nuances of firbalsam and musk mix with the warmer and balsamic character of incense, Peruvian balsam and patchouli. A vibrant and fresh top note thanks to the unique essence of lemon and the green-spicy nuance of cardamom. Olfactory family: fougre amber. Olfactory notes: Cardamom, Peru balsam, patchouli.
output: Blue Incense by Massimo Dutti is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Blue Incense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ane Ayo. Top notes are Lemon and Cardamom; middle notes are Moss, Olibanum, Balsam Fir and Labdanum; base notes are Peru Balsam, Patchouli and Incense.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"There can be no mistaking his deep gaze. His eyes are fixated to the intangible and he moves forward peacefully. At first sight, this piquant character pulls you in. The brightness of his smile, and the pink Pepper come to pick you up. Cross his path and you immediately turn away from your routine. The space around him becomes his, permeated by a purple wave of Plum and black Cherry that whisper of its sweet origin and touch your soul.
Its a beautiful summer, a summer echoing its temperance and made of the suns caresses under the light sheets, of fresh Flowers opening in the morning and of starry nights in the souvenir of the scorching day.
The soft Indian Rose gently balances the Leather and black Oud in a semi-hypnotic pendulum where Sandalwood and Vanilla mingle without excess. You are touching a rare, ambered and deeply oriental feeling, a sensation whose genesis you would not know: who from the message or the messenger, who from the wake one has been left in or its wearer? Who from the top note or the heart will take you to your own immensity?
It doesnt matter, because in the end, all roads lead to Infinity." - Montale
NOTES
Black Cherry, Plum, Peruvian Pink Pepper, Cardamom & Saffron.
Black Oud & Leather, Indian Rose & Solar Tuberose, Sandalwood & Vetiver.
Vanilla Sugar, Intense Oriental, Tobacco Leaves, Tonka Beans & Musk.
output: Infinity by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinity was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Plum, Saffron, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Oud, Leather, Sandalwood, Rose, Vetiver and Tuberose; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla Sugar, Tonka, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"SKINS X SALLE PRIVE, an exclusive scent in collaboration with Skins Cosmetics, a renowned beauty retailer that carries niche brands.
SKINS X SALLE PRIVE is an everyday fragrance that can be worn all year round. It is sexy, comfortable, and mysterious. The fragrance experience is different every time, and therefore this creation cannot be put in a box. "When I wear the perfume, it immediately gives me a positive energy. It brings out the best in me and makes me feel happy. Especially at this time, I think it is especially important to pass on that positivity because that is something we are all looking for now, says [Skins founder] Philip Hillege. Salle Prive's co-founder Anna Hegeman adds: The Perfume gives me an instant sense of excitement. -Brand Website.
output: Skins X Salle Prive by Salle Prive is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Skins X Salle Prive was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bergamot, Violet Leaf and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Cashmeran, Papyrus and Iso E Super; base notes are Guaiac Wood, Orris Root and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Musky Rain is a musky, soft, and narcotic floral fragrance, inspired by the image of the painting of the same name. It is described as a unique composition that has been inspired by a secret love story, as well as the musks and ambers used.
A top note of bergamot and lychee wrapped in a spicy rose are the first chords of the composition, resting on a floral body. Narcissus absolute is the protagonist of the journey, while chords of jasmine and ylang-ylang help sweeten this dark flower, just as Indian Mysore sandalwood brings creaminess and sensuality to the fragrance.In the base notes, musks and ambers create the attractive character of the perfume.
TOP NOTES: Bergamote, Lychee, Black Pepper, Rose
MIDDLE NOTES: Narcissus absolute, Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Sandalwood
BASE NOTES: Musk, Vanilla, Oriental, Civet, Benzoin
Available as a 50 ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Musky Rain by Renier Perfumes is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Musky Rain was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Renier R. Mendez. Top notes are Litchi, Black Pepper, Rose and Bergamot; middle notes are Narcissus, Ylang Ylang, Australian Sandalwood and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Civet, Amber, Benzoin and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Eternal Wood evokes the awakening of a unique inspiration where Palo Santo and White Copal impregnate the air with mystical magic. At the heart of this experience, the humid warmth of the skin blends with this exotic fragrance. Burnt Oud and Davana accentuate the sensuality of the sillage, while Red Saffron imparts a passionate touch. Woody notes evoke the dense jungle, and the sweet scents of Toffee and Tonka remind one of tropical delights. This sensory adventure, extracted from Amelies memories, crystallizes a moment where nature, warmth, and magic unite in an enchanting perfume. 
As we journey from San Cristobal to the Chihuahuan deserts, the ethereal essence of Palo Alto gracefully envelops us, transcending the mundane. Eternal Wood materializes in our reverie, guided by Mayan incense and burnt Oud.
output: Eternal Wood by Mancera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eternal Wood was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Saffron, Laotian Oud and Davana; middle notes are Palo Santo, Guaiac Wood, Copal and Cashmere Wood; base notes are Toffee, Tonka Bean, Amber and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

A Mediterranean luxury synonymous with freedom.
We dream, we think, we relax or we seek pleasure.
There is no timetable, no protocol, the only rule that should never be broken is: Do not disturb.
output: Siesta by Ramon Monegal is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Siesta was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ramon Monegal. Top notes are Lemon, Cedar and Honey; middle notes are Vetiver, Iris and Jasmine; base notes are Tonka Bean, Vanilla and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The sun sparkled across rippling waves, its morning dance upon the Indian Ocean rousing the dodos from their carefree slumber. Stumbling drunkenly across the forest floor they feasted on overripe fruit where it lay, dropped for them by the lush island paradise that nurtured them. For generations, the predator-free and bountiful shores lulled them into such a state of complacency that their wings grew idle, and flight was lost  even to memory. Ultimately evolution would betray them, but while it lasted, the dodos enjoyed an existence marked by ease and comfort.
In Zoologist Dodo, notes of jackfruit and bergamot border a winding path dappled with aromatic turmeric and pink pepper. Venture along it to the heart of an island forest where hints of powdery orris emerge from beneath a potpourri of lavender, geranium, and orange flower. Soothed by the comforting florals, youll soon surrender, sinking into the loam where woody tonka and sandalwood sprout from an earthy base of patchouli and vetiver.
output: Dodo Jackfruit Edition by Zoologist Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dodo Jackfruit Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Yves Cassar. Top notes are Jackfruit, Turmeric, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Turmeric, Orange Blossom, Geranium and Orris; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sandalwood, Vetiver, Patchouli and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Allure Homme Sport Superleggera by Chanel is a limited-edition fragrance inspired by the Italian concept of superleggera, which emphasizes lightness and power. This scent is a rethinking of the classic Allure Homme Sport, featuring a lighter mix of woods, less amber, and an 'engine' of patchouli.
The Superleggera means super light in Italian, and was a nod to the innovative construction technique used by Carrozzeria Touring of Milan. This technique involved wrapping a lightweight aluminum body over a steel frame, resulting in both very light and structurally sound construction of a car.
output: Allure Homme Sport Superleggera by Chanel is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Allure Homme Sport Superleggera was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Polge. Top notes are Citrus, Mandarin and Grapefruit; middle notes are Woody Notes and Cedarwood; base notes are White Musk, Amber, Patchouli and Sandalwood.

This unisex scent is characterized by its chypre vibes, unveiling a stronger character with opulent Atlas cedar, dry Indonesian patchouli, and creamy amber. The floral elements are intensified with seductive violet accord and fragrant Bulgarian rose.
output: Gris Dior Esprit De Parfum by Dior is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gris Dior Esprit De Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Bulgarian Rose; middle note is Atlas Cedar; base notes are Patchouli and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "Sheba is the land of mythical fragrances, a symbol of the Orient encapsulated in its legendary queen and its history. I sought to capture this splendor like an hymn to this legacy. The divine, mysterious and eternal beauty of the Queen of Sheba enticed me to create a compelling, alluring perfume."
output: Divine Tentation by Reine de Saba is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Divine Tentation was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Rum, Fig and Clove; middle notes are Cinnamon, Guaiac Wood and Peru Balsam; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Amber and Patchouli.

It opens with a textured Leather accord harmonized with invigorating Incense essence. At the heart, Patchouli essence and Myrrh absolute elevate the scent, while warm Cedarwood and fruity Davana essences at the base leave a lasting trail.
output: Bottled Absolu by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bottled Absolu was launched in 2024.
