instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Alexandria II Anniversary is emblematic of the complexity and triumph of Alexandria and Alexandria II from the Oud Stars Collection.
A unique creation that honours the conception and significance of the two prestigious perfumes.
Alexandria II Anniversary opens with the deep yet sultry tones of Bulgarian rose, cumin and cardamom, smoothly blended at the heart with the most prosperous and precious ingredient in the world: oud.
Collected from the depths of the Bornean jungles, the finest Tarakan oud adorns the composition, casting a powerful spell on those who experience it.
Presenting an opulent and lustrous new look, this sophisticated scent closes with a warm embrace of musk and vanilla from Madagascar, blended with Australian sandalwood leaving an unforgettable mark on those who wear Alexandria II Anniversary.
OLFACTORY NOTES
output: Alexandria II Anniversary by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Alexandria II Anniversary was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender, Bulgarian Rose, Cardamom and Cumin; middle notes are Oud, Amber, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Civet, Orris, Wormwood, Mint and Clary Sage; base notes are Australian Sandalwood, Vanilla and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
TOM FORD BEAUTY will release the new fragrance from the Private Blend collection, the new edition of Oud Wood Eau de Parfum from 2007, called Oud Wood Parfum in March 2024.
Oud Wood is enriched with fresh spices of cardamom and pink pepper, mixing with the essence of rosewood. Various woods including intense patchouli, sandalwood, vetiver, and oud are icombined into the underlying tones of amber, tonka bean absolute, and vanilla.
The sleek and sophisticated bottle, emblematic of Private Blend, is adorned in black paint and embellished with a platinum-colored plaque. Offered in 50ml bottles.
output: Oud Wood Parfum by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Wood Parfum was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Pink Pepper and Rosemary; middle notes are Sandalwood, Agarwood (Oud), Patchouli and Vetiver; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Myrrh & Tonka Limited Edition by Jo Malone is a unisex fragrance released in 2024. It belongs to the spicy and oriental families and features notes of tonka bean and myrrh. This limited edition is part of the Cologne Intense Collection.
output: Myrrh & Tonka Limited Edition by Jo Malone London is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Myrrh & Tonka Limited Edition was launched in 2024. Myrrh & Tonka Limited Edition was created by Mathilde Bijaoui and Jo Malone.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Born in Roma Rockstud Noir is a fougre aromatic fragrance inspired by Rockstud Noir color, combining the intensity of sage with the sensuality of an ambergris accord. Born in Roma Rendez-Vous fragrances are limited editions with new designs and scents, only available in limited time and limited quantities.
"In 2023, you are welcomed to the Valentino monochromatic world, inspired by the bold Rockstud Noir. Born in Roma Rockstud Noir writes its signature with an intense fougre aromatic fragrance, orchestrating the fusion of rich sage and sensual ambergris accords. The perfect blend of deep aromatic notes.
Rendez-vous 2023 dresses the iconic rockstud bottles in strong monochromatic colors, celebrating the uniqueness of everyone and many vibrant ways to be you."
A Color Top Note: The fragrance starts with fresh aromas from the burst of Italian bergamots. A Couture Heart Note: Aromatic sage brings a natural depth to the heart of the fragrance. A Cool Base Note: The ambergris accord settles in the fragrance with its amber and musky facets for a powerful and addictive base.
Key Note: Italian Bergamot, Sage Heart Provence, Orientalgris Accord
The bottle pays tribute to the iconic Valentino Rockstud. This edgy pyramidal design, inspired by Roman architecture, is a house signature of Maison Valentino.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Toilette.
output: Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Rockstud Noir by Valentino is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Valentino Uomo Born In Roma Rockstud Noir was launched in 2023. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Sage; base note is Ambergris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The intoxicating Hemp Accord meets the mysterious notes of prized Black Oud to give collectors an unprecedented, sometimes irreverent EdP. Indian Oud, exclusive to Mohammed Abu Nashi, with a definite spicy scent that veers to white pepper, and a slightly animalized finish, joins the Hemp accord that emphasizes the green and aromatic declination of the fragrance while also giving a resinous olfactory accent in the base. An extraordinary blend, for collectors who prefer the selected Crop The House of Oud every year.
Available in 507 numbered pieces.
output: Crop 2023 by The House of Oud is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Crop 2023 was launched in 2023. Top note is cannabis; middle notes are cannabis and White Pepper; base notes are Indian Oud and Oud.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Osmanthe Liu Yuan was created by perfumer Maxence Moutte and inspired by his Provencal childhood. With sparkling citrus top notes, a floral heart of osmanthus, jasmine and iris and basenotes nuanced with leather, apricots and gentle musks, Osmanthe Liu Yuan is a ray of sunshine, bottled.
output: Osmanthe Liu Yuan by Le Jardin Retrouve is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Osmanthe Liu Yuan was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Maxence Moutte. Top note is Citruses; middle notes are Osmanthus, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Apricot, Leather and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Calvin Klein Fragrances introduces Calvin Klein Defy Parfum as the latest addition to its mens fragrance portfolio. Following the successful launch of Calvin Klein Defy Eau de Toilette and Calvin Klein Defy Eau de Parfum, this new fragrance continues to celebrate the evolving journey of defiance.
The new fragrance builds on the same woody olfactive profile as its predecessors, creating a more intense scent that defies expectations. Unexpectedly warmer, Calvin Klein Defy Parfum reveals the most powerful facets of the Defy man, while still highlighting his contrasting vulnerability and strength. The fragrance opens with a bright and luminous pink pepper note. At the heart, lavender adds a natural freshness. Responsibly sourced upcycled cocoa shell is the base and star ingredient of the fragrance, adding a rich gourmand depth, while reusing previously discarded cocoa shells."
Available in 200 ml, 100 ml, 50 ml, and 10 ml travel spray.
output: Defy Parfum by Calvin Klein is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Defy Parfum was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pascal Gaurin. Top note is Pink Pepper; middle note is Lavender; base note is Cacao.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Infinite Rich Warm is an oriental eau de toilette from Zara's #Tobacco Collection. It features a warm, intense, and bright fragrance profile with notes of rum, white peony, and vanilla bourbon.
output: Infinite Rich Warm by Zara is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinite Rich Warm was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A synergy of tradition, passion and expertise collide resulting in a unique fusion of artistic exploration with the House de Venoge, one of the most important wine libraries in Champagne.
Louis XV 1722 perfume is emblematic of a true celebration, a fresh and original composition which lifts the spirits and stirs the senses. The irresistible, woody blend opens with metallic notes, mirroring the sensation the champagne creations instil in the senses, slowly revealing warmer, seductive nuances on the skin as time goes by.
The cultural exchange of ideas and experiences in the creation of a new perfume with the House de Venoge also sees a new drink creation so rare and unique, the grapes were specifically selected to perfectly blend with the Champagnes dosage selected by Sergio Momo alongside the de Venoge Master Blender, with three exceptional creations; Blanc de Blancs, Blanc de Noirs and Ros.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Grapefruit, Plum, Saffron, Liquor, Aromatic Notes
Coffee, Lavender, Rose, Cocoa, Hazelnut
Amber , White Musk , Cashmere Wood, Leather, Sandalwood, Incense
output: Louis XV 1722 by Xerjoff is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Louis XV 1722 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Grapefruit, Champagne, Plum and Saffron; middle notes are Hazelnut, Lavender, Rose, Coffee and Cocoa; base notes are Sandalwood, White Musk, Cashmeran, Incense and Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Hope by Frdric Malle is a fragrance from the Desert Gems collection created by perfumer Dominique Ropion. This scent emulates the rising feeling of determination and jubilation, infused with a delicate dance of juniper, oud, and amber. It flourishes into a luminous cloak of smoke and leather, making for an opulent indulgence.
"Created by Dominique Ropion for the Desert Gems collection, HOPE fragrance exalts the nobility of an exceptional oud essence.

They say that its the pillar of the world. Others whisper about it giving life. Hope has always been right there at the heart of humanity. The third masterpiece by Dominique Ropion for the Desert Gems collection, HOPE is an amber and woody fragrance that highlights the absolute nobility of an exceptional oud essence. The smoky, leathery notes of incense and vetiver mingle with the spicy freshness of pink peppercorn, cypress and juniper to reveal oud in all its purity.  A scent of unparalleled elegance.

Oud, vetiver, incense."
Available in 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Hope by Frederic Malle is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hope was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Juniper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Oud, Smoke and Vetiver; base notes are Leather and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Rauque - the French word for hoarse - because like a somnolent voice, I answered with foggy scenes the silences of a daily life that prohibitions let out of breath. January 2021, in my Parisian flat the time was numb, the days uncertain to the point of losing touch with our senses and with the others because they meant danger; in that enclosure I brought spontaneity into play to create a diversion and belie my thoughts. From this introspection  sometimes feverish, sometimes exhilarating, Rauque was born: a series of photographs blending suspended compositions and captured portraits. A?er all, freedom is not asked for, it is searched for and seized like an antidote.

With a glass plate device that dissolves the contours of my subjects, I wanted to engage in a dialogue with absence and presence, indoor and outdoor. The obliteration of the object which, through the viewer's imagination, takes shape, stimulating peripheral awareness. A struggle then begins between the image and its disappearance

The image is a flat envelope, not enough for me to fully translate the essence of my allegories. So, since 2014, I've been incorporating an olfactory dimension into my photographic series. This allows the viewer to access sensory perceptions additional to those of sight. Thus, Rauque  LObjet parfumant - the perfuming object - created in close collaboration with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake, comes to dress, or be dressed by, the photographic series.

Rauque  LObjet parfumant was born from my encounter with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake. We have elaborated the olfactive creation as I was working on my visual creation. Not forbidding ourselves anything, we wanted to be driven by artistic baldness, and if our alphabet was made up of words and images, it sometimes included music and taste as well.  I would like the smell of a body about to implode!  this is how our olfactory exchange started. The waxy basement of a mushroom farm, a doughy Alep soap, a sticky piece of leather left in the back of a stable, the muzzle of a cow, an old box of Japanese incense smelling of ancient and dust, flowers marked by the patina of time or forgotten fruits with carnal accents, we censored nothing to best convey the idea of a feverish body surrounded by sleepy lives. Odd ideas and risky materials abound, but Christophers mastery was the safeguard, nothing was to fear, everything would be enhanced.
output: Rauque by Roberto Greco is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rauque was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake. Top notes are Violet Leaf and Cassia; middle notes are Narcissus, Myrrh, Accia, Mushroom and Osmanthus; base notes are Leather, Ambrarome and Pine tar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Imperial Tea is a fresh and modern homage to Jasmine Tea, inspired by the noble traditions of Chinese tea culture. This linear fragrance centers around a Green Tea accord infused with Jasmine Sambac absolute. The opening features Bergamot and Laminaria Seaweed, capturing the mist of ocean air, while rooted notes of Vetiver oil and Musk provide lasting depth. At its core is the timeless elegance of Jasmine Tea.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Laminaria Algae
Heart Notes: Mate Absolute, Jasmine Sambac
Base Notes: Musk, FloryMoss
Available in 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Imperial Tea (2024) by By Kilian is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imperial Tea (2024) was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Green Tea, Bergamot, Seaweed and Laminaria; middle notes are Mate, Jasmine Sambac, Orange Blossom and Freesia; base notes are White Musk, Moss and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Ete Sauvage Elixir is a sophisticated and irresistible fragrance designed with the modern man in mind. This scent features exquisite top notes of Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Cardamom, and Grapefruit, leading to a warm and spicy heart of lavender. The fragrance dries down to a base of sweet licorice, sandalwood, amber, patchouli, and Haitian Vetiver, creating a spicy and woody aroma. Perfect for any time of the day, this fragrance exudes confidence and power.
output: Ete Sauvage Elixir by Alexandria Fragrances is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ete Sauvage Elixir was launched in 2024. Top notes are Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Cardamom and Grapefruit; middle note is Lavender; base notes are Licorice, Sandalwood, Amber, Patchouli and Haitian Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
An iconic word in the perfume world, Elysium has remained an international success since launching in 2017.
Expanding upon the Elysium universe, Roja Parfums are pleased to welcome a new addition to the collection: Elysium Eau Intense.
Re-imagining the beloved Elysium accord, Eau Intense brings an even more refreshing experience. Uplifting the senses, it transports the wearer to a paradise of crystal waters and cloudless skies.
Elysium Eau Intense - A new era for the revered Elysium experience.
output: Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense by Roja Dove is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Elysium Pour Homme Eau Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Rhubarb, Grapefruit, Lime, Bergamot, Artemisia, Musk, Lavender and Thyme; middle notes are Black Currant, Orange Blossom, Apple, Lily of the Valley, Jasmine, Tuberose and Rose de Mai; base notes are juniper berry, Vetiver, Musk, Dry Wood, Galbanum, Black Pepper, Cedarwood, Violet Leaf, Ambergris, Vanilla, Labdanum, Benzoin, Leather and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In the summer of 2024, Tom Ford introduces the new version of Neroli Portofino fragrance from the Private Blend collection.
Neroli Portofino Parfum is a refreshing and lively neroli-centered perfume. It contains the essential oil of neroli buds, which brings out the charm of a citrus scent, reminiscent of a freshly blooming orange flower. It lies in the harmonious combination of neroli accord, Italian blood orange, lush white florals, and amber.

Available in bottles of 50ml.
output: Neroli Portofino Parfum by Tom Ford is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Neroli Portofino Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Rodrigo Flores-Roux. Top notes are Neroli, Bergamot, Lemon and Blood Orange; middle notes are Tunisian Neroli, Pitosporum, Clary Sage and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sylkolide, Musk and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Aylan by Day Three is a fragrance that opens with the vibrant and spicy notes of Brazilian pink pepper, bergamot, and elemi resin. The heart reveals a floral blend of orange blossom and Bulgarian rose absolute, enriched with the warmth of cashmere. The base is a luxurious combination of vanilla absolute, agarwood, and saffron.
output: Aylan by Day Three is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aylan was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Paul. Top notes are Elemi resin, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Cashmeran and Orange Blossom; base notes are Vanilla Absolute, Agarwood and Saffron.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Cuir Intense, part of the Absolus Allegoria collection by Guerlain, is a fragrance that explores the contrasting dimensions of leather. Cedar, sandalwood, and tobacco notes underscore its darkest accents, while an osmanthus accord reveals its lighter side.
output: Cuir Intense by Guerlain is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuir Intense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: This fragrance reaches the height of transgression, defying taboos, claiming freedom. Thirsty for independence, the anti-conformist who wears Overdose Aphrodisiaque is boldly confident. Temptation and impudence fly against the gates of the Garden of Eden, while impertinence and nonchalance urge you to go farther than ever. Driven by a duality of ylang-ylang and saffron, over a mineral base, the fragrance wavers in perpetual tension  At its heart, frankincense pushes back the limits. Meanwhile, in the base notes, moss and ambrox intertwine to further captivate and break the rules. Provocative and daring, its trail delicately whispers all the sins that you dream of committing.
output: Overdose Aphrodisiaque by Korloff Paris is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Overdose Aphrodisiaque was launched in 2023. Top notes are Ambrettolide and Saffron; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang and Incense; base notes are Cashmeran, Ambroxan and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Allow the scented tales of desire and dreams to comfort your soul as the elegant citrusy air envelops the crisp floral fields and takes a twist into the deep vallies of amber and musk.
output: Noir Endurance Eau de Parfum by Just Jack is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Noir Endurance Eau de Parfum was launched in 2024. Top notes are Strawberry, Cardamom, Citruses, Neroli, Clove and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Lily of the Valley, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Amber, Vanilla, Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Erba Pura, a limited edition fragrance released in celebration of National Day, is a captivating amber scent designed for both women and men. This unisex perfume, presented in a 50ml Eau de Parfum, is a versatile option suitable for all occasions and times.
The fragrance opens with a vibrant combination of Sicilian Orange, Calabrian Bergamot, and Sicilian Lemon, offering a refreshing and invigorating top note experience. In the heart of the fragrance, a delightful fusion of fruits emerges, adding a touch of liveliness and allure.
The base notes of White Musk, Madagascar Vanilla, and Oriental create a warm and inviting foundation. These elements infuse the fragrance with depth, sensuality, and a captivating aura.
Erba Pura is a unique and alluring fragrance that leaves a lasting impression. Experience the harmonious blend of notes in this limited edition scent, and let it enhance your presence with its fascinating allure.
output: Erba Pura by Le Prestige is a fragrance for women and men. Erba Pura was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The labyrinth is a spiral which captures us and draws us to its centre.
An ancient and powerful symbol representing the journey of man through the ordeals and challenges of his existence. Those who entertain this journey are made aware that the boundaries between human and divine, between finite and infinite, are mysteriously permeable. It is the symbol of pilgrimage, of a path to atonement, of a spiritual search. In its chore the material is defeated by the spiritual,  instinct is defeated by intelligence, violence is defeated by knowledge, the perishable by eternity.
In the opening, Labirinto is slightly smoky due to the Birch Wood and while you venture through its corridors you are embraced by creamy Sandalwood, a sweetness and depth which will attract you to its very chore: here Osmanthus, Patchouli and Sandalwood are revealed.
output: Labirinto by Pollini Profumi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Labirinto was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michele Pollini. Top notes are Green Notes and Bergamot; middle notes are Osmanthus, Ylang-Ylang and Iris; base notes are Myrrh, Birch, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Cedar, Vanilla and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Originally created in 1925 and famously worn by Winston Churchill, Town & Country was a shining star of a new era of the Crown Perfumery Company. Today it is reimagined with the Clive Christian hallmarks of complexity, concentration and dedication to the finest ingredients - perfectly crafted for self expression. Crisp with refreshing notes from the most elegant of herbs resting on a deeper base. Capturing the natural beauty of the countryside and the elegance of London town.
Notes: clary sage, gray amber and sandalwood.
output: Town & Country by Clive Christian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Town & Country was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Vincent Ricord. Top note is Clary Sage; middle note is Ambergris; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Red Temptation Tobacco Extrait de Parfum is a bold reinterpretation of Zara's iconic Red Temptation. This fragrance features an intoxicating burst of spicy tobacco notes, complemented by the delicate sweetness of fresh pink pepper and saffron. Sambac jasmine and fiery rockrose flower blend to create a delicious and intense trail.
output: Red Temptation Tobacco by Zara is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Red Temptation Tobacco was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
THE DELICATE STRENGTH OF FEMININITY
An ivory tower wreathed in shreds of clouds, dewy mists of fragile Pear, inviting Almond Milk and beads of Frankincense draw the outlines of a dreamful haven.
 
A princess whispers you in and leads the way to a lush garden where Osmanthus blossoms diffuse their heady apricot scent. A fountain gleams in the centre, its marble edge covered in scarlet roses whose voluptuous scent meets that of leathery Saffron threads laid on the floor.
 
Through Jasmine screens, sultry and spent, the woman walks and there comes with her a scent of dark Vanilla and skinlike Sandalwood, of ambery Labdanum and purring hints of regal Orientalgris: who are you, she asks, and you feel seen.
 
A spellbinding and novel interpretation of the Amouage triad of Rose, Frankincense and Orientalgris, Guidance reads like a poem, smells like an embrace, and feels like a word of wisdom.
output: Guidance by Amouage is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Guidance was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Pear, Hazelnut and Olibanum; middle notes are Osmanthus, Rose, Saffron and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Akigalawood, Ambergris and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Dolce&Gabbana Velvet Infusion is a modern reinterpretation of the iconic tea. This citrusy woody fragrance, created by Alex Lee, opens with sparkling notes of Italian Mandarin and Bergamot, topped with a hint of Pink Pepper. The heart reveals earthy Black Tea leaves, evolving into a comforting base of Cedarwood and Mate.
output: Velvet Infusion by Dolce&Gabbana is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Velvet Infusion was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alex Lee. Top notes are Bergamot, Italian Mandarin and Pink Pepper; middle note is Black Tea; base notes are Mate and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The fragrance takes its name from the Scoville scale, a measure of the heat level of chili peppers and hot sauces based on their capsaicin content.
output: Scoville by Obvious is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Scoville was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Patrice Revillard. Top notes are Chili Pepper, Sichuan Pepper and Black Pepper; middle note is Red Chilli Pepper; base notes are Red Chilli Pepper, Woody Notes and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tabac Nomade is an explosive composition that will transport you to the wilderness of the desert. In this warm and hypnotic perfume, refined tobacco leaves blend together with precious spicy notes.
Rich and creamy, the fragrance opens with a warm and crystalline accord of bergamot, rose and spices. In the refined and hypnotic heart, tonka bean and saffron mingle with tobacco leaves to melt into a base characterised by a leather accord and a touch of vanilla.
Tabac Nomade is reminiscent of a sunset in the wild desert, along the golden dunes where the natural wonders of this region never cease to impress.
output: Tabac Nomade by Houbigant is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tabac Nomade was launched in 2023. Tabac Nomade was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Spices, Rose and Bergamot; middle notes are Tobacco Leaf, Tonka Bean and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla and Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Symbol of a captivating and enigmatic night full of haziness. 
The top notes of spice, cinnamon and bergamot ignite the senses, creating a lively introduction.
As the fragrance evolves, the heart reveal the earthy depth of patchouli, the soothing embrace of sandalwood and an unexpected twist with the intriguing essence of gasoline, adding a touch of haziness to the composition.
Finally, the base notes of vanilla, tonka bean, white musks and amber close the composition with a lasting impact.
output: Route 66 by Soleil de Grce is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Route 66 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is zge Erdomu Altnel. Top notes are Spicy Notes, Cinnamon and Bergamot; middle notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli and Gasoline; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber, White Musk and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Nitro Intense  uma fragrncia ousada e dinmica que combina notas frutadas, picantes e amadeiradas. Suas notas de sada ricas e convidativas de groselha preta, bergamota, abacaxi, conhaque, canela e ameixa so seguidas por notas de corao de patchouli, btula, lavanda, pimenta, rosa, jasmim e mirra. As notas de base quentes e amadeiradas de mbar, almscar, baunilha, fava tonka e sndalo criam um acabamento cremoso e almiscarado que permanece na pele.
output: Nitro Intense by Dumont is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Nitro Intense was launched in 2023. Top notes are Pineapple, Black Currant, Plum, Cinnamon, Bergamot and Cognac; middle notes are Birch, Lavender, Patchouli, Myrrh, Pepper, Jasmine, Iris and Rose; base notes are Amber, Sandalwood, Musk, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The story of a Sicilian dynasty that has known glory, wealth and power.
Quattro Pizzi, the most iconic palace that was home to Palermos most symbolic and prominent families. A perfume reminiscent of the Belle poque era, where love, beauty and nobility entwine with secrecy and sin.
A juxtapose of sweet and spicy hits the senses on first spray with rum, davana and pink pepper, where the intoxicating notes of tuberose enchant and seduce at the heart, a sensual scent that lingers like a lover's forbidden touch on the skin long after the sun goes down.
Heat and passion unravel through the notes of this scented story ahead of Sicilys breathtakingly beautiful backdrop.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Rum, Davana, Pink Pepper , Coriander
Tuberose , Coconut
Hay, Blonde Leaf Tobacco , Tonka Bean
Available as 30ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Quattro Pizzi by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Quattro Pizzi was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sofia Bardelli. Top notes are Davana, Rum, Pink Pepper and Coriander; middle notes are Tuberose and Coconut; base notes are Hay, Tonka Bean and Tobacco Leaf.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Simple. Solar. Smiling. It is the scent of everlasting summer. Of holidays that never end. Of long lazy lunches with friends, out in the countryside, around a big wooden table. Of flowers that just keep on blooming.

Tender verdancy, pollen, honey from the linden tree with its lovely heart-shaped leaves, an emblem of softness and flexibility for the Celts. The honeyed, apricot inflexions of broom. The tender powder of heliotrope. A bucolic bouquet made still richer with a sprig of velvety jasmine Sambac. Underlined, like a stroke of shade intensifying the radiance of an afternoon in the sun, by the smoky earthiness of vetiver...

The first of a constellation of floral fragrances, Tilia is also, for its creator Marc-Antoine Barrois and his long-time accomplice, the perfumer Quentin Bisch, the name of an imaginary star. The one that shines on happy days. An ode to simplicity and optimism.
output: Tilia by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tilia was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lime (Linden) Blossom, Jasmine Sambac and Broom; middle notes are Heliotrope, Orange Blossom and Vetiver; base notes are Ambrofix and Georgywood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male Christmas Edition 2024 is a new collector's edition for men launched under the Le Male collection for a limited time. This holiday season, Jean Paul Gaultier has reinterpreted some of the most famous Renaissance art pieces and brought them to life in his beloved classics. Le Male EdT combines fresh mint with warm vanilla and intense lavender, creating a sensually masculine fragrance.
output: Le Male Collector Edition 2024 by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Male Collector Edition 2024 was launched in 2024. Top note is Lavender; middle note is Mint; base note is Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Erba Gold, a limited edition fragrance released in celebration of National Day, is an alluring amber scent crafted for both women and men. This unisex perfume, presented in a 50ml Eau de Parfum, is a captivating addition to any occasion or time.
The fragrance opens with a burst of Sicilian Orange, Calabrian Bergamot, and Sicilian Lemon, creating a vibrant and refreshing top note combination. As it develops, a delightful blend of fruits emerges, infusing the fragrance with a lively and enticing quality.
In the base, White Musk, Madagascar Vanilla, and Oriental come together, enveloping the senses with a warm and inviting aura. These base notes add depth, sensuality, and a touch of sophistication to the overall composition.
Erba Gold is a fragrance that captivates with its unique blend of notes, leaving a lasting impression wherever you go. Experience the allure of this limited edition scent and embrace its fascinating charm.
output: Erba Gold by Le Prestige is a fragrance for women and men. Erba Gold was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Wrapped in mystery and inspired by the land of its birth, this new creation encapsulates the scorching heat of the desert.
Like the crackling of the first flames of a bonfire, the fragrance opens with a sharp, airy note of spicy pepper that melds with incense to awaken the senses.
Slowly, the flames grow brighter, releasing thick, dense smoke. Myrrh and leather blend together to create this recognizable atmosphere, imparting the perfume with its character and charisma.
With time, the smoke will dissipate. Like an invisible fragrance, incense and tobacco continue to hover over the surrounding amber base, accentuated by a touch of vanilla. Reflecting the complexity and surprising contrasts of incense, this perfume perfectly embodies the many mysteries of its main ingredient.
output: Encens Precieux by Van Cleef & Arpels is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Encens Precieux was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Autumn winds skip across golden wheat fields. As the tall grasses billow, the rattle of husks beats a soft prairie lullaby, signalling to the weary sun to rest. In the fading light, tiny harvest mice venture forth, scrambling to gather seeds and fruits. For once the sun sinks fully beneath the horizon, its rule of the sky is bestowed on another. And when the coo of the owl breaks the night, the mice dash, trembling, back to their nests.
Like a countryside bathed in sweet sunlight, Harvest Mouse by Zoologist conjures images of home-baked goodness. Stalks of wheat sway among chamomile, davana and hay, and rich beer extracts are sobered by resins and woody notes. Cozy up in a warm nest of homespun scent.
output: Harvest Mouse by Zoologist Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Harvest Mouse was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Luca Maffei. Top notes are Chamomile, Clove, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Beer/Ale, Hay, Benzoin, Opoponax, Davana and Rose Oil; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Peru Balsam, Cedar, Balsam Fir and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Mayfair by Truefitt & Hill celebrates individuality with a blend of floral notes, reminiscent of carefree summer days. This modern interpretation of classic colognes opens with fresh top notes of lemon, mandarin, bergamot, and rosemary. The heart reveals jasmine, lavender, and neroli, closing with a subtle musk base.
output: Mayfair by Truefitt & Hill is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Mayfair was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bergamot, Rosemary, Lemon and Mandarin; middle notes are Neroli, Lavender and Jasmine; base note is Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Leather Malaki by Chopard is a fragrance inspired by incense and the main perfume ingredients of the Middle East. It opens with hints of bergamot and black pepper, followed by a mixture of cedar notes with woody and spicy nuances, emphasized by a leather accord, mineral, and smoky notes.
"The fragrance opens with a biting note of bergamot essence and black pepper, evoking an intensely aromatic breeze sweeping across the land. Alaskan cedar essence chiseled with woody, spiced traits lends structure and radiance to the leathery-mineral accord. This accord unveils a unique, profound olfactory duality wherein warm, smoky notes contrast with a compelling minerality. Created for modern wayfarers who are irresistibly drawn to wide-open spaces and dizzying heights, Leather Malaki is an exhilarating, boundless breath of life."
Available in 80ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Leather Malaki by Chopard is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Leather Malaki was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Dora Baghriche. Top notes are Bergamot and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cedar, Cypress and Spicy Notes; base notes are Leather, Mineral notes, Labdanum and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover Bois Pacifique, a spicy woody fragrance that embraces earthy woods and invigorating spices. Notes of silvery pink cardamom, fresh saffron and akigalawood warm the resin of fiery frankincense.
The vitality of incredibly strong and multifaceted woods  cedar, oak and sandalwood  is rooted in rich notes of amber and vanilla. Bois Pacifique is a journey to a sense of infinite freedom and vitality. The essence of cardamom is reminiscent of a sun-kissed glow. The exquisite akigalawood highlights fresh and aromatic notes of saffron in a blend of wood and spices that instantly evoke a fresh sensuality. As the scent of the perfume blends with the soft, calming and rich aroma of frankincense essence and orris butter, you will lose yourself in the majesty of nature. Edges of sandalwood, cedar and oak form the Bois Pacifique forest, a forest of impressive majesty illuminated by inspiring rays of sunlight radiating from the auspicious horizon.
Fragrance notes: Turmeric essence, Sandalwood essence, Oak absolute, Akigalawood, Cardamom essence, Frankincense essence.
output: Bois Pacifique by Tom Ford is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bois Pacifique was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Akigalawood and Turmeric; middle notes are Oak, Frankincense, Cedar, White Sandalwood and Iris; base notes are Amber and Vanilla.

output: Oud Essentiel by Guerlain is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Essentiel was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Celebrate 20 years of the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie with this special edition design, limited to only 150 bottles. Each will be signed and numbered by Roja Dove and includes a certificate of authentication.
An exciting new exclusive to the Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie, RDHP20 is a celebration in scented form. Created especially for our 20th Anniversary, this special new piece commemorates two decades of our mission to bring the cutting-edge of luxury perfumery to fragrance-lovers across the world.
As we enjoy this exciting milestone, we invite you to celebrate with us by enjoying an exuberant new composition. Like a dazzling visit to the Haute Parfumerie, a collection of 31 luxurious raw materials set the scene for scene for an Ambre accord as opulent and enduring as the boutique itself.
Luminous Citrus notes and Aldehydes which sparkle like our iconic chandeliers make a luminous first impression. A decadent blend of expensive Woods blend with pillowy base of Oriental and Vanilla to sink the senses into the plush surroundings of the shop. A finishing touch of Clear Woods - a unique material crafted from Patchouli Isolate - sign the hallmark of another pioneering new creation from Perfumer, Roja Dove.
An homage to an amazing 20 years with a bold vision of the future, RDHP20 is ready to enter the roaring 20's era for The Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie.
output: Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary by Roja Dove is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 20th Anniversary was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Lemon and Lime; middle notes are Jasmine, Geranium, Ylang Ylang, Magnolia, Freesia, Rose, Peach, Violet and Clary Sage; base notes are Musk, Amber, Sandalwood, Rhubarb, Clove, Transparent Woods, Frankincense, Patchouli, Cedar, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vanilla, Moss, Orris, Peru Balsam, Tonka Bean and Agarwood (Oud).

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Blu Mediterraneo Mandarino di Sicilia is a fragrance inspired by Sicily's sun-drenched landscapes, where architecture and culture merge with nature's splendor, encapsulating the Italian Arte di Vivere as a state of mind. The fragrance blends fresh, green notes of mandarin with a heart of Italian citrus, creating a lively and refreshing sensation.
The fragrance opens with the invigorating aroma of green mandarin, sparkling with an effervescent blend of bergamot, lemon, and juicy red orange. This combination wraps the scent in the brightness of a Sicilian summer, radiating intense emerald nuances and a lively freshness. In its heart, the green hue of the mandarin meets the freshness of the notes of petit-grain and spearmint in a blend that extends the fragrance's longevity. The cedarwood base note completes this green sensation, while the musk note adds a clean, sophisticated brilliance.
Green Mandarin, Bergamot, Lemon, Blood orange
Petitgrain, Spearmint
Patchouli, Cedarwood, Musk
output: Mandarino di Sicilia by Acqua di Parma is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mandarino di Sicilia was launched in 2024. Top notes are Green Mandarin, Blood Orange, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Petitgrain and Spearmint; base notes are Musk, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:

Fragrance Notes:

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Spritz those blues away with bergamot and green clover. Musk and rose sing from the hilltops: would one like to join? An eau de parfum borne from sunny days to have you dancing all night long.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Evoking the depth and warmth of red amber, AMBRE SUPERMASSIVE is inspired by the mystical beauty of this precious stone. Both fruity and spicy, this syrupy fragrance captures the imagination and captivates the senses. The scent of black vanilla and tobacco transcends space and time, leaving an infinite magnetic trail.
output: Ambre Supermassive by Les EAUX Primordiales is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Supermassive was launched in 2024. Ambre Supermassive was created by Arnaud Poulain and Studio Flair. Top notes are Cinnamon, Apple, Peach, Pineapple and Sesame; middle notes are Rum, Honey, Heliotrope, Rose and Cardamom; base notes are Amber, Vanila, Tobacco, Saffron and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Collection Les Ambres captures the most precious and emblematic elements of the Orient region through a sophisticated and contemporary olfactory alchemy. Inspired by the exceptional craftsmanship, cultural richness and unrivalled beauty of the Orient, this collection celebrates power and elegance through innovative and captivating olfactory compositions.
Created in four hands with Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie, each fragrance is a unique creation that blends multi-faceted amber with an avant-garde touch, offering a timeless sensory immersion.
Ambre Rubis Eau de Parfum by Houbigant, released in 2024, is classified as a fragrance for women and men and belongs to the Oriental family. The composition opens with notes of orange, incense, and pink pepper (red berries), followed by a heart of rum, cherry, and jasmine. The base consists of woody notes, cedar, grey amber, and fir resin (balsam).
output: Ambre Rubis by Houbigant is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Rubis was launched in 2024. Ambre Rubis was created by Luca Maffei and Antoine Lie. Top notes are Red Berries, Pink Pepper, Orange and Incense; middle notes are Cherry, Rum and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Woody Notes, Cedar and Fir Resin.

Discover the exceptional intensity of Ralphs Club Elixir. Grounded in the iconic woody sophistication of Ralphs Club reinterpreted to reveal a more intense and luxurious facet, Ralphs Club Elixir combines sensual notes refined through an intoxicating ambery quality.

The perfect fragrance for anyone who wants to stand out from the crowd and make a statement that lasts long after the night is over.

input:

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The intoxicating allure of Dark Chocolate, Hazelnut, and Walnut, mirrors the magnetic pull between two souls craving one another. In the heart, Orris Concrete, Benzoin Resin, and Cypriol Heart weave a tapestry of sophistication and passion. The base notes of Oud Assafi, Sandalwood Spicatum, and Sensual Musks lingers, creating an indelible trail, like the lingering touch of a lover.
Dark Chocolate, Hazelnut, Walnut,
Orris Concrete, Benzoin Resin, Cypriol Heart
Oud Assafi, Sandalwood Spicatum, Sensual Musks
output: Lust Oud Delice by Chris Collins is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lust Oud Delice was launched in 2024. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Welcome on board!
The new sailor Le Male Elixir will induce burning cravings and drive your senses crazy. Burning desire spreads with the irresistible notes of fresh lavender, warming tonka bean, and gentle benzoin. With a gilded torso, this fiery novelty from Jean Paul Gaultier embodies radiant power and seductive charisma.
It is finished! You melt away with burning desire.
This intense fragrance ignites the fire of the senses on his upper body and gives the soft skin a burning sensuality. After a refreshing breeze of mint, the tide rises to addiction, becoming a glowing elixir. In this breath of fresh air, dashing lavender quickly takes on lusty proportions, enhanced by the balsamic richness of benzoin with syrupy vanilla accents. The tonka bean trumps with its warm and sweet tones between honey and tobacco. The time has come: You jump!
Radiant at first sight, glowing with masculinity, more fiery than ever. The torso is bursting with muscles, the skin is bathed in copper color by the sinking sun. What a Gaultier body... what accomplished style. Finely chiseled grooves stand out on its muscles dipped in gold and merge with the amber stripes of the sailor shirt, which plays with transparency effects in a highly sexy way.
Available as 75ml and 125ml Parfum.
output: Le Male Elixir by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Male Elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lavender and Mint; middle notes are Vanilla and Benzoin; base notes are Honey, Tonka Bean and Tobacco.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Max Philip Cyan is a fragrance that delicately balances strength with freshness, creating a captivating aura of sophistication. It opens with the marine richness of ambergris and the enchanting floral notes of jasmine, setting a luminous and engaging tone. The heart introduces a refined blend of orris and violet, weaving together a powdery floral sophistication that is both delicate and commanding. Completing the sensory journey, the scent settles into a base of elderflower and musk, adding a burst of freshness that is charged with an invigorating energy.
output: Cyan by Max Philip is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cyan was launched in 2024. Top notes are Ambergris and Jasmine; middle notes are Orris and Violet; base notes are Musk and Black Elder.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"A Sensual Shot of Provocation. It set its sights on the erogenous VANILLA BEAN, electrified by PINK PEPPER, drenched in a draught of COGNAC, before finally succumbing to the intoxicating swirls of a cigar. A cheeky twist of plump and juicy CHERRY celebrates the indulgence of a polished proposition."
Available as 90ml EDP.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Orpheus is an herbal, boozy and slightly smoky citrus-incense-tobacco fragrance, perfect for fall. Composed in 2013 and completed more recently, it features bitter orange, blood orange, bergamot, lemon, mate, spray paint, sage, ginger, frankincense, myrrh, tobacco, cedar, amber, white musks and subtle shadings of rose, carnation and tuberose. As with many earlier CL compositions its complex enough that the individual notes blend seamlessly into the character of the fragrance, which leans traditionally masculine.
output: Orpheus by Clandestine Laboratories is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Orpheus was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mark Sage.

input:
Each notes of this perfume evokes the rich history and culture of Cuba.  It embodies the feeling of passion, romance and sexiness. Each notes of this perfume evokes the rich history and culture of Cuba.  It embodies the feeling of passion, romance and sexiness. Taking you on an olfactory journey across the enchanting island.
Lavender, Italian Mandarin, Cherry, Almond

Vanilla, Oriental, Musk

Sweet, Honey, Tobacco, Oriental, Vanilla, Patchouli, Woody

Top notes are Almond, Cherry, Italian Mandarin and Lavender; middle notes are Honey, Cashmere Wood, Heliotrope and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: As Skydive develops, a hint of Pink Sugar sweetens the air, echoing the pleasure of sipping your favorite refreshing drink while gazing at the endless horizon. An enduring Sea Mist blends with the earthy notes of Vetiver, enveloping you in a fresh, verdant embrace that grounds your senses. Inspired by relaxing afternoons spent outdoors as hummingbirds dart and butterflies flit among the wildflowers, Skydive is a sensorial journey through beautiful spring days, where the sky stretches limitlessly, and the comforting warmth of sun is ever-present.
output: Skydive by Gallagher Fragrances is a Floral Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Skydive was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Gallagher.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"The women and men in these pages are lovers and brawlers, bullfighters and boxers, soft talkers and hard drinkers. They inhabit dusty Spanish villages and dank, dark brothels. At the heart of these unforgettable characters is a determined and undying passion that pushes them to make extraordinary decisions in the face of fear. Their fates are varied but the outcome is always the same, these are stories that grip you by the throat and dont let go until you profess your devotion. Seductive and steadfast, this classic is not for the faint of heart but for the full of heart."
NOTES: Geranium, Spanish Rose, Patchouli, Black Musk, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Bulls Blood.
"No other fragrance in our line balances brutality and elegance like this beast. Ignore the glares, take the bull by horns, and show the world whos boss. "
Available in 50ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Bull's Blood 2nd Edition by Imaginary Authors is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bull's Blood 2nd Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Oud has always been the favorite perfume of the heroes of ancient mythologies due to its scarcity, difficulty in extracting it and its magical scent. That is why the perfumer, Ibrahim Al Zouabi, used to call it the liquid gold.
On a cold Swedish winter night, while the perfumer was sitting by the fireplace and reading an ancient myth, he decided to design a warm fragrance that reduces stress, calms the heartbeat, restores inner peace, and stimulates the hormones of happiness. At the same time, it's inspired by the scent of princes, kings, and nobles of the Middle Ages.
He planned to build an Oud fragrance, but with a unique and different feeling from all the existing Oud perfumes. The blending of jasmine and saffron with Bulgarian roses and amber, in addition to oud, musk, and vanilla, took the fragrance to a sensual, imaginative, exciting, and attractive space, to be the new imaginary woody perfume from the house of Pana Dora.
output: Oud Republic by Pana Dora is a Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Republic was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ibrahim Al Zoabi. Top notes are Saffron, Jasmine, Thyme, Graperfuit and Geranium; middle notes are Woody Notes, Rose, Amber, Lavender, Cardamom and Cypress; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Amber, Vanilla, Fir Resin, Sandalwood, Cedar, Musk and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Experience a symphony of fiery passions & tranquil breezes as delicate rose & juniper meet fiery black pepper and cinnamon, entwined with amber, musk, vetiver & patchouli, inviting you to savour the epic allure of Chilli Woods .
Top notes: Bergamot Italy, Pink Pepper, Black Pepper, Raspberry
Middle notes: Rose, Juniper, Cinnamon, Cedarwood
Base notes: Vetiver Haiti, Oakmoss Abs, Patchouli Indonesia, Labdanum, Oriental, Musk

WIDIAN Luxury Black hard box with laser cut front pattern, with an outer artistic box.
output: Granada by WIDIAN is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Granada was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Hamid Merati-Kashani. Top notes are Bergamot, Pink Pepper, Black Pepper and Raspberry; middle notes are Juniper, Cinnamon, Cedarwood and Rose; base notes are Oakmoss, Amber, Patchouli, Vetiver, Musk and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The green and intoxicating notes of the Chiribasa valley lost among the peaks of the Himalayas, a few kilometers from Gomukh where the sources of the Ganges are located, mix with the surrounding environment creating a green, spicy, incensed and evocative mixture.
Atmayatra, a word composed of two Sanskrit terms Atma (soul) and Yatra (pilgrimage) wants to evoke a pilgrimage of the soul, a fragrance that is "not comfortable" and not simple, but certainly unique and memorable.
The green and sumptuous notes of an invigorating Holy Basil Tulsi and cannabis;
green plants that grow freely in the landscape of northern India, mix with the muddy smell of the Ganges river and notes of rain. Evolution then gives a glacial Himalayan storm that is released on these aromatic scents cooked by the sun. It is said that BABAJI still lives in those places, a hundred-year-old Sadhu who is said to have the power of immortality and guards the secrets of Vedic science.
output: Atmayatra by Spiritica is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Atmayatra was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Basil, Ozonic notes, Peppermint, Aquatic notes and Cardamom; middle notes are cannabis, Basil, Petrichor, Rain Notes, Frankincense and Benzoin; base notes are Earthy Notes, Patchouli, Vanilla, Mud, Mysore Sandalwood and Honey.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Kajal IV is a celebration of nomadic exoticism, echoing the wilderness of the African Savannah. An inviting opening reveals the mysterious warmth of Davana Gaze, infused with a vibrant blend of Cassis, Rum, and cardamom. At the heart, the exotic sweetness of Jasmine and Palm flowers merge deliciously with a tranquil Leather richness. The base notes lead to a wild, natural paradise where lush palm trees bear delectable Kholas Dates, adding a fruity freshness to a seductively charismatic combination of Musk, Woods, and Vanilla.
TOP NOTES
Davana, cardamom, cassis, rum
HEART NOTES
Jasmine, leather, palm flower
BASE NOTES
Kholas dates, musk, wood notes, vanilla
output: Kajal IV by Kajal is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Kajal IV was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Kevin Mathys. Top notes are Davana, Cardamom, Rum and Cassis; middle notes are Leather, Palm Tree and Jasmine; base notes are Dates, Vanilla, Woody Notes and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Encapsulating the essence of writing elegance, the iconic Meisterstck writing instrument inspires a captivating fragrance. Black Meisterstck eau de parfum embodies sophistication and grandeur with noble incense and spicy notes, amplified by the captivating sensuality of ambery notes.
output: Black Meisterstuck by Montblanc is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Black Meisterstuck was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernndez. Top note is Incense; middle note is Amber; base note is Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Drawing inspiration from the Autumn/Winter fashion collection of 2010-2011, imagine a lush, enchanting garden named "Le Beau Paradise Garden" and "La Belle Paradise," a haven of intense delights and fervent desires.
Picture a bottle of striking beauty: an emerald-green glass ornately embroidered with a vibrant vine leaf, boasting exquisite, high-fashion details. This alluring, unclothed bottle is impossible to overlook, inviting you to succumb to its charm.
This bottle is a masterpiece, unforgettable in its presence. It's like a tropical beacon, with a Couture-styled embroidered vine leaf artfully obscuring a secret garden where the naked, emerald-green bottle resides. Its magnetic allure draws you into the depths of a hypnotizing and sensuous masculine scent, both mysterious and compelling.
This fragrance is a woody, green aquatic symphony crafted by Quentin Bisch. It encapsulates the heavenly essence of a tropical paradise, replete with radiant flowers and alluring aromas directly from the Garden of Gaultier. The scent intertwines fresh, salty coconut with green fig and the warmth of sandalwood. Accents of spicy ginger, refreshing mint, and sun-warmed Tonka bean add to the fragrance's green aquatic and woody notes, perfectly embodying the passion of the vigorous men who embrace it.
LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN will be available as 75ml and 125ml Eau de Parum.
output: Le Beau Paradise Garden by Jean Paul Gaultier is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Beau Paradise Garden was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Green Notes, Watery Notes, Mint and Ginger; middle notes are Coconut, Fig and Salt; base notes are Tonka Bean and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Ex Nihilo's Speed Legends Night Drive perfume is inspired by the thrill of high-speed racing, reflecting the adrenaline-fuelled rush in olfactory form through invigorating bergamot, vetiver, and tonka bean. This rendition, produced in collaboration with photographer RIOCAM, puts a twist on the scent with sensual notes of wood and amber, embodying the thrilling cinematic views of a midnight race.
output: Speed Legends Night Drive by Ex Nihilo is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Speed Legends Night Drive was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernndez. Top notes are Bergamot, Sage, Ginger and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Labdanum and Blackcurrant; base notes are Patchouli, Amberwood, Tonka Bean and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
It is the encounter with the extraordinary, like what happens through the grotesques of the Domus Aurea Raffaello ee Emperor Nero. There is genius and recklessness in this fragrance which is particularly suitable for those who love beauty and excess.
In this essence "excesses and madness" are exalted with the use of raw materials, often in "overdoses". This is the case for the fruity and sugary accord that accompanies the entire composition... and for the warm, sweet and animalic base.
Top notes: Coconut, Saffron, Raspberry.
Heart notes: Cane Sugar, Tonka Bean, Maracuja.
Base notes: Vanilla, Oud, Leather.
output: Nerone by Pantheon Roma is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Nerone was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Arturetto Landi. Top notes are Raspberry, Saffron and Coconut; middle notes are Passionfruit, Tonka Bean and Sugar Cane; base notes are Leather, Oud and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Guerlain launches Tobacco Honey in September 2023 as a part of the  L'Art & La Matire collection. The fragrance combines delicious amber tobacco accord with vanilla, tonka bean, and sesame, that come alive under the glow of intoxicating honey, enhanced by clove and anise accord. At the base, the precious accord reinforces its trail with woody notes combining the creamy softness of sandalwood and the power of oud wood.
"I've wanted to combine honey and tobacco for a long time. On the one hand, we have the dried tobacco leaves with their swirls of powdery aroma; on the other, we have honey as a delicious, enveloping nectar," said Delphine Jelk, Perfumer and Creative Director at Guerlain.
Available in 100ml and 200ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Tobacco Honey by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tobacco Honey was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Honey, Cloves and Anise; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Tonka and Sesame; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Creed Centaurus is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024 as part of The Oriental Universe collection. This amber, spicy fragrance begins with an opulent, spicy blast of cardamom, smoky tobacco, fiery cinnamon, and a dash of black pepper. The heart is composed of a heady bouquet of jasmine, heliotrope, and geranium elevated by creamy sandalwood and earthy patchouli. The blend nestles on a robust, woodsy base of ambroxan, benzoin, tolu balsam, and bourbon vanilla, creating an irresistible, long-lasting scent trail.
output: Centaurus by Creed is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Centaurus was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cinnamon, Tobacco, Cardamom and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli, Heliotrope, Geranium and Jasmine; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Benzoin, Tolu Balsam, Tonka Bean and Ambroxan.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Light Blue Summer Vibes reinvents the two iconic fragrances for him and her. Made in Italy  using only the highest quality raw materials, these fragrances are brought to life by the  craftsmanship and attention to detail inherent in Dolce&Gabbanas DNA, characterized by  the majolica print that embellishes the iconic bottles.
A creation of the famous nose Alberto Morillas, the Light Blue Summer Vibes Pour Homme fragrance,  which is part of the woody aquatic aromatic fragrances family, boasts an aromatic freshness thanks  to an infusion of Cypress and an additional note of Sicilian Lemon that gives it a sharp but sweet  liveliness. As a finishing touch, the pleasant woody warmth of amber.
Light Blue Summer Vibes comes in an elegant rectangular glass bottle, while Light Blue Summer Vibes  Pour Homme comes in a trapezoidal bottle with soft lines. Both feature the classic silhouette of Light  Blue fragrances and are embellished with a white cap.
The campaign is an homage to spontaneity and passion. The protagonists, the iconic couple Bianca Balti and David Gandy under the shade of the Faraglioni amidst the crystal-clear waters surrounding the spellbinding Capri Island. From the boat to the shore, right up to the sun-drenched terrace steeped in scents of lemon trees, the couple shares intimate moments of smiles, jokes, and passion. An intense and profound attraction that captures the energy of summer on the seaside. Director Steve Brahms unveils intimate glimpses of a shared life full of tenderness and love with the notes of the song Parlami damore Mari in the background.
output: Light Blue Pour Homme Summer Vibes by Dolce&Gabbana is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Light Blue Pour Homme Summer Vibes was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top note is Sicilian Lemon; middle note is Cypress; base note is Amberwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A fresh coastal breeze with a cedar accent.
Theres a paradoxical feeling one gets from staring at the ocean. Surveying the immense power and chaos of waves crashing on the shore somehow lends a sense of peace.
Our fragrance Kiawah is also a study in dichotomy, with the warm scent of Virginia Cedar blending perfectly with the crisp scent of cool ocean tides. The combination is accented with clean Citrus and smooth Oriental.
Lemon Rind & Marine Notes
Cedar & Balsam
Oriental & Clove
output: Kiawah by Fulton & Roark is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Kiawah was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lemon and Marine notes; middle notes are Cedar and Balsam Fir; base notes are Amber and Cloves.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Carolina Herrera Bad Boy Sparkling Ice is a new fragrance for men launched in 2024 in a limited edition. This aromatic woody perfume balances light and dark elements, resulting in a unique and energizing olfactory experience. The fragrance opens with a burst of citrus freshness, which gradually gives way to deeper, more intense woody notes. This contrast between bright and earthy tones not only enhances the wearer's presence but also adds a distinctive character to the scent, making it both dynamic and memorable. It's a composition designed to elevate your personality and leave a lasting impression.
output: Bad Boy Sparkling Ice by Carolina Herrera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bad Boy Sparkling Ice was launched in 2024. Top notes are Grapefruit and White Pepper; middle notes are Clary Sage and Vetiver; base notes are Cocoa and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mane, hooves, neighing, galloping, jumping Kicking. Kick the animal's ass for a punchy scent. It is all the passion of the horse that distills this exceptional perfume built around an excess of natural oud wood.
A souvenir scent, that of returning to the stables after a weekend of show jumping competitions. A discipline that Marc-Antoine Corticchiato has practiced for a long time, and which he evokes here  the adrenaline of competition, the joy of returning to the stable
A perfume-universe, that of the equestrian world, when the horses have been taken down from the truck and return to their box. We then take the canteens from the van, these large trunks from which a mixture of strong animal odors emerge: leather from the harness and gaiters, saliva from the bits, sweat from the saddle cloths, tar with which we coat the hooves, remains of straw and hay on the blankets...
To capture the scent of opening the trunks, Marc-Antoine chose the most difficult material in perfumery: the essence of oud wood. Distilled since the year 1000, its fragrant resin results from an attack on the Aquilaria wood, after a very slow process evolving over several decades. This sumptuous liquid gold, used here in overdose, then displays all its panache.
Wild floral, narcissus exalts the insolent character of Ruade with its mane note and its straw effects. The absolute of cut hay lends its power to the evocation of hay fetuses whose scent saturates the air and panics the horses.
An intrepid perfume with precious materials in overdose, saturated with animality and rebellious like a kick.
output: Ruade by Parfum d'Empire is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ruade was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marc-Antoine Corticchiato.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Lattafa His Confession Eau De Parfum Spray for Men is a bold and captivating fragrance that embodies modern masculinity. It opens with a refreshing and spicy blend of mandarin, cinnamon, and lavender, creating an invigorating introduction that immediately commands attention. As the fragrance develops, it reveals a rich heart of iris, cypress, and benzoin, adding depth and sophistication. The composition is grounded by a warm and sensual base of vanilla, tonka beans, patchouli, cedarwood, incense, and amber, leaving a lasting and memorable impression. His Confession combines freshness with warmth, making it versatile for any occasion, whether day or night. This fragrance is the perfect choice for men who seek to exude confidence, elegance, and a touch of mystery, ensuring they make a statement wherever they go.

Top Notes: Mandarin, Cinnamon and Lavender

Middle Notes: Iris, Cypress, Benzoin and Mahonial

Base Notes: Vanilla, Tonka Beans, Patchouli, Cedarwood, Incense and Amber
output: His Confession by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. His Confession was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cinnamon, Lavender and Mandarin; middle notes are Iris, Benzoin, Cypress and Mahonial; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka, Amber, Cedarwood, Incense and Patchouli.

output: Kashmir by Ormonde Jayne is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Kashmir was launched in 2024. Kashmir was created by Linda Pilkington and Geza Schoen. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Come with us to the deep past, when the royal palaces of the Russian Empire were surrounded by naked nature and hand-made houses and barns in the wilderness. This is a civet and oud driven floriental chypre that takes us to the wildest corners of our history.
Top notes: mandarin leaves, vintage Indian civet, and artemisia
Heart notes: co-distillation of several flowers, including palmarosa, rose, jasmine, tagetes, and champaka
Base notes: black truffles, fresh Ethiopian civet, tonka beans, vanilla, Bhutan oud oil, hay absolute, and cedarwood
output: Royal Barn by Areej Le Dor is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Royal Barn was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Tonka bean and solar musk create a warm, skin-to-skin contact vibe, while whipped vanilla adds a touch of sweetness. This amber floral fragrance transitions seamlessly from hazy days to heated, sensual nights.
output: Solar Aura by Deck of Scarlet is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Solar Aura was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I barely remember small fragments of those frosty winter days, with the snow as you can only see today. It was my first vacation as a schoolboy, back home in my childhood village with my grandparents. I was just a child who was just beginning life with shy steps, not knowing that soon the great storm of change will spread over the whole country. An old radio placed on one of the walls of our old room, where we sat by the stove, told us about the street fights from all over the country. All I remember is a big snowman I made in the yard with charcoal eyes, a morocov nose and the old store in the village of the cooperative. An old house with a high ground floor and old wooden counters dulled by time and dusty, which for me seemed like a paradise from another world. It was the first year when I saw and ate oranges and chocolate, which I kept on our old dresser, and for me they were worth their weight in gold. Those smells remained imprinted in my memory, being transposed now in an olfactory journey like no other.
Life passes, the beautiful moments and everything we once loved with them disappear in the mist of time.
output: Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir by Adi Ale Van is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Top notes are Apple, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Vanilla Bean and Hazelnut; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Vanilla Absolute and Rum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

D Red is offered in 30, 50, and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: D Red by Diesel by Diesel is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. D Red by Diesel was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Marypierre Julien. Top note is Blood Grapefruit; middle note is Lavender; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Floridia leads us to the ancient thermal baths of Baia, with precious marble tubs, precious mosaics and regenerating waters to make us relive thousand-year-old purification rituals. The fragrance opens its curtain between the spicy notes of cardamom and the queen of flowers of the Roman Empire: the Gallic rose. In the heart, the presence of archaic essences such as cistus and resins fade into the sweetness of tonka bean. At the end of the olfactory journey we find a veil of eucalyptus, pungent enough and lively musky notes.
The perfume evokes the favorite places of those who want to relax the mind and remove stress.
output: Thermae Imperiali by Floridia Parfum is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Thermae Imperiali was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giovanni Festa. Top notes are Cardamom and Rose; middle notes are Cedar, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Labdanum; base notes are Olibanum Sacra Resin Green, Ambrette and Musk.

A touch of white musk adds a modern touch, while the raw woody quality of sandalwood wraps the fragrance in a comforting embrace.
output: Vetiver Glacier by Montblanc is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vetiver Glacier was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top note is Vetiver; middle note is Juniper; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The Feeling: Leaning back into an Adirondack chair by the lake, you crack open a craft IPA and breathe in the fresh mountain air. Your perfectly worn denim jacket beams under the sun. Surrounded by trees, nature, and good friends is where you feel the most at-home.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Dolce is the melody you can't stop listening to.
An irresistible combination of luscious fruit and floral notes with a sweet touch. The debut of sparkling Mandarin, tasty Saffron and juicy orange hints at something more mysterious. In the dreamy heart, where Rose creates a fresh and willing invitation to creamy white notes of Jasmine and Gardenia, a delicious Blackcurrant weaves its way out of the shadows. It induces the sensuality of Sandalwood and Vanilla into a sirens song, while whispers of White Musk dance around to create a deep base which enables the sweetness to resonate softly throughout the day.
A sweet scent from which there is no escape.
Top Notes: Mandarin, Orange, Saffron
Heart Notes: Rose, Jasmine, Gardenia, Pear, Blackcurrant
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Vanilla, White Musk
output: Dolce Melodia by Sospiro Perfumes is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Dolce Melodia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange and Saffron; middle notes are Pear, Black Currant, Gardenia, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, White Musk and Sandalwood.

input: "This unique blend creates a scent that is both sophisticated and exotic, evocative of the vibrant culture and rich traditions of the Dominican Republic. It's the perfect scent for those who love the warmth and depth of amber, but are looking for something a little more unique and memorable".
output: mbar Dominicano by Day Three is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. mbar Dominicano was launched in 2023. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

This scent is an invitation to journey into the dark, where musk seamlessly blends with spices like cinnamon and cardamom. Accompanied by a light amber accord, it leaves an enchanting scent trail that wraps the wearer in its allure.
output: Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum by Dior is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Nuit Esprit De Parfum was launched in 2024.
