instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
THE MINERAL SHORES OF MASIRAH
A dream of faraway. Sundrenched horizons, empty lands, the mineral tang of Sichuan Pepper, the pulsing radiance of Ginger and a whiff of sea spray that altogether smell like the promise of breaking free from the world.
On a desert island, wrought of golden Myrrh and Frankincense, a silhouette lies beneath the sun, beneath the sky. A waft of suntan skin catches you unaware, a whiff of Fenugreek, like maple sweet, more gourmand than summer.
It beckons you closer. The warmth sunsets, the saltiness of Myrrh and Frankincense absolutes appears at last under maroon strikes of Benzoin and Labdanum.
A song of salty incense, of mineral warmth and summer meditations, Lineage is the scent of travelling far from home to get closer to yourself.
output: Lineage by Amouage is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lineage was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Vinchon Spehner. Top notes are Ginger, Sichuan Pepper, Peruvian Pepper and Saffron; middle notes are Olibanum, Myrrh and Fenugreek; base notes are Olibanum, Myrrh, Labdanum, Benzoin, Vetiver and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bold, vibrant scent for the man who dares to dream. A captivating blend of woods and citrus fruits ignites a spark, giving a fresh meaning to vitality.
Ralph Lauren Polo 67 Eau de Toilette exudes sensitivity infused with radiance and warmth. It begins with refreshing notes of bergamot, cedar, and pineapple. The core notes of the fragrance are the warmth of the sun and addiction, contrasting with aromatic juniper and fragrant sage notes. Earthy whispers of aromatic vetiver and patchouli chords envelop, leaving a powerful and refined trace. When greatness calls, respond confidently.
This elegant fragrance features five sustainably sourced ingredients: bergamot, lavender, juniper, sage essence, and Haitian vetiver.
output: Polo 67 by Ralph Lauren is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Polo 67 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Pineapple, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Sage, Juniper and Rose Hip; base notes are Vetiver, Patchouli and Goldenrod.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Untouched skin, swirling incense, rejuvenating rain, a primal and refined experience."

An aromatic and spicy fragrance featuring a spark of bergamot that seamlessly intertwines with the richness of leather.
output: LTH/02 Leather Freestyle by Zara is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. LTH/02 Leather Freestyle was launched in 2023. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Spices; base note is Leather.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Exemplified by Christian Dior's iconic Bar suit of 1947, the New Look revolutionized fashion with its bold and elegant silhouette. Today, Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Parfum Creative Director, has reinvented this precious legacy as a daring Dior perfume for women and men, born of a bold creative approach that pushes the traditional boundaries of the amber fragrance.

Composed by Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, the New Look olfactory silhouette revolves around an amber note and a fresh, highly concentrated aldehyde note. A vibrant frankincense accord envelops this new luxury perfume creation from La Collection Prive Christian Dior.
KEY NOTES:
Aldehydes, frankincense, ambery accord
"More than a legacy, more than a silhouette, the New Look is a state of mind, a way of viewing and reinterpreting the world. This powerful mindset has transcended time. True to Christian Dior who wanted Dior perfume to be an olfactory mirror of his couture, I strove to retain this perfect symbiosis between fashion and fragrance with incredible daring. I wanted to create a Dior fragrance that echoes the spirit, nuances and essence of the New Look today."
Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior
Available as 125ml and 250ml Eau de Parfum.
output: New Look 2024 by Dior is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. New Look 2024 was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Aldehydes; middle note is Frankincense; base note is Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The ozonic theme corresponds to the style and artistic vision of Francesca Bianchi. The perfume has a fresh and cheerful aspect, but also complex and dramatic. The ozonic accord works thanks to the strong presence of amber. The transparency of the ozonic chord is converted into an opaque and iris into an opaque and dense note by the iris and has an almost sacred and mystical character evoked by elemi and incense.
This unisex fragrance is fresh and transparent on the one hand and dense and structured on the other. The citrus and ozonic opening has a crisp and modern character, enhanced by the sharp edge of the aldehydes.
output: The Mariner's Rhyme by Francesca Bianchi is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Mariner's Rhyme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francesca Bianchi. Top notes are elemi, Bergamot, Grapefruit and Lavender; middle notes are Ozonic notes, Iris and Orange Blossom; base notes are Oakmoss, Frankincense, Patchouli and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Fire of God is a luxurious fragrance that captures the transformative power of flame and light, inspired by the mythical Aztec deity of fire and illumination, Xiuhtecuhtli. The scent opens with sun-kissed mango, zesty lemon, and playful rosy berries, complemented by a touch of invigorating ginger. As it evolves, azure coumarin and jasmine add a mysterious and sensual bloom, while aged woods provide a grounding presence. The core features rich oud, intertwined with earthy nagarmotha and soft musk, enhanced by warm golden amber.
output: Fire of God by Alexandria Fragrances is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fire of God was launched in 2023. Top notes are Mango, Red Berries, Ginger and Lemon; middle notes are Coumarin and Jasmine; base notes are Oud, Amber, Musk and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the quote Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames by Rumi, FAN YOUR FLAMES, launched in 2016, is another global hit of NISHANE. Underlining the desire of people to be surrounded by the friends who would encourage them no matter what they want to do with their life, the original formula offers a blend of notes that evoke a warm and inviting atmosphere. The new offering FAN YOUR FLAMES X is designed to soften the flames of the original bestseller by a gentle touch of tropical flavors.
The fragrance opens with a combination of coconut, rum, and lentisque, which gives off a sweet and tropical vibe. The heart of the fragrance features a mix of tobacco, tonka bean, and thyme oil, which creates a rich and spicy aroma. The base notes consist of cedar, oakmoss, and patchouli, which provide a woody and earthy finish to the fragrance. This scent is a great choice for those who love warm and comforting fragrances with a touch of exoticism.
TOP NOTES
coconut - rum - lentisque
HEART NOTES
tobacco - tonka bean - thyme oil - carrot
BASE NOTES
cedar- oakmoss - patchouli
output: Fan Your Flames X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Fan Your Flames X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Miroslav Petkov. Top notes are Coconut, Rum and Mastic or Lentisque; middle notes are Tobacco, Tonka Bean, Carrot and Thyme; base notes are Patchouli, Cedar and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity  the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Best described as the olfactory equivalent of gold, Aurum is as decadent as its name sake. Irresistibly romantic and seductive, tempting rose, chocolate and strawberry all conjure the most sensual notes. Like the most precious metal from which it takes its name, Aurum captivates and entices as it warms against the skin, revealing hints of its opulent character as time goes by.
OLFACTORY NOTES
output: Aurum by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aurum was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bulgarian Rose, Brazilian Orange, Calabrian bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Chocolate, Strawberry, Incense and Labdanum; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Madagascar Vanilla, Oakmoss, Singapore Patchouli and Heliotrope.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Jupiters immense satellite has not only inspired our perfumes name, but is also known to be full of craters and to have an underground ocean vaster than all of earths oceans put together. The perfumes creators, Marc-Antoine Barrois and Quentin Bisch, have imagined it here in a world with an atmosphere brimming with aromatics that it becomes combustible: its sky is gleaming with the sour spike of mandarin and the holy fumaroles of incense and myrrh. Its a planet covered with warm velvet dunes where the spicy and caramelized everlasting flower is preponderant. The fiery heart of this fragrance reminds us that the gods gave Ganymede eternal life so that his beauty would never fade. Is it the smoldering skin hidden underneath the wild leather? This precious perfume extract is as much a sophisticated perfume as a carnal one.
Ganymede EXTRAIT unfolds in its dizzying trail the seduction of great Classics.
The sound of the waves from far away. The wind is sweeping a field of everlasting flowers. The sun takes out its right and heats the spicy, almost syrupy scent of these yellow flowers. The waves are caressing the dune.
The wind picks up the sand into warm, leathery, heady gusts- incense, myrrhe? Grains of sand are twirling, incandescent. The rock is flushing, the Akigalawood and Mandarin bring minerals and freshness. The air becomes captivating.
output: Ganymede Extrait by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ganymede Extrait was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Incense, Myrrh and Mandarin Orange; middle note is Immortelle; base notes are Akigalawood and Safraleine.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Les Abstraits - Des Cendres (from ashes). Des Cendres symbolizes a newly invigorated self, represented by a
symphony of brisk woods, sumptuous florals, and animalic leather. Rising from the ashes of pain and loss, a new person emerges, like a phoenix. Des Cendres was inspired by the connection to wild life, finding myself in nature among trees, flowing water, and animals, says Les Abstraits founder and creative director Eugen. The harmony of nature, I learned, could be reflected within.

Des Cendres starts off with a green herbal blast of violet leaf and fresh tuberose cut with bracing galbanum and anise. The tuberose mellows into velvety, sensual lushness, settling onto a bed of smoky, resinous birch tar and leather, with a judicious visitation by hyraceum.
Everything we need, Des Cendres seems to say, is already right here. - A note from the brand.
output: Des Cendres by Les Abstraits is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Des Cendres was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Lie. Top notes are Pine tar, Galbanum, Birch Tar, Mint and Clove; middle notes are Leather, Violet Leaf and Tuberose; base notes are Oakmoss, Hyrax, Vetiver and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover the captivating allure of Tabac Du Jour, a sophisticated blend that evokes warmth and depth. At its heart lies rich tobacco absolute, renowned for its lush, earthy aroma that brings a sense of comfort and nostalgia.
Complementing this is the bold essence of Rum C02, which adds a sweet, spirited twist, inviting you to savor the richness of aged oak and caramel notes.
As the fragrance unfolds, the subtle sweetness of dried fruits emerges, enhancing the complexity with hints of sun-ripened figs and apricots. Together, these elements create a harmonious balance, enveloping you in an indulgent, velvety embrace that lingers throughout the day.
Notes:

Base: Ambergris Infusion (House Made), Rum C02, Cinnamon C02, Tonka Bean Abs, Bee Propolis Infusion (House Made), Thai Oud (Koh Chang), Castoreum Abs
output: Tabac du Jour by Aromas de Salazar is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tabac du Jour was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Salazar. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
ANI was the first reference launched in 2019 under the new theme NO BOUNDARIES that aimed to eliminate all emotional boundaries between people. The fragrance immediately became a global hit being often mentioned as the best vanilla scent ever. With ANI X, NISHANE wanted to enhance this mystical journey through time that the fans had with ANI, a fragrance that pays homage to an ancient metropolis that now stands as a monument to the might of empires and the inevitability of time. Just like the original bestseller, ANI X aims to break down boundaries and to empower the wearers to build their own empire from the ruins. In an attempt to reach the perfume lovers who specifically seek for the refreshening aspect of the scent, ANI X was designed to open with a richer burst of juicy citrus than the original formula of ANI. The freshness that the wearer will feel with the new ANI X on top of the well-known vanilla excellence of the original ANI will be a nice surprise for the perfume lovers.
ANI X is a fragrance with true heritage to its name, and invites you to explore how to eliminate the boundaries of time and space, to create your own empire even when all that remains is nothing but the ruins. So spray on ANI X, let the fragrance take you on a journey through the ages, and embrace the power of history in a bottle.
TOP NOTES
bergamot oil - lemon oil - watery notes - honeydew melon - cardamom oil - blue ginger - pink pepper
HEART NOTES
lavender oil - sage - green apple - blackcurrant - rose - patchouli
BASE NOTES
cedarwood - cashmere wood - vanilla - ambergris infusion - white musk - sandalwood
output: Ani X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ani X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ccile Zarokian. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot, Melon, Ginger, Cardamom, Water Notes and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Green Apple, Black Currant, Patchouli, Lavender, Sage and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Cashmere Wood, Ambergris, White Musk and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Pompelmo has taken my olfactory journey inspired to Italian Citruses to the end.
Born in Asia, where considered a sacred fruit to be offered to Gods, Grapefruit, as most citrus fruits, first appeared in Spain, in Seville, around the XII-XIII century during the Arab domination.
Probably, one of the greatest citruses, I particularly appreciate Grapefruit for its bitter flavour.
Unlike sweet scents which I find to be obvious and uninspiring, bitter represents, in my opinion, one of the brightest scents. This may be the result of my Italian background, where several beverages celebrate bitterness.
To make Pompelmo a unique and different fragrance, I have worked on both the lively and sour freshness of Grapefruit, while stressing its bitter scent. Jean-Claude Ellena
output: Pompelmo by Laboratorio Olfattivo is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pompelmo was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Maison Crivelli presents Oud Cadenza, an extrait de parfum developed in collaboration with perfumer Jordi Fernandez. Inspired by Thibaud Crivelli's personal adventure of smelling oud at a hidden party in a palm grove, this fragrance features a surprising contrast of oud with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.
"Oud Cadenza Extrait de parfum
The defining adventure: smelling oud while attending a hidden party in a palm grove.

The surprising contrast: oud contrasts with a date and toasted cane sugar accord.

Fragrance family: gourmand woody (vegan).

Key raw materials: cardamom oil from India ORPUR, cinnamon bark oil, saffron, oud wood accord, davana oil from India OPRUR, cocoa butter absolute ORPUR, vanilla extract from Madagascar ORPUR, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, toasted tonka bean absolute from Venezuela ORPUR, myrrh.

The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house."
output: Oud Cadenza by Maison Crivelli is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Cadenza was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernandez. Top notes are Saffron, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Ginger, Nutmeg and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Dates, Caramel, Agarwood (Oud), Sugar Cane, Incense, Amberwood, Myrrh and Davana; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Tonka, Cacao Butter, Leather, Benzoin, Musk, Patchouli, Labdanum and Mate.

input: "This perfume is an olfactory ode that seeks to represent the characteristically relaxed glamor of the charming city of Positano (Italy) during spring/summer, where the sea breeze invites the Dolce Far Niente" and coincides with the season of its famous lemons. PositaniSSimo is refreshing and clean, with a classic, effortless chic aesthetic and a rebellious spirit, reminiscent of traditional Mediterranean citrus fragrances, but on this occasion, an accent of both the sea and mountains together marks its vital and dynamic character." -Brand website.

Opening with top notes of oud, smoke, and the sweet embrace of maple syrup, it sets the stage for a journey into luxury. As the scent evolves into its heart, a rich blend of sandalwood, guaiac wood, cedarwood, vanilla, and a hint of cotton candy creates a luxurious and comforting symphony.
Finally, it gracefully settles into a base of amber, labdanum, vanilla, and musk, leaving you with a super-warm and enduring closure that lingers for long hours.
output: Wonheda by Astral is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Wonheda was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Hseyin Erdomu. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
L'Artisan Parfumeur introduces Cuir Grenat to the Les Merveilles collection (formerly known as the L'Orient collection).
Influenced by his experiences in Morocco, perfumer Christophe Raynaud created Cuir Grenat Eau de Parfum for L'Artisan Parfumeur. During his travels, Raynaud stumbled upon a leather workshop, captivated by the mastery of craftsmanship and the aromatic atmosphere that surrounded him. This olfactory journey inspired the creation of Cuir Grenat, a fragrance that beautifully captures the interplay between the dimly lit room's warmth, leather, and aromatic scents, and the luminosity of the outside world.
The composition features prominent notes of raspberry, leather, and ambrofix.
L'Artisan Parfumeur Cuir Grenat is available in a 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Cuir Grenat by L'Artisan Parfumeur is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuir Grenat was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christophe Raynaud. Top note is Raspberry; middle note is Leather; base note is Ambrofix.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Gisada Switzerland is proud to announce the launch of Titanium - Eau de Parfum, on April 11. This signature scent from the House of Gisada transcends ordinary scent boundaries and has been carefully crafted to emerge as a true contemporary classic  'Breaking The Scent Barriers'.

Bold. Powerful. Unforgettable. Titanium carries the promise of standing as a bold declaration of the contemporary man. As part of the fragrance's campaign, Gisada has partnered with the British boxer, Anthony Joshua, a true champion both inside and outside of the ring.
From the first spritz, Titanium exudes quiet confidence with notes of pink pepper, artemisia, sage, and cardamom. As it settles, you'll catch hints of cedarwood, sandalwood, leather, cinnamon, iris, vanilla, tonka bean, and fir balsam. Its depth and warmth leave a memorable mark.
output: Titanium by Gisada is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Titanium was launched in 2024. Titanium was created by Olaf Larsen and Lucas Sieuzac. Top notes are Cardamom, Sage, Pink Pepper and Artemisia; middle notes are Lavender, Sandalwood, Cinnamon, Leather and Cedarwood; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Iris, Patchouli and Balsam Fir.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 reveals vanilla in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most delicious signature. Taken to its climax, the overdose of vanilla is tinged with that Guerlain je ne sais quoi which makes it a great perfume, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers increase the intoxication of vanilla by punctuating it with spicy notes. In the background, it is enveloped in musky notes and the famous opopanine, Guerlain's legendary amber accord.

Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade  the emblematic signature of the House  The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.
output: Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 by Guerlain is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was launched in 2023. Vanille Planifolia Extrait 21 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Le Sel dIssey by Issey Miyake is a woody aromatic fragrance that encapsulates the essence of a salt-sprayed voyage.
"Marine meets woody: the contrast of the elements gives birth to Le Sel dIssey, a revitalizing fragrance born between the Ocean and the earth in a tribute to the salt of life."
output: Le Sel dIssey by Issey Miyake is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Sel dIssey was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Sea Salt and Ginger; middle notes are Seaweed and Vetiver; base notes are Cedarwood and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Occident' 90 is inspired by the early 1990s, when most Romanians dreamed of leaving the Country for a better life in the West. Many of them left everything behind in order to try to send to their families all that they had laboriously collected in those foreign lands, but many feel homesick and homesick for their native places. The design of this perfume, as of the entire Mirrors of time collection, is based on my childhood in my grandparents' house in the country, where on the walls hung some old mirrors made by my great-grandfather Tica Vanu, which I reinterpreted. Each mirror is like a time machine, looking in it you will go back in time and it makes you think, how many other generations before you have looked in it, which you only got to know from stories.
Nose: Jimmy Bodin
Artistic vision, story & craft: Adi ale Van.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity  the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Taking its name from the Arabic word for knowledge, Ilm is a tribute to the golden age of chemistry. A simple yet intoxicating blend of aged Indian Assam oud, Laotian oud and Bangladesh oud, Ilm is warm and sweet set alight with flaming balsamic notes. Kemi is a collection of perfumes created from natural raw elements using innovative distillation techniques.
OLFACTORY NOTES
output: 'Ilm by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. 'Ilm was launched in 2023. Top notes are Laotian Oud, Gurjan balsam and Australian Sandalwood; middle notes are Laotian Oud, Ambergris, Oakmoss and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Laotian Oud and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:

This scent opens with the inviting sweet spices of cardamom and rose petals, before giving way to the enveloping warmth of sandalwood, cedarwood, and carrot seeds at the heart. An enticing finish of vetiver and silk musk is enlivened by the crisp, clean scent of papyrus, invoking the dry heat of the desert and the warmness of the first rays of dawn.
Byredo Desert Dawn is available in 50 ml and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Desert Dawn by Byredo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Desert Dawn was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jrme Epinette. Top notes are Rose Petals and Cardamom; middle notes are Sandalwood, Cedarwood and Carrot Seeds; base notes are Musk, Papyrus, Silk and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Each year, Kilian launches a limited edition of one of its most popular and emblematic fragrances, Love, Don't Be Shy. The Special Blend edition of 2023 captures the essence of home and heritage with the legend of the inspiring Middle East, oud resonating with a vibrant amber accord.
Love, Don't Be Shy AMBER & OUD Special Blend 2023 highlights the rich and diverse facets of oud oil. This year's blend begins with bright Bulgarian rose oil and orange blossom absolute from Morocco, blooming with refinement and sensuality into the unforgettably delicious marshmallowy accord. In this heart begins the opening notes of a rich ambery accord, boldly with intensified spices and resins. Oriental and oud are the core resonance with a touch of akigalawood. The composition is signed by perfumer Calice Becker.
 
Notes: Accord of Oud, Accord of Oriental, Rose essence, Akigalawood.
The fragrance is available as a 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 by By Kilian is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Love by Kilian Amber and Oud Special Blend 2023 was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Calice Becker. Top notes are Tunisian Orange Blossom, Marshmallow and Bulgarian Rose; middle notes are Amber, Resins and Spices; base notes are Amber, Agarwood (Oud) and Akigalawood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "To create City Rhythms Red Line 2654, we are delighted to honor the inundation of requests from our customers by combining two of their City Rhythm favorites into one. Closing the distance of the 2,654 miles between San Diegos Pacific coastline and Miamis Atlantic beaches, Red Line carries the best of both worlds in its cargo. This flawless fusion allows the notes of two City Rhythm classic fragrances, Miami and San Diego, to enhance and play off of one other for an utterly unique experience. The juniper berries and blood orange of San Diego shine brightly next to Miamis coconut and lime notes in the opening, before Miamis floral and rum notes merge seamlessly with San Diegos sea breeze and ambergris, to create a fantasy beach you can take with you wherever you go."
output: Red Line 2654 by City Rhythm is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Red Line 2654 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Blood Orange, Sea Salt, Coconut, Lime, Juniper Berries and Heliotrope; middle notes are Sugar Cane, Moroccan Jasmine, Osmanthus, Nutmeg and Almond; base notes are Vanilla, Rum, Ambergris and Tonka Bean.

Star Anise and Sandalwood provide a warm and sweet embrace reminiscent of the suns glow on sea-worn sand while Ambrettolide and Carrot Seed introduce a faintly carnal twist, echoing the raw, primal essence of natures undirected desires.
Designed for those who are drawn to the mysterious depths of relationships and emotion, DEZIRO offers a refreshing yet profound experience that appeals to the adventurous spirit within.
TOP NOTES: Italian Mandarin, Marine Accord, Ambrox Super
HEART NOTES: Star Anise, Carrot Seed SFE, Cypriol, Mint, Geranium
BASE NOTES: Ambrettolide, Haitian Vetiver, Australian Sandalwood

It has been an amazing opportunity to have the chance to contribute to this evolution with an olfactive representation by collaborating with French perfumer Bruno Jovanovic.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I hope you will turn into an obsession,
because you aid life.
You block false reality,
acting in the shadows,
erasing limits.
The twelfth fragrance in the monolithic UNUM collection is designed to confront the most heightened of emotions: fear. Almost as per tradition, the starting point inspiring it is an extract from the Gospel of Matthew, the parable of the ten virgins. The story  which also gives the fragrance its name  is that of ten women who prudently save oil so they can burn their lamps as they await the bridegrooms arrival. We know that of the ten, only five  described as very wise - participate in the wedding party; the others, having gone to find more oil for their lamps, find the door closed to them. Lord, open to us, they say upon arriving, receiving the response: Truly I say to you: I do not know you. We also know that, while they were awaiting the grooms arrival, they too fell asleep, but were ready to wake up and rejoice: "stay awake, therefore, because you know neither the day nor the hour", we read in Matthew.
This is just the start. The idea is to go beyond the evangelism of these words and face our fears on a deeper, more intense level, evoking conflicting emotions and experiencing the seductive charm of danger  an "amor fati" as Nietzsche claimed  or at least, the presence of things beyond our control. This is a characteristic feature of horror literature (and more); its the power of the uncontrolled over us. Yet the existence of fear always requires something else: not lack of courage, but the presence of what we most desire. What remains most mens highest aspiration is also a harbinger of trouble: freedom.
The perfume conveys the idea of destruction, the choice to be silent, and the introspection needed to delve into the depths of the skins most remote existence.
Yet seeking to control it stirs attraction and even feelings of pleasure towards that sought-after, desired fear.
Man is caught in a horrific fate, and our society, with the violent approval of the mob, tries to daze itself and deny the truth, or rather Being-for-death.
Only in this way does man become I in his darkest, unspoken shadow, displaying his true nature made up of contradictions and desires. Faced with fear, seemingly chaotic primordial needs composed of dormant, hidden, and dangerous eroticism are triggered, making the impossible possible.
The packaging is in line with the UNUM collection; this time it is sealed with a cold transparent film and a silver label. The bottle (also silver) is placed in a "silent" black velvet bag, sealed in a heat-shrunk sheath which needs to be cut physically using the metal scissors contained in the box.
Following his religious fall into the realm of dust, faced with life on a fragile planet, and having lost all his bearings, man is inextricably connected to fear, forced to wander in the dark side of the soul. Inside that room, he perceives a dim light that reveals deformed limbs sharing monstrous things that seek to destroy respectability and take pleasure in suffocating souls, no longer reckoning with lifes balance sheets but with a form of salvation thats ever more distant.
output: N Il Giorno N L'Ora by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. N Il Giorno N L'Ora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Bergamot, Lily of the Valley, Galbanum and Cedar; middle notes are Marine notes, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Musk, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The night was not yet over, and the first rays of sunlight delicately enveloped the colourful stalls. A loud, cozy aroma filled the air, heightening the excitement. These are the moments when simplicity takes on a mystical meaning and everyday life becomes a unique experience. The  market, which looked like a stage with a variety of crops, was the heart of the local community - every Wednesday it pulsated to the rhythm of trade. Every Wednesday morning, local farmers and craftsmen gathered, creating a magical space that came to life. These moments were like journeys deep into the soul, where every scent brought a new discovery.
As a child, I loved these ritual trips to the market with my grandparents. It was not everyday shopping, but an incredible journey where every colour, every energy, every scent, every hue and every selection of the best crops radiated magic. , the golden treasures of the  countryside, rested in jute sacks and wicker baskets. Their earthy skin, still damp from the morning dew, radiated a deep, sensual chord. Every touch of these tubers reminded me of my connection with nature, of the cycle of life that goes on forever. I captured these in the    composition, which transports me back to those special memories, sensual experiences, and the unique magic of simplicity. - Micha Gilbert Lach | Creative Director
TOP NOTES | Leather, Grass, Wheat, Beetroot, Pine
HEART NOTES | Polish Potatoes, Rose, Heliotrope, Clove
BOTTOM NOTES | Patchouli, Birch, Soil, Earthy Notes, Oud, Amber, Vanilla, Honey, Hay, Labdanum, Benzoin
output: Polish Potatoes by Bohoboco is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Polish Potatoes was launched in 2024. Top notes are Beetroot, Leather, Wheat, Pine and Grass; middle notes are Potato, Clove, Rose and Heliotrope; base notes are Earthy Notes, Soil Tincture, Patchouli, Amber, Oud, Benzoin, Vanilla, Honey, Birch, Hay and Labdanum.

Despite its lofty status, it remains a creature of elegance and poise. Like poetry upon the skin, the leathery essence of Baz Cuir captures the scent of adventure and independence. As the fragrance settles, it reveals layers of complexity reminiscent of the falcons graceful descent."

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"For this even more celebratory incarnation of Jubilation XXV Man, Amouage called on the talents of its original creator, Bertrand Duchaufour. While keeping the essential structure of his composition intact, the perfumer emphasised and highlighted key aspects to construct an even more striking blend of styles. Jubilation 40 Man reaches new heights of expressiveness, offering an extraordinarily compelling presentation of masculinity.
Retaining the instantly recognisable blackberry opening, the scent now also reveals dry, tart hints of Blackcurrant This makes way for the perfumes majestic heart: Genet unfurls within a burst of honeyed Tobacco notes while regal Frankincense cuts through the narcotic warmth of Balsams and Resins. Eventually, the scent settles on an enveloping, heart-stopping dry-down of Patchouli, Cistus, and Opoponax. Flaming with magnificence and a lust for adventure, Jubilation 40 Man captures the absolute essence of masculine sophistication."

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Jimmy Choo introduces a bold new chapter in its mens fragrance collection with Jimmy Choo Man Extreme, an intensified reinterpretation of the original Jimmy Choo Man, first launched in 2014. Rooted in the brands signature aromatic-woody DNA, this dynamic scent takes sophistication to the next level.
Designed for the modern adventurer, Jimmy Choo Man Extreme embodies strength, confidence, and an unrelenting thirst for new experiences. This powerful fougre composition is crafted for men who take control of their destiny, embrace challenges, and seek excitement in the great outdoors.
At its core, the fragrance ignites with fiery red thyme and black pepper, creating an exhilarating opening. The heart unfolds into an aromatic blend of fresh geranium and clary sage, adding depth and refinement. Finally, the base lingers with the warmth of amber woods, the creamy richness of tonka bean, and the earthy intensity of vetiver, resulting in a seductive, long-lasting masculine signature.
Jimmy Choo Man Extreme is a fragrance that captures intensity and passion, inspired by the rich, dynamic shades of red.
"When creating this fragrance, I imagined different shades of red and thought about how to represent them in the fragrance. One ingredient immediately came to mind: red thyme oil, with its burning freshness, which brings incredible intensity to the fragrance."  Anne Flipo, Master Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
With a modernized take on the classic fougre structure, the composition balances fiery and sensual elements for a bold and unforgettable scent.
"Our intention was also to modernize the classic fougre composition, using the sensual warmth of tonka bean and amber woods to create a real signature."  Tanguy Guesnet, Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
The fragrance is housed in a striking bottle that reflects its powerful essence. Retaining the original square silhouette of Jimmy Choo Man, the flacon is now enveloped in a vibrant scarlet lacquer, symbolizing its bold intensity. The silver-embossed name, along with a red leather-effect cap, adds the finishing touch to this daring and dynamic design.
Available as 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Jimmy Choo Man Extreme by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Jimmy Choo Man Extreme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Red Thyme and Black Pepper; middle notes are Sage, Geranium and Nutmeg; base note is Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Following the remarkable success of Arabians Tonka, Montale proudly unveils the next addition to its Arabians collection: Arabians Musk. This fragrance, while staying true to the captivating magic of the Orient, highlights the sensual and mysterious essence of musk. As with Montales previous creations, Arabians Musk is more than just a scent; it is a journey through the Moroccan desert, where each moment offers as much enchantment as the final destination.
The Fragrance Notes:
Arabians Musk is a sophisticated composition that artfully blends rare and luxurious ingredients, creating a fragrance experience that is both powerful and delicate. The journey begins with the golden sweetness of Sweet Honey, capturing the warmth of the day, while Bergamot Zests add a fresh, citrusy burst that awakens the senses. The richness of Tasty Medjool Dates evokes the caramelized scent of sun-drenched dates, grounding the fragrance in an opulent warmth.
A delicate floral breeze comes through with Tunisian Orange Flower, inspired by the blossoms found in a Moroccan oasis, adding a touch of lightness and elegance. The comforting sweetness of Vanilla Sugar follows, evoking a sense of indulgence. Venezuelan Tonka Beans bring a balsamic richness to the composition, enhancing its depth and sophistication. At the heart of the fragrance lies Warm Musksensual, enveloping, and unforgettabletying together the luxurious notes and leaving a lasting impression.
Arabians Musk transports you to a summer evening on a winding road through the Atlas Mountains, leading toward the vast Sahara desert. The air is tinged with the familiar, glycerine-like scent of leather care products, evoking memories of horse-riding gear from a nearby stable. At the foot of the Atlas lies a stable owned by a dear friend, where the legendary horse CALAFETE, a stunning figure known worldwide from Montales Arabians Tonka campaign, is cared for. As daylight fades and the mystical blue hour sets in, you stop in front of an endless palm grove. The scattered dates on the ground, nearly caramelized under the days scorching sun, release a deep, intoxicating aroma. Nearby, an oasis emerges, surrounded by orange blossoms, their delicate fragrance filling the twilight air. This journey, much like the fragrance itself, serves as a metaphor: sometimes, the destination is less important than the path taken, where every moment becomes a source of joy and wonder.
The bottle of Arabians Musk is an elegant work of art, offering a striking contrast to the deep-toned bottle of Arabians Tonka. This new release is encased in a soft lacquered brown, reminiscent of the smooth sweetness of ripe dates and the delicate white flowers found in Moroccan oases. This lighter hue reflects a balance between strength and softness, subtly connecting the robustness of horse-riding leather gear to the fragrances delicate sensuality. The bottles soft, glycerine-like finish mirrors the tactile smoothness of leather cared for with fine oils, a nod to the noble equestrian world. This smooth texture, combined with the warm, luminous brown, evokes both the sweetness of dates and the light floral notes of orange blossom, creating an object that is as sensual to the touch as the fragrance is to the senses.
Arabians Musk is not merely a fragrance; it is an invitation to a sensory journey, where each olfactory note is a new step on the path to discovery. Inspired by magical Moroccan nights and the world of noble horses, this fragrance is a captivating blend of musky sensuality and floral, sugary notes, offering a deeply luxurious and evocative experience. The bottle, with its soft lacquered brown hue, perfectly encapsulates the contrast between the rugged nobility of purebred horses and the delicate sweetness of the scent. Arabians Musk celebrates freedom, sensuality, and elegance, reminding us that the beauty of the journey is as much in the moments along the way as in the final destination.
output: Arabians Musk by Montale is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Arabians Musk was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Honey and Bergamot; middle notes are Dates and Orange Blossom; base notes are Musk, Sugar, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Penhaligons presents The Dandy, a woody ode to whiskey, tinged with impertinence. Surrounded by a cloud of smoke, here we are, the mischievous spirit coming from all sides, following the decadence of rowdy heels. Cast aside all inhibitions, my friends, because once youre down those steps, the party will never, ever end.

Run shoulders with visionaries, rub shoulders with artists, loosen that tie, ready for a thousand faces. Lipstick marks on mirrors (and collars), sip amber liqueur.  In crystal glasses, under convoluted chandeliers. Suddenly the stroke of midnight rings out, to the tempo of the brass orchestra, trumpets and saxophones beating time, in the dazzling reflection of your glass. Here we are in the land of jazz, of swing that surges to the rhythm of whiskey, of bebop that gallops to the beats of bourbon. Oh, what tumultuous memories in this den, the spirits cheerful, the cocktails flowing freely. In the misty steam, if the speakeasy stage, in this place the dandy, which will forever be oursto dance to infinity
output: The Dandy by Penhaligon's is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Dandy was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top notes are Raspberry, Citron and Bergamot; middle notes are Oak, Whiskey and Cedarwood; base notes are Patchouli and Clearwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The new fragrance from Filippo Sorcinelli is being unveiled today right on the heels of Easter events. Filippo emphasizes these moments by interpreting in olfaction some passages from Mark's Gospel, particularly the moment of the Women's astonishment and fear when they realize that the stone of the Sepulcher has rolled away. In an ideal image to describe this moment, the bottle the very expensive aloe- and myrrh-based aromatic oils that they had prepared to anoint Jesus' body is dropped to the ground the moment they saw not only the stone rolled away, but all the white linen cloths that wrapped the body. Hence the announcement of a young man dressed in blazing white.... The bottle along with the four "wings" that open as "ritual" are covered with sand, with dust, just to remind us of the steps, the road and the place. But the attention-blocking element is the cap that mimics the stylistic features of the tombstone that has rolled away, just as they used to be built. The artwork is covered in its entirety by a white linen veil, on which the name of the fragrance is reproduced: HEC DIES. The outside of the packaging is also covered with the same linen.
output: HC DIES by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. HC DIES was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Aloe Vera, Bergamot, Jasmine and Orange; middle notes are Peach, Myrrh, Cedar and Rose; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber and Patchouli.

The base notes of whipped cream, marshmallow, cotton candy, Turkish delight accord, cocoa, cedarwood, sandalwood, and tonka bean bring a deeper and sensual complexity, making the scent irresistibly attractive.' -Brand info.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover absolute freedom with BLACK THRILL, one of three new fragrances from AMG Parfums. BLACK THRILL is the meeting of leather, addictive tonka, the aromatic thrill of clary sage and the sparkling ardor of ripe mandarin, an intoxicating amber woody composition, an ode to the feeling of pure freedom. With its inaugural trilogy, AMG Parfums arouses the thrill of desire and announces the advent of a new icon.
The line that gives you the ultimate thrill. Back to 1967, the year the legend was born. Two daring young men  Hans Werner Aufrecht and Erhard Melcher  unite their talents and will revolutionize motor racing. Famous for its one man, one engine concept, the audacious duo with a wild spirit will imagine cult creations that are still at the forefront of the industry today. This philosophy of raw excellence and intense sensations has brought AMG fragrances to life. Carefully selected ingredients. Original and daring compositions. Born from the belief that nothing is impossible, AMG Parfums unites high performance and pure emotion to infuse the spirit of racing into the heart of the Mercedes-Benz universe. Taking its name from the intense sensations provided by the power of AMG, THRILL enters the arena with three signature creations. SILVER THRILL, BLACK THRILL AND RED THRILL.
Composed by master perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin, each version of THRILL calls upon a key element of the AMG universe  technology for SILVER, luxury for BLACK, and passion for RED  while accelerating a specific masculine mood and moment. Born in Grasse, the cradle of high perfumery, the creator-perfumer of the collection demonstrates all his talent for the composition of perfumes and the supply of raw materials. This is one of the many reasons why the THRILL collection brings together the finest ingredients sourced with rare precision, for which "sustainability" is the watchword.
A single chassis, a heart that looks like an engine. Like an instantly recognizable homage to AMG, each bottle features a beating heart protected by a fascinating metallic shell. The raw character and apparent mechanism reflect the legendary audacity of AMG engines and the feeling of bravery that each THRILL fragrance evokes in you. Made of recycled glass and aluminum, AMG's eco-responsible commitment is at its peak.
output: AMG Black Thrill by Mercedes-Benz is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. AMG Black Thrill was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top note is Mandarin Orange; middle note is Clary Sage; base notes are Tonka Bean, Leather, Amber and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Included in the first-ever NISHANE collection launched globally in the year 2015, WLNG CH has reached a huge fanbase worldwide thanks to the journey it takes the wearer to the serene tea gardens of the Far East, where the delicate notes of oolong tea leaves and Mediterranean fig fill the air. The original WLNG CH has been celebrated mainly because of its robust power of refreshing notes. However, WLNG CH X is designed to mute the sharp edges of the original formula and enhance it with the addition of florals namely magnolia. This fragrance opens with a burst of zesty citrus notes of bergamot, orange, mandarin, and yuzu, transporting the wearer to the sunny shores of the Mediterranean. As the scent settles, the heart notes of magnolia, thyme oil, and green tea weave a magical spell around you, evoking the tranquil stillness of a teatime. Finally, the musk and fig base notes provide a warm and grounding finish to this fragrance that will keep the wearer feeling fresh and revitalized all day.
TOP NOTES
bergamot - yuzu - litsea - mandarin
HEART NOTES
magnolia - thyme oil - green tea
BASE NOTES
musk - fig
output: Wulong Cha X by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Wulong Cha X was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Julien Rasquinet. Top notes are Bergamot, Yuzu, Litsea Cubeba and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Green Tea, Magnolia and Thyme; base notes are Musk and Fig.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Givenchy invites the most unstoppable Gentlemen to join the edgiest society with its new Eau de Parfum Extrme. This masculine fragrance combines a dark iced coffee accord with a powerful woody floral fragrance and a spicy scent for the most extreme Eau de Parfum. The perfect match for men who set their own rules and go beyond limits in their relentless pursuit of excellence.
In our quest to craft the perfect men fragrance, Givenchy carefully selected exceptional raw materials, harnessing its savoir-faire. This masculine Eau de Parfum opens with an immediate aromatic and spicy twist, a blend of Clary Sage, ice-cold Peppermint, and fiery Nutmeg. The heart reveals the original Gentleman Society accord, a fusion of Narcissus Absolute, Iris Concrete and quartet of Vetiver which enhances the Coffee Extract Absolute and Peppermint Essence. The base, rich with Cedar, Sandal, Patchouli Essence, and Vanilla Absolute, leaves a deep and lasting impression.
The bottle, inspired by couture, is revisited to embody the new extreme facet. A deep black lacquer finish is adorned with the 4G logo in a bold gunmetal finish, giving a contemporary edge to the iconic design.
Additionally, the Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme bottle is made from 15% post-consumer recycled glass.
Gentleman Society. Not a place, a state of mind. Come and join us.
output: Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme by Givenchy is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni. Top notes are Nutmeg, Peppermint and Clary Sage; middle notes are Coffee, Orris Root, Madagascar Vetiver, Haitian Vetiver, Vetiver and French Narcissus; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Australian Sandalwood and Himalayan Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

From the Garden is a part of the Replica collection - Reproduction of Familiar Scents and Moments of Varying Locations and Periods. It captures the essence of a sunny afternoon in a garden, where you can feel the earth in your hands and savor the aroma of ripe tomatoes while bees buzz in the air.
It combines the freshness of tomato leaf and green mandarin with the earthiness of patchouli and geranium, creating an elegant and crisp scent that brings back memories of those tranquil moments spent in a sun-drenched garden.
Perfumer Olivier Cresp drew inspiration from his own experiences, recalling cherished moments in his childhood garden and reliving them with his son, Sebastien, through the green and earthy notes of this fragrance.
Provence and Period: Puglia, 1998.
Available as a 100 ml Eau de Toilette.
output: From the Garden by Maison Martin Margiela is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. From the Garden was launched in 2023. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Born under the rays of springtime sun, this masculine fragrance is a wake-up call of contrasts where water meets matter to create a modern interpretation of lavender. An aromatic woody spicy fragrance for men. A celebration of nature, L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender reveals a solar encounter between lavender and aquatic notes.
Sichuan pepper enhances the aromatic freshness and warm facets of 100% natural French lavender. In the base, a cedarwood accord intensifies the sillage of this aromatic woody perfume. A perfume committed to nature. Created with a patented design, the innovative 100% wood cap requires no plastic, reducing environmental impact.
The bottle is made with 20% post-consumer recycled glass. The box is made from material from responsibly managed forests certified by FSC and other controlled sources. L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender is a vegan-certified fragrance made with 93% natural origin ingredients.
A perfume bottle inspired by lavender. Infused with lavender both inside and out, the bottle and box of L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender are bathed in a light, sunny purple hue. The transparent glass bottle reflects the purity of water, while the 100% wood cap evokes the density of matter.
output: L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender by Issey Miyake is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. L'Eau d'Issey pour Homme Solar Lavender was launched in 2024. Top note is Sichuan Pepper; middle note is Lavender; base note is Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
HACIVAT OUD belongs to Nishane Prestige Collection, and it is created in collaboration with the master perfumer DOMINIQUE ROPION. This luxurious and opulent scent is a richer version of Nishane`s bestseller, HACIVAT.
"Our iconic scent Hacivat was created under the inspiration of the traditional shadow play character Hacivat. We have taken that inspiration to a whole new level by creating a scent that is richer, stronger, and more sophisticated to be included in our Prestige Collection which started with NEFS in 2019 and expanded with the addition of SHEM and MANA, respectively.
HACIVAT OUD was crafted to address the taste of those who desire a luxurious scent that embodies elegance and charm but still has traces of Hacivat. Our new fragrance is the perfect choice for those who appreciate the finer things in life. The scent is a complex blend of oud and pineapple, making it an unforgettable fragrance that will leave a lasting impression. With carefully selected and high-quality ingredients, this fragrance offers a more intense and captivating aroma, giving you an unforgettable sensory experience.
We believe this fragrance will become a beloved addition to the collections of perfume lovers and a staple for those who seek a truly luxurious fragrance experience," says from Nishane.
TOP NOTES: PINEAPPLE, CITRUS, PEPPER PINK & BLACK
HEART NOTES: JASMINE, OLIBANUM OIL & RESINOID
BASE NOTES: VETIVER OIL HAITI, PATCHOULI OIL INDONESIA, VANILLA, OUD OIL
output: Hacivat Oud by Nishane is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hacivat Oud was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Pineapple, Citruses, Black Pepper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Frankincense, Olibanum and Jasmine; base notes are Oud, Patchouli, Haitian Vetiver and Vanilla.

output: Desert Runway by Hawthorne is a Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Desert Runway was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Gillotin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Mysterious and original, LOEWE 7 Elixir reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE 7 EDP with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils. The scent reveals intense notes of patchouli, red pepper berries, and amber, underlined by the rich, raw, and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accorda new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower.
output: Loewe 7 Elixir by Loewe is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Loewe 7 Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nria Cruelles Borrull.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tom Ford launches Myrrhe Mystre, a new addition to the Private Blend collection, in September 2023. The new exclusive creation delves into the enigmatic world of amber, crafted to showcase Tom Ford's personal interpretation of the ingredient of myrrh.
Myrrhe Mystre embraces the rarity and exclusivity fueled by the ingredient's ancient heritage and expands olfactory horizons with the allure of warm, woody, and sweet notes.
The composition develops with myrrh essence and myrrh resinoid absolute, wrapped up in smooth sandalwood and vanilla notes.
Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystre is available as a 30 and 50 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Myrrhe Mystre by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Myrrhe Mystre was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Rodrigo Flores-Roux.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
I would like to get dirty slowly,
precious useless angel
slow sun fire
where the water rests with me
and caress the song of the skin.
A watch made of honey
with the hours marked by a warm wind
shadows of cicadas
silence of the prickly pear
in an orange
that stings the loneliness.
What does it mean today: "there is no hurry"?
In the obsession of the speed paradoxically the cognition of the time is lost. Here then the desire to stop to recognize and build the solitude of a sunny afternoon.
Slowness then becomes a necessary Caress, almost like boredom, to sink into the limits of silence and continue to listen to life in a way that has now become unknown.
Relying on the arms of a wind without running, which moves the earth burned by memories, is a courage of few, because bathing in this value revolutionizes and repairs.
Lentezza Carezza is a summer smell where loving each other becomes a tool for addressing others with new eyes and a reconstructed soul.
A perfume that transforms the perception of remaining motionless, becoming a new form of resistance, in a world where everything is too fast. And where the greatest power is to decide what to do with one's time, as Seplveda says.
output: Lentezza Carezza by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lentezza Carezza was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are prickly pear, Myrrh, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Green Accord, Cedarwood, Cyclamen and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
With this third part of the H24 line, Herms perfumer Christine Nagel continues to chronicle her plant-based story in the footsteps of a contemporary man on the move. The H24 Herbes Vives eau de perfume transcribes the rediscovered urban nature after a rain shower.
FRAGRANCE NOTES
The H24 Herbes Vives eau de perfume combines the power of a fresh herbal bouquet with the texture of pear granita and the liveliness of a high-tech molecule, Physcool.
The bottle with clean lines by Philippe Mouquet is decorated with a green lacquer that reflects the fragrance notes. The packaging is adorned with a deeper gray-green as if the city's asphalt is permeated with vegetal accents. A lime green trim defines and opens up the space.
Available as a 50ml, 100ml, and 200ml (refill) Eau de Parfum.
output: H24 Herbes Vives by Herms is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. H24 Herbes Vives was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Christine Nagel. Top note is Herbal Notes; middle note is Pear; base note is Physcool.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: SoBold Intense takes flight with a fresh and airy opening, blending aldehydes with citric notes. The fragrance incorporates leather into its elegant lavender heart for immediate seduction and tenacity. Strong and virile, yet it evolves into a comforting sensation, with tonka notes and a harmonious amber, culminating in a delicate musk finish. A fragrance that seduces for its strength as well as its sensitivity, shattering the codes of masculine sensuality .
output: SoBold Intense by Pepe Jeans London is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. SoBold Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Aldehydes and Citrus; middle notes are Tonka Bean, Lavender and Leather; base notes are Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
THE FRAGRANCE OF A NEW DAWN
Obsidian, coal, earth, rocks, crystals, the stormy sea, and the fiery dawn on a volcanic island. Emerging from the core of the earth is a primitive and powerful treasure: Trussardi Primo. A tribute to resilient masculinity, it is powerful, explosive and simultaneously the precursor of a new olfactory saga. It is the dawn of a new day, full of promise. The man imagined by the Trussardi maison is intrepid and confident in the future, a pioneer in a new world. Trussardi Primo rewrites the codes of men's perfumery starting from the courageous and innovative olfactory pyramid to the packaging, a work of art with a green heart. The composition is like a flower warmed by the first rays at dawn: it opens slowly and celebrates the daily miracle of rebirth with its fragrance. Its bold, virile notes evoke the freshness of the sea air mixed with the heat of volcanic lava, creating a unique olfactory harmony that reflects the duality of the island itself: the untamed
power of nature and the beauty of its landscape. Wearing Trussardi Primo is like wrapping yourself in a cloak of courage and confidence, ready to face any obstacle. Trussardi Primo is the invitation to embrace the light of day with primitive, powerful energy. It is the exhortation to discover your inner strength and potential.
Trussardi Primo is an unexpected fougre with a persistent sillage and "noir nuances obtained from an accord of bergamot, geranium, musk, lavender, vetiver, and tonka beans. The liquid contains organic ingredients from Italy, extracted with highly technological processes that respect the characteristics of the raw material in order to capture every olfactory nuance. Here is how perfumer Violaine Collas describes it: "The last time I was in Sicily was immediately after an eruption of Mount Etna. It was a truly inspiring scene that compelled me to recreate a similar sensation: the sensation of heat, like that of an eruption of incandescent lava. This image gave me the idea of using a maple syrup accord, super addictive with its golden nuances. I also wanted a dash of pepper to convey a sensation of danger and restore the hypnotic beauty of the volcano, intertwined with a dark, mineral black lava accord. Thus, a warm and sexy fragrance was born."
THE BOTTLE AND PACKAGING
At the center of a volcanic island, shrouded in the mists of dawn and surrounded by a tumultuous sea, stands a totem-like bottle, a work of art in glass with iridescent nuances that start from black, so typical of the night, and veer towards a shade of red that tinges the early hours of a new day. Like a reflection of dawn that slowly rises on the horizon, the bottle mesmerizes with its chromatic metamorphosis, conveying the promise of a bold, new beginning.
The glass bottle, substantial in weight and compact to the touch, transmits a sensation of power and solidity as a tangible sign of the wearer's inner determination. Like lava that runs down the sides of the volcano and carves out the landscape, the glass is transformed into an elegant and sculptural swirl that captures the essence of primordial fire. The design of Trussardi Primo is a revolution in packaging for perfumery, thanks to a few elements like the threading under the dispenser and the reusable magnetic cap. Solid, refined and refillable, the bottle combines high-level ecological green solutions without compromising its aesthetics. All components are non-toxic, recyclable or reusable. Likewise, the refill bottle follows the same ethics and aesthetics. The Trussardi Primo box is made of recyclable materials like FSC paper from forests managed according to rigorous environmental and social criteria. It echoes the same colors of the bottle with gradient shades passing from black to red and features embossed lettering with a vinyl finish.
"I'm excited by novelty. I believe that people who seek new things are unwilling to repeat what they've seen
before... Fabien Baron.
For over three decades culminating in illustrious accolades and awards, Fabien Baron has dominated the industrial design landscape with a proactive mind and unparalleled creativity, defining the success of some of the most prominent global brands. His boundless artistic conception unfolds through myriad facets, drawing from art to nature. During his career, Baron was the catalyst for the revival of famous magazines and brands, and he also created his own furniture line. Baron embodies the immense fervor that only true masters possess, shaping ideas and projects and making them a reality. For Trussardi Primo, he curated the design of the bottle and packaging, paying great attention not only to the aesthetic aspects of the latter, but also to its environmental impact.
ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN  THE CONCEPT
An epic, nocturnal escape in search of oneself in the volcanic landscape of Lanzarote, the lava island. Dark rocks and wild nature, majestic and exciting, are the backdrop of this primitive night. The mystery of nature demands respect, contemplation, and total dedication. The senses expand between the images, visions, smells, and sounds of a captivating and evocative night. It inebriates and confounds, but also sends signals that transform into symbols for the protagonist's journey guided by the stars and the light of the imminent dawn. The shadow of a man accompanied by his noble greyhound merges with the landscape in a deep connection with the surrounding natural elements.
output: Primo by Trussardi is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Primo was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Violaine Collas. Top notes are Maple sap, Lava, Mineral notes and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tonka, Pimento and Bourbon Geranium; base notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"Set off for Ithaca, that mythical island in the Ionian Sea, home to the epic tale of Ulysses and Penelope. An island of encounters at the heart of the archipelago, where the strength of cedar, vivacity of bergamot and sweetness of blackcurrant come together as one.
About the flacon: The plate of Ithaque is inspired by a typical life scenery from ancient Greece, where nature is blooming at every corner."
Available as 75 ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Ithaque by Memo Paris is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ithaque was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marypierre Julien. Top notes are Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Bitter Orange, Pink Pepper, Sichuan Pepper and Madagascar Pepper; middle notes are Currant buds, Red Currant, Juniper Berries, Raspberry and Egyptian Jasmine; base notes are Texas Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Detour Noir Exclusif is an enchanting fragrance designed to mesmerize the senses and elevate everyday experiences. It combines sophistication with luxury, offering a scent that transcends the ordinary to deliver an unparalleled sensory journey. The fragrance opens with vibrant top notes of almond, mandarin orange, bergamot, and watery notes. The heart unfolds with civet, geranium, rose, gardenia, and water lily, adding depth and complexity. The base notes of guaiac wood, Laotian oud, vanilla, coffee, sandalwood, Indonesian patchouli leaf, amber, oakmoss, and pink pepper provide a warm and sensual foundation.
output: Detour Noir Exclusif by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Detour Noir Exclusif was launched in 2024. Top notes are Almond, Mandarin Orange, Watery Notes and Bergamot; middle notes are Civet, Geranium, Rose, Water Lily and Gardenia; base notes are Laotian Oud, Guaiac Wood, Vanilla, Indonesian Patchouli Leaf, Sandalwood, Amber, Oakmoss, Coffee and Pink Pepper.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "Inspired by nature, its fragrance stands out for its citrus-based lime and marine accord with exotic notes of tonka, the Orinoco bean, on a sandalwood and musk base. An unusual balance for an Agua Fresca that will make you connect with nature. And nothing else."

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Ottoman Empire is the essence of mysteries. It has a heart of extravagant richness, a character of unmatchable diversity and the blissful sensation of narcotic depth. Step into the past and experience the soul-healing impact, depth and mystery of Ottoman Empire.
Top notes: Jamaican pepper, cardamom and pure rose oil from Turkey distilled in copper using firewood
Heart notes: infusion of frangipani flowers, saffron, Indian agarwood oils from Nagalang and Manipur distilled in 1975-1993, Indian vetiver, cinnamon and nutmeg
Base notes: amber accord, cedarwood and oakmoss accord.
output: Ottoman Empire IV by Areej Le Dor is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ottoman Empire IV was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Russian Adam. Top notes are Turkish Rose Oil, Chili Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Frangipani, Indian Oud, Saffron, Vetiver, Cinnamon and Nutmeg; base notes are Oakmoss, Amber and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Embark on an aromatic journey to the tropics with CH Men Birds of Paradise, a new limited edition men's fragrance from Carolina Herrera. This captivating eau de parfum will evoke a rainy and humid afternoon on a paradise island and transport you to sunny beaches and lush tropical landscapes with its exterior adorned with toucans and its aromatic blend of bergamot, violet leaves and cashmere wood.
Fresh top notes of Egyptian blue chamomile and violet leaves, which lead to the woody and aromatic heart notes of driftwood and fir balsam. Notes of Tonka Bean, cashmere wood and sandalwood make up a sensual and extremely addictive base.
output: CH Birds Of Paradise For Him by Carolina Herrera is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. CH Birds Of Paradise For Him was launched in 2024. Top notes are Violet Leaves and Chamomile; middle notes are Driftwood and Fir; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bvlgari Pour Homme Eau de Parfum, a woody musky harmonious and refined fragrance, embodying the perfect balance between the great outdoors and home comfort. A new intense interpretation of the iconic Pour Homme woody musky scent. An Eau de Parfum created around dazzling fresh and spicy notes, which unfolds in an ultimate duo of tea blend accords bringing longlastingness. Crafted by Master perfumer Jacques Cavallier.
The elegant and minimalist flacon matches the innate freshness and comforting notes of the new Eau de Parfum. Its transparent green and evocative tones not only refer to the new concentration of Pour Homme but also opens up to the harmonic scenery underlying the fragrance. Simple yet iconic, the bottle is the gateway to an inner sanctuary, anticipating the comfortable feeling of being in a safe space.
output: Pour Homme Eau De Parfum by Bvlgari is a Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Pour Homme Eau De Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Darjeeling Tea and Ginger; middle notes are Black Tea and Guaiac Wood; base notes are White Musk and Ambrette (Musk Mallow).

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Benoist Lapouza presents a floral and oriental fragrance that illuminated the last rays of the sun before welcoming the evening between the dunes. Fragrance pyramid reveals top notes of incense and orange over a foundation of cinnamon, tonka bean, and chocolate. The base reveals cedar and iris notes to us.
output: Sand Desert At Sunset by Zara is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Sand Desert At Sunset was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Benoist Lapouza. Top notes are Orange and Incense; middle notes are Cinnamon, Tonka Bean and Chocolate; base notes are Iris and Cedar.
