output: Lilypha by Diptyque is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lilypha was launched in 2024. Lilypha was created by Olivier Pescheux and Natalie Gracia-Cetto.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: This creation revisits a mythical fragrance ingredient: patchouli. It has been combined with an exclusive ingredient used for the very first time in perfumery: the ultrasound extract of Hazelnut from Pimont Italy designed internally using a 100% green extraction technology, and the world most qualitative origin of hazelnut! An accord which provides a delicate balance between the dark and rough side of patchouli with the incomparable soft praline facets of the hazelnut from Pimont.
output: Patchouli Noisette by Les Indemodables is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. Patchouli Noisette was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Pour Un Homme de CARON Parfum unveils a creation based on the historic composition of 1934, revitalized with a touch of ultra-modern freshness.
Around LAVENDER: French Lavander Essence | French Lavandin Essence | French Lavender Absolute | French Lavandin Absolute | Turkish Rose Essence
Around VANILLA: Vanilla | Musk | Opoponax Essence | Styrax Resinoid
Natural lavender is an essential ingredient in the history of the House of CARON. It is overdosed at 61% in Pour Un Homme de CARON. The House of CARON collaborates with Jrme BOENLE, a lavender producer based in Sault, Provence.
output: Pour Un Homme de Caron Parfum by Caron is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Pour Un Homme de Caron Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean Jacques.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This concentrate of ideals embodies today's men  modern and unique.
Like skilled cellar masters, Guerlain Perfumers create a new blend to enhance the irresistible uniqueness of L'Homme Idalan exceptional cuve with hints of spirits. The iconic almond note of L'Homme Idal becomes delightful, thanks to an accord known only to the house of Guerlain.
With L'Homme Idal Platine Priv, Guerlain Perfumers secretly reorchestrate the irresistible green almond accord to emphasize its freshness and modernity further. The emblematic amaretto note becomes bitter and powerful. Enhanced by a freshness that combines grapefruit essence and pink berries, the almond blends with the strength of Haitian vetiver, resulting in a dualistic signature. An exceptional reinterpretation of our icon.
"Platine Priv reinterprets L'Homme Idal with an exceptional blend. The signature amaretto accord, enhanced by citrus and vetiver, becomes even sharper and more refined." - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer.
output: LHomme Idal Platine Priv by Guerlain is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. LHomme Idal Platine Priv was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Grapefruit and Bergamot; middle notes are Green Almond and Neroli; base notes are Musk and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: NO LIMIT$ PLATINUM is a bold aromatic fougre eau de parfum created by Alberto Morillas with powerful and noble raw materials of perfumery combined with intense addictive notes.
output: No Limit$ Platinum by Philipp Plein Parfums is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. No Limit$ Platinum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Calone, Aldehydes and Mandarin; middle notes are Clary Sage, Silver Fir and Lavender; base notes are Ambroxan, Musk and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Rouge Smoking Extrait by BDK Parfums is a new unisex fragrance launched in 2024. This amber, fruity fragrance intensifies the original edition with a blend of cherry, mandarin, bergamot, almond, and pink peppercorn. The heart reveals tonka bean, labdanum, Peru balsam, and a milk accord, resting on a base of oud, amber woods, ambroxan, vanilla, rum, patchouli, and benzoin.
output: Rouge Smoking Extrait by BDK Parfums is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rouge Smoking Extrait was launched in 2024. Rouge Smoking Extrait was created by Amlie Bourgeois and Margaux Le Paih Gurin. Top notes are Cherry, Almond, Pink Pepper, Red Mandarin and Bergamot; middle notes are Peru Balsam, Milk, Tonka Bean and Spanish Labdanum; base notes are Oud, Rum, Ambroxan, Patchouli, Vanilla Absolute, Amber, Benzoin and Siam.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
SYNOPSIS: 
Have you ever stood alone atop a mountain with chunky snowflakes swirling all around? Such is the splendor you will experience within The Language of Glaciers, a romantic epic which reaches incredible heights and inspires one to leave no moment unappreciated. From the stillness of a moonlit snowshoe excursion, to the rush of witnessing an avalanche safely from above, the recollections of our unnamed narrator will captivate you the same way the solitary song of the snow owl captivated them. Find comfort in the cold and begin to see the world from stunning new perspectives. Critics have called it A slow-paced story that will burrow straight to the center of your soul and Sharp as ice and smooth as a glacial lake.
NOTES:
White Pine, Lilac, Cashmere, Juniper, Forget Me Not, Blue Bugle, Virgin Snowfall.
output: The Language Of Glaciers by Imaginary Authors is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Language Of Glaciers was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Original Santal 2024 by Creed is a unisex fragrance released in 2024. It belongs to the fougre, spicy, and woody families, offering a balanced blend of aromatic notes.
output: Original Santal 2024 by Creed is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Original Santal 2024 was launched in 2024. Top notes are Sandalwood, Juniper Berries, Coriander and Cinnamon; middle notes are Lavender, Ginger, Citrus and Rosemary; base notes are Vanilla and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Dive into the refreshing temptation of the Arabian Sea with Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubaia fragrance that captures the essence of Dubai's coastal charm. At the forefront, bergamot, green notes, and mandarin orange dance like sunlight on the water, evoking the crispness of a sea breeze. As you journey deeper, middle notes of melon, pineapple, amber, and black currant emerge, painting a picture of tropical indulgence against a backdrop of azure waters. These scents intertwine seamlessly, creating a symphony of sweetness and sophistication that lingers on the skin like a gentle caress.
The base notes of musk, vanilla, galbanum, and petitgrain anchor the fragrance, adding a touch of depth and complexity reminiscent of the coastal landscape. With Haramain Amber Oud Aqua Dubai, every spritz is an invitation to immerse yourself in the vibrant energy and timeless elegance of Dubai's aquatic allure.
output: Amber Oud Aqua Dubai by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Aromatic Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Aqua Dubai was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bergamot, Green Notes and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Amber, Melon, Black Currant and Pineapple; base notes are Petitgrain, Musk, Galbanum and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Marla is femininity, a name which has always been associated with pureness, kindness and beauty. Marla is the warrior who has been through difficult times but has always put up a fight and is proud of every aspect of her being, even her fragility.
Marla, like the female character in the film Fight Club, is an unusual  femme fatale: she has no past, she has no expectation for the future, she just lives in the moment.
Marla is dominated by a White Rose, ripe and full of thorns and picked in a breezy September night when it is no longer the fruit of an incidental first blossoming, but the perfection of a mature plants last blooming. A rose leaned onto Oaktree moss, Tonka Bean and Myrrh a magical ritual for a fresh start, inspired by purity.
output: Marla by Pollini Profumi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Marla was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Michele Pollini. Top note is White Rose; middle notes are Rose and Cloves; base notes are Amber, Myrrh, Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Carnal, bountiful, and sumptuous, a wind of exoticism will transport you on a journey to islands beyond the Pacific horizon. It is developed by perfumer Amlie Jacquin from Givaudan, under creative direction of Dimitri Weber.
output: Island Lush by Goldfield & Banks Australia is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Island Lush was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Amelie Jacquin. Top notes are Nutmeg, Pink Pepper, Ginger and Bergamot; middle notes are Guaiac Wood, Cedar, Geranium and Iris; base notes are Leather, Sandalwood, Benzoin, Vetiver and Patchouli.

input: Tommy Forever by Tommy Hilfiger is a new fragrance for men, released in 2024.
output: Tommy Forever by Tommy Hilfiger is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Tommy Forever was launched in 2024. Top notes are Ginger, Lemon and Black Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Sage and Cinnamon; base notes are Driftwood, Musk and Patchouli.

input: "Capturing the soul of an ancient historic Florentine pub at dawn, when the lights go out and the scent of memories comes alive."
output: Gioco all'Alba by Bois 1920 is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Gioco all'Alba was launched in 2024. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Eau d'Ombr Leather is described as a wildly radiant composition with leather notes made smoother and milder, mixing accords of rich amber, vanilla, glowing leather, and refreshing spices. The composition opens boldly with fresh ginger, coriander, and cardamom. The note of vanilla tincture stokes a glowing leather accord, a sensual flame grounded in a landscape of rich amber and honeyed woods.
Eau dOmbr Leather is packaged in a translucent black bottle with a faux-leather plaque. It is available in quantities of 10ml, 50ml, and 100ml.
output: Eau d'Ombr Leather by Tom Ford is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eau d'Ombr Leather was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Cardamom, Ginger and Coriander; middle notes are Vanilla and Leather; base note is Ambrofix.

The base notes feature Myrrh Essence, Vanilla Absolute Madagascar, Musk Accord, Amberwood Accord, and Sandalwood Accord.
output: Rockstud Noir by Valentino is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rockstud Noir was launched in 2024. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Milk and Woody Notes; base notes are Vanilla Absolute, Amberwood, Myrrh, Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Buio by Meo Fusciuni is a fragrance designed for both women and men, released in 2024. The perfume features a complex blend of notes, creating a rich and evocative scent experience.
output: Buio by Meo Fusciuni is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Buio was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giuseppe Imprezzabile. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Sel d'Ambre by Balmain captures the mystique of glittering desert nights in its reflective golden bottle. This fragrance features a captivating alchemy of glowing amber and the mineral and oceanic depth of salty ambergris. The opening captivates with warm spice rising from olibanum before the composition cools down with rukeri tea leaves. Caramelized ambers exult, carrying an opulent, long-lasting trail.
output: Sel d'Ambre by Pierre Balmain is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sel d'Ambre was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: A masculine fragrance pushed to the limit, where rich and robust sandalwood is elevated by a refined hint of spicy cardamom and a powdery touch of carrot to highlight a deep woody base.
output: Vibrant Leather & Sandalwood Elixir by Zara is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vibrant Leather & Sandalwood Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jrme Epinette. Top note is Cardamom; middle note is Carrot Seeds; base notes are Sandalwood and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Moderate, lively and intense watery citrus, with the bio-essence of an Amazonian rain. It carries the mixture of exuberant smells of the wet forest. With bioessence from an Amazonian rain.
output: Ryo Chuva by Natura is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ryo Chuva was launched in 2024. Ryo Chuva was created by Vernica Kato, Yves Cassar and Natasha Ct. Top notes are River Notes, Rain Notes and Mandarin; middle notes are Violet Leaf, Jasmine Sambac and Rose; base notes are Musk, Copahu Balm, Breu-Branco and Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Notes: Ambroxan, Australian oud, Clearwood, Cypriol, Fig, Fig leaf, Gaiac wood, Musk, Oakmoss, Orris root , Oud Assafi, Peru balsam, Rose, Saffron, Tolu balm, Vanilla.
output: Silky Woods Elixir by Goldfield & Banks Australia is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Silky Woods Elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Cresp.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Bvlgari Man Rain Essence is an invitation to experience the unstoppable creative power of water through the transformative and restorative power of rain. Powerful and indispensable as rain, Bulgari Man Rain Essence is a unique fresh woody musk fragrance permeated with clear and radiant notes. It is given strength by energetic mineral accords that bring to mind the purity of this rejuvenating natural element.
TOP NOTES: green tea essence and orange essence
MIDDLE NOTES: accord of white lotus and accord of crystalline musk
BASE NOTES: mineral amber accord and guaiac wood essence
Bvlgari Man Rain Essence is available as a 60ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Bvlgari Man Rain Essence by Bvlgari is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bvlgari Man Rain Essence was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Green Tea and Orange; middle notes are White Lotus and Musk; base notes are Guaiac Wood and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Guccis The Alchemists Garden is a Luxury Collection of sophisticated Eau de Parfums, Perfumed Oils, and Acque Profumate inspired by the art of alchemy. Captivated by the star-studded sky, the Gucci alchemist dreams of a new olfactory Gucci fragrance honouring the brightest star from the Lion constellation - Gucci The Heart of Leo. Guided by his brightness, the lion leaps from the sky in search of the worlds most precious ingredients. Knowing that resinous incense brings opulence to those who possess it, the lion jumps to the Arabic peninsula where Olibanum grows. Here, the noble creature encounters the tears of weeping trees, the bark exuding an unexpected, spicy scent that warms his heart. A symphony of balsamic resin traverses continents through golden winds, beckoning the lion to return to his homeland, Africa. As he follows the scent to yet another tree, he encounters the balsamic nectar of myrrh and its liquorice smoky undertones that liberate his soul. To sweeten his journey back to the moon, the lion garlands his mane in a blood-red blackcurrant accord. With the promise of dawn nearing, harmony returns as the lion resumes his position in the sky. Happy with the lions fabled journey, the Gucci alchemist carefully encases the fruity, ambery elixir and its night-sky-inspired story  in a black lacquered bottle. Much like the alchemist's ability to transform all that he touches into newfound wonders, this unisex Gucci fragrance is manufactured using alcohol made from 100% recycled carbon emissions.
Capturing the spirit of nature and distilling it into exquisite elixirs, The Alchemists Garden collection is composed of customisable Gucci fragrances intended to be layered together.
Each olfactory creation draws on a hero ingredient that changes and magnifies its character when worn with other Gucci scents.
The beauty of alchemy lies in the transformation: layered aromas that become new expressions of art and unfold the magic of unseen worlds.
The Gucci Heart of Leo unisex Gucci Eau de Parfum offers six recommended layering combinations, each designed to bring out the richness and opulence of its warm facets captured by its golden mane.
Create a warm incense with Gucci The Eyes of The Tiger.
When applied with Gucci The Heart of Leo, the blend of Incense, Myrrh & Oriental captivates with its golden intensity.
Envision a floral tapestry woven with the opulent Damask Rose essence of Gucci A Reason to Love.
Incense, Myrrh & Rose-infused Oud Accord summon sultry depths, revealing a gourmand and floral bouquet of aromas.|Add a touch of sweetness to the Myrrh with Gucci A Chant for the Nymph.
Infuse floral undertones into Incense & Myrrh with the Frangipani accord to create a sweet incense.
Enhance the Gucci fragrances rich character with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil.
A fresh Rose combined with Incense & Myrrh enriches the composition with its symphony of warm and fresh aromas.
Envelop yourself in the magic of the night with Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
A Musky Lavender invigorates the ambery blend of Incense & Myrrh, infusing a sense of freshness into the composition.
Unveil the richness of the ambery facets with Gucci A Forgotten Rose Perfumed Oil and Gucci Moonlight Serenade Acqua Profumata.
Rose & Lavender introduce floral hints to the Incense & Myrrh in this ambery aromatic olfactory creation.
output: The Heart of Leo by Gucci is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Heart of Leo was launched in 2024. Top note is Black Currant; middle note is Olibanum; base note is Myrrh.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Avant Garde by Riiffs is a fragrance that transcends the ordinary, crafted for those who seek a unique scent experience. It opens with invigorating top notes of zesty bergamot and vibrant citrus accords. The heart reveals exotic florals and captivating spices, with jasmine petals and spicy cardamom adding depth. The base notes include warm amber, velvety musk, and smoky vanilla, leaving a lasting impression. The sleek and modern bottle design reflects the avant-garde nature of the fragrance.
output: Avant Garde by Riiffs Perfumes is a Floral fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Avant Garde was launched in 2023. Top notes are Citrus and Bergamot; middle notes are Cardamom and Jasmine; base notes are Amber, Musk and Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 reveals the tonka bean in its most perfect olfactory expression at Guerlain and reveals a most addictive signature. Overdosed with natural tonka and a hint of coumarin, the deliciousness of the tonka bean is intoxicating, in an ultimate concentration of 30%.

Guerlain Perfumers enhance the almond facet of the tonka bean by enriching it with bitter almond essence and a microdose of coumarin. Pushing the addiction to its peak, the tonka bean becomes burning on contact with vanilla, cocoa and hot spices.

Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 is part of the Les Extraits Signature extract collection which embodies the quintessence of Guerlain trail. Paying homage to the alchemy of Guerlinade  the emblematic signature of the House  The Signature Extracts highlight each of the six raw materials that compose it and reveal its golden ratio.
output: Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 by Guerlain is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was launched in 2023. Tonka Sarrapia Extrait 75 was created by Delphine Jelk and Thierry Wasser.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Exhilarating. Fresh. Fruity.
Invigorating top notes of Yuzu, Mandarin and Pomelo burst with citrus while the middle notes of Melon and Mango add a fruity sweetness. The molecular base provides projection & longevity - which combined with Ozonic, Solar notes and aldehydes gives an experience of radiating energy that illuminates any atmosphere.
Top Notes: Pomelo, Yuzu, Mandarin
Middle Notes: Melon, Galbanum, Mango
Base Notes: Ozonic Notes, Aldehydes, Solar Notes
output: N4 Neon by Thomas Kosmala is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. N4 Neon was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Thomas Kosmala. Top notes are Pomelo, Yuzu and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Mango, Melon and Galbanum; base notes are Ozonic notes, Aldehydes and Solar Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Tom Ford Amber Intrigue is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024 under the Private Blend collection. Amber Intrigue Eau de Parfum wraps the wearer in an earthy start of fiery cinnamon sprinkled on lush dates, while the warmth of vetiver and sandalwood oils takes center stage, paving the way for a dry down of golden amber laced with resinous labdanum.
output: Amber Intrigue by Tom Ford is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Intrigue was launched in 2024. Amber Intrigue was created by Julien Rasquinet and Pascal Gaurin. Top notes are Dates, Olibanum and Cinnamon; middle notes are Sandalwood and Vetiver; base notes are Amber and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Discover Montblanc Legend Blue, a new facet of the Legend man: elegant, masculine, modern, and timeless. This new transparent bottle in blue lacquer reveals the Eau de Parfum inside. A woody, aromatic, and fresh Eau de Parfum: it resonates with the aromatic accord of mint and lavender and then reveals a woody heart with cedar and sandalwood. Finally, ambroxan combines with moss notes to create an intense olfactory aura. Zindine Zidane, with his charisma and natural elegance, is once again the face of this new Legend Blue perfume.
output: Legend Blue by Montblanc is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Legend Blue was launched in 2024. Top notes are Lavender and Mint; middle notes are Cedar and Sandalwood; base notes are Ambroxan and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Yves Saint Laurents Y Eau de Parfum Intense expresses the intoxicating moment when creative energy is released. As a long-lasting mens perfume, the YSL perfume impresses with its masculine scent. Fresh lavender from Provence and the woody note of patchouli from Bali ensure an intensely sensual fragrance experience. The mens fragrance of self-realization convinces in the heart note with lavender and geranium. In the base note, cedar wood and patchouli give the intense fragrance a woody note. Juniper berries in the top note complete the combination of cool and sensual.
output: Y Eau de Parfum Intense by Yves Saint Laurent is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Y Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Ginger, Juniper Berries and Bergamot; middle notes are Sage, Lavender and Geranium; base notes are Vetiver, Patchouli and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the ancient tales of Chinese imperial dragons and their mythical strengths, this new limited edition is designed around the notion that we all carry an invisible power.
A blend of olibanum and tonka bean spices, grounded with cedar wood, opens up to a warm, spicy heart. Jasmine adds luminosity while the dry down reveals a rich, intense signature, making it bold, mesmerizing and deeply comforting.
output: Auspicious Dragon by Rituals is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Auspicious Dragon was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A smile on your skin
Funky, carefree, delicious like a banana dessert inflamed with dark rum, sealed with oud and capsized with musk, with a tune from the 80s.
output: Banana Oud by Maie Piou is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Banana Oud was launched in 2024. Banana Oud was created by Clementine Humeau and Jean-Charles Sommerard.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Sandalwood, familiar ingredients are extracted in a higher concentration to create a longer-lasting scent with profound depths. 

The celebration of artisanship is visualised through a new perfume bottle which features a striking textural cap, inspired by traditional woodwork. Opening to reveal an atomizer spray engineered with more industrial leanings, considered juxtapositions craft a study in contrasts  a rarefied reinterpretation that stays true to the original signature.
output: Mojave Ghost Absolu by Byredo is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Mojave Ghost Absolu was launched in 2024. Top notes are Sapodilla and Ambrette; middle notes are Magnolia, Sandalwood and Violet; base notes are Amber, Musk and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Celebrating 13 years of our remarkable fragrant creations with a tribute to our customers most beloved perfumes.
Crafted with the same admired notes of White and White Oud White Overdose opens with vibrant Lemon freshness, that fades into the delicate heart of Iris, lending a soft and powdery floral touch. At its core, White Overdose features an overdose of Agarwood (Oud) in its most concentrated form, which grounds the composition in its lush, smoky warmth.
Amplifying every note with an overdose of unforgettable impressions, were revering our journey with a fragrance that continues to define it.
output: White Overdose by Emirates Pride Perfumes is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. White Overdose was launched in 2024. Top note is Lemon; middle note is Iris; base note is Agarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Star Chaser from Thomas Kosmala is a daring scent that invites you to dive head-first into a world of adventure. This perfume embodies the person who wishes to roam free, navigating the world at their own pace without the confines of societal pressures.
output: Star Chaser by Thomas Kosmala is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Star Chaser was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thomas Kosmala. Top notes are Neroli, Sea Notes and Green Apple; middle notes are Dry Wood and Tonka Bean; base notes are Sandalwood and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
As the sun dips below the horizon, Dubai transforms into a playground of enchantment and allure, and Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night becomes the scent of the city's nocturnal adventures. Picture yourself stepping into the booming energy of the night, where each scent note is a chapter in a captivating tale. At the outset, bergamot, saffron, and elemi cast a spell of anticipation, their citrusy and spicy fragrances hinting at the adventures to come. As the evening deepens, agarwood, Bulgarian rose, and lily of the valley emerge, evoking the romance and mystery of the Dubai night.
Finally, the base notes of white musk, tonka bean, amber, and oakmoss linger like whispers in the desert breeze, leaving an indelible mark on the senses. With Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night as your companion, every moment becomes an unforgettable journey through the enchanting streets of Dubai under the starlit sky.
output: Amber Oud Dubai Night by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Amber Oud Dubai Night was launched in 2024. Top notes are Saffron, Bergamot and elemi; middle notes are Agarwood, Bulgarian Rose and Lily of the Valley; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber, White Musk and Oakmoss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Eternal Touch by Maison Alhambra is a rich and seductive unisex fragrance from the oriental family. It opens with an intriguing mix of tobacco leaf and spices, creating a warm and inviting olfactory experience. The heart of the fragrance features a delicious accord of vanilla, cocoa, tonka bean, and tobacco flower, enriching the scent with velvety sweetness and spicy warmth. The base notes of dried fruits and precious woods add a sophisticated depth, with a robust and persistent base that lingers on the skin for hours. This fragrance is suitable for men and women looking for a balance between sweetness and intensity, ideal for any occasion.
output: Eternal Touch by Maison Alhambra is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Eternal Touch was launched in 2024. Top notes are Tobacco Leaf and Spicy Notes; middle notes are Vanilla, Cocoa, Tobacco Blossom and Tonka Bean; base notes are Dried Fruits and Woody Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"This first appeared at a perfume making workshop here in our Acton studio. Sarah was demonstrating the way that Hedione helps materials smell as if you've just walked outside into a garden and are standing right next to the real thing.
In honour of both Peter Rabbit and his arch nemisis, Mr McGregor, and in further honour of the master of translucence in perfumery, Jean Claude Ellena, creator of the Hermes Jardin series of fragrances, we set about making the scent of a cottage garden in the Lake District, complete with shed.
For batch two, if we make it at all, we'll have to tweak the formula because we did get a bit carried away with the materials: orris, tobacco (Mr McGregor has a pipe), blackcurrant bud, jasmine, parsnip, hay, lavender, cedar moss, vetivert and patchouli for a nice muddy base, cucumber and mushroom.
Equally evocative but not that expensive, notes of cut grass, leather, strawberries, lily of the valley, blackberries, celery and musk, because we think that musk smells like freshly washed bunnies.
We know that these don't all grow at the same time, but we're quite imaginative." -Brand website.
output: Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor by 4160 Tuesdays is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Sarah McCartney. Top notes are Strawberry, Grass and Mint; middle notes are Hay, Rose and Lavender; base notes are Tobacco, Moss and Mushroom.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Zara Man Green Savage Summer is a new fragrance for men, released in 2024. It offers a creamy-fruity scent profile, enhanced with aquatic and woody notes, making it a fresh choice for contemporary wear.
output: Zara Man Green Savage Summer by Zara is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Zara Man Green Savage Summer was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Ocean Blue by Zara is a new fragrance for men, released in 2024. It is part of the 'Ocean Selection' collection and features a blend of aromatic notes, cinnamon, lavender, resins, vanilla, and woods.
output: Ocean Blue by Zara is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Ocean Blue was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The minerality is given by different agreements combined with each other, explains Mathilde Bijaoui. Cold and spicy cardamom, incense, aromatic geranium, marine and leathery red algae  a magnificent ingredient reminiscent of musk. This minerality is what makes the fragrance unique."
output: For Him Vetiver Musc by Narciso Rodriguez is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. For Him Vetiver Musc was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathilde Bijaoui. Top notes are Cypress, Cardamon and Nutmeg; middle notes are Musk, Bourbon Geranium, Lavender, Red Algae and Frankincense; base notes are Vetiver, Patchouli and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid pera is a fragrance reminiscent of the dramatic performances at the Teatro Real opera house. Part of a collection of unisex scents inspired by LOEWEs home city.
output: pera by Loewe is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. pera was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A more concentrated version, DesirToxic L'intense.
Torrid, ambery, spicy, incandescent, explosive, bewitching and over-sensual, DesirToxic L'Intense perfume turns heads day and night.
output: DesirToxic L'Intense by M. Micallef is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. DesirToxic L'Intense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Romeo. Top notes are Saffron, Bergamot, Cardamom and Lemon; middle notes are Black Currant, Mint, Tonka Bean and Cinnamon; base notes are cannabis, Musk, Patchouli and Moss.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Egypt has always been a unique spot in the world, with trade routes, pharaohs, domination, and prosperity across history.
The Nile was an ever lasting part of the Egyptian Joy and Existense way far from being an ephemera.
Melding the ancient and the modern we used a nocturnal dose of ambergris with a daylight joyful dose of orange blossoms faceted with muguets and blooming citruses,
with courtesy to other ancient civilizations we dosed some ginger for the Chinese souls to portray a universal depiction of the Nile.
output: NILUS by Nilafar du Nil is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. NILUS was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Bergamot, Pear, Mandarin Orange and Ginger; middle notes are Jasmine, Lily of the Valley, Cedar and Orange Blossom; base notes are Ambergris, Musk, Woody Notes and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Santal Intense pays homage to the rich and captivating scent of sandalwood. The smooth sandalwood note is elevated by facets of spicy cardamom and black pepper that merge with the lavender in the heart, creating a classic woody fougre fragrance. An intensified amber woody base unfolds with a blend of amber and frankincense to deliver a richer, more enduring scent. The subtle combination of vanilla with tonka bean, adds a hint of sweetness and warmth, while the amber and frankincense provide a mystical quality that adds to the allure.
output: Santal Intense by Floris is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Santal Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Black Pepper, Lemon, Bergamot and Green Grass; middle notes are Clove, Lavender and Nutmeg; base notes are Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Frankincense, Vetiver, Vanilla, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Ex Nihilo The Hedonist Extrait de Parfum is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. This intense, lavish interpretation of the original creation opens with a refreshing blast of bergamot, luscious grapefruit, and spicy ginger. The heart is composed of the woody opulence of cedarwood and akigala wood with subtle undertones of lychee. The blend settles on the warmth of amberwood and tonka bean, along with dry patchouli and vetiver for added depth and character.
output: The Hedonist Extrait de Parfum by Ex Nihilo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. The Hedonist Extrait de Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernndez. Top notes are Grapefruit, Ginger and Bergamot; middle notes are Akigalawood, Lychee and Cedarwood; base notes are Amberwood, Vetiver, Tonka Bean and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Poivre Rubis is an invitation to a sensory journey where the exoticism of Timut pepper and the tangy sweetness of raspberry blend together. From the very opening, bergamot and black pepper awaken the senses, revealing a vibrant heart of Sichuan pepper and pink berries while a fresh and juicy raspberry accord unveils its character and almost ingenuous sweetness. The base, lightly woody with notes of olibanum incense and cashmere, establishes a velvety and captivating depth. Poivre Rubis is a fragrance that celebrates the art of blending spices and berries, offering an explosion of piquancy and sensuality.
output: Poivre Rubis by Superfumista is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Poivre Rubis was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Benjamin Sachs. Top notes are Sichuan Pepper, Black Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Sichuan Pepper, Pink Pepper and Raspberry; base notes are Woodsy Notes, Frankincense and Cashmeran.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: ORANGER SIROCCO was born out of a desire to imagine an olfactory landmark, a sensory compass that is both bright and joyful. This Eau de Parfum embodies a return to simpler values, presents itself as an ode to life, and aims to be somewhat contemplative. From the first notes, the mind is carried away by a warm, shimmering wind of sand, on the other side of the Mediterranean, in the heart of an orange blossom grove. With closed eyes, scents and sounds intertwine: the powerful and intoxicating fragrance of orange blossoms, echoing the distant hustle and bustle of a souk, where the aroma of spices mixes in waves, saturating the regular breath of the sirocco.
output: Oranger Sirocco by Les Indemodables is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oranger Sirocco was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Lie.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A scent synonymous with the centuries-old sport for Xerjoffs third year as Silver Partner for the Nitto ATP Finals in Turin.
Timeless and traditional, TORINO23 evokes the class and sophistication that lies at the heart of tennis.
TORINO23 awakens the senses with a fresh hit of bergamot, which settles as delicate hues of rose and cardamom combine in the top notes.
At the heart, a fusion of neroli and jasmine dance with the rich and heady tones of tuberose as the whole composition closes to a comforting blend of cashmere wood, amber and musk at the base. A sumptuous masterpiece that echoes the true sense of tradition and elegance.
OLFACTORY NOTES
Available as a 50ml Eau de Parfum
output: Torino23 by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Torino23 was launched in 2023. Top notes are Bergamot, Nutmeg, Rose and Cardamom; middle notes are Neroli, Tuberose, Jasmine and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Musk, Cashmere Wood, Amber, Patchouli and Cedarwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: The Ophidian Mango Bliss by Paris Corner is a unisex fragrance that combines fruity and woody elements. It features a zesty blend of mango, ginger, lemon, and red berries, complemented by warm woody notes, coumarin, and jasmine. The base notes of musk, amber, agarwood (oud), and cypriol oil create a lingering aroma.
output: Ophidian Mango Bliss by Paris Corner is a fragrance for women and men. Ophidian Mango Bliss was launched in 2024. Top notes are Mango, Lemon, Ginger and Red Berries; middle notes are Jasmine, Coumarin and Woody Notes; base notes are Musk, Agarwood, Oud, Amber and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Inspired by the drawers of the sacristy of the Paris cathedral.
It is the olfactory memory of Philip in Paris, during his visits to the sacristy of the cathedral. The person in charge of the sacristy loves to prepare an ever-changing mixture of incense, according to the numerous anniversaries of the liturgical year.
output: Notre Dame Notte di Natale by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Notre Dame Notte di Natale was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Incense, Amber and Tonka Bean; middle notes are Cinnamon, Cedarwood, Chocolate and Orange Blossom; base note is Virginia Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: "A perfectly unisex scent! Surprising, powerful, and utterly endearing... The heart composed of rose and jasmine flowers is reinforced by the astonishing leathery and tarry smell of saffron and the camphorous aroma of incense, until now rarely associated with jasmine! The base of musk and vanilla, captivating and sensual, is powerfully warmed by oud and Indian patchouli." -Brand website.
output: Rsolument Affranchi by Harold & Maude is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Rsolument Affranchi was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Nejla Barbir. Top notes are Rose and Jasmine; middle notes are Saffron and Incense; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Agarwood (Oud) and Indian Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: intense and enigmatic, a black leather note blends with wild and exquisite tobacco to reach the height of elegance, while addictive vanilla adds a fascinating trail.
output: Vibrant Leather & Tobacco Elixir by Zara is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Vibrant Leather & Tobacco Elixir was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jrme Epinette. Top note is Black Leather; middle note is Tobacco; base note is Vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Spice D'Arno by Electimuss is a rhythmical composition inspired by the flow of the Arno river. Opening with invigorating tones of bergamot, lemon, and pink pepper, it evokes the lively energy of a new adventure. The heart features thyme, cistus, and bran absolute, while the base is enriched with vanilla, oud, and myrrh, creating a warm and embracing scent.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

Inspired by the perfumer's visit to Lebanon, APOM is a flowery amber fougere built on a classic structure with a modern twist. The luminous top of orange blossom gives way to the beauty of aromatic lavender, leading to an alluring base of vanillic amber, comforting white musk, and the sunny smile of ylang-ylang.
output: APOM by Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. APOM was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Crafted for Lovers, this aromatic aphrodisiac reflects the unadulterated bliss of romantic interludes and shared pleasure. Reassuringly sensual, gratifyingly decadent - a softly seductive and potent warm woody fragrance that settles on the skin like the golden glow of new unions.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
SHAMANIC AWAKENING
A brisk Bergamot washes over you like a draft of glacial air. You feel the cold grip of Pink Pepper, the slight tingle of Pimento Berry in your fingers and a Frankincense encapsulating your past and your future.
 
A deep breath fills your lungs with the fierce and smoky scent of Sand Vetiver and of an animalic Rose whose weathered tobacco accents tame the tension between an earthy Papyrus and a silken touch of Sandalwood.
 
Yet this is roads end, where the sun is always high, and rays of aldehydic Mystikal suddenly spear through Saffron and Suede, your leathery cloak of doubts, to kindle a mist of Akigalawood, shimmering like a swarm of fireflies.
 
A vertical totem of mineral woods and stellar sparks of spice, Purpose is a shamanic awakening, the scent of feeling at peace, of finding your roots, of feeling complete.
output: Purpose by Amouage is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Purpose was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Olibanum, Black and Pink Pepper, Pimento and Bergamot; middle notes are Vetiver, Papyrus, Sandalwood and Rose; base notes are Akigalawood, Saffron, Suede and Mystikal.

The vibrant top notes lead to a lavish floral heart of rose, tuberose, violet, and jasmine, elevated by cinnamon bark and fortified by oris and patchouli. The blend settles on an intense base of warming amber, vetiver, velvety cashmere, Mysore sandalwood, resinous benzoin, opoponax, tonka bean, and vanilla.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Three years in the making, the inspiration came when ROS was launched in 2020. George was applying NOIR on his skin and then shortly thereafter applying ROS on the top. It was a magical fragrance - and he got to work with Claude on a "NOIRROS" fragrance. It turned out to be exactly as was hoped, NOIR with ROS. But it was too "safe" - and George Zaharoff set out with Master Perfumer Claude Dir to develop a Halfeti Black Rose from scratch, apart and distinctive from any of the other Zaharoff fragrances in the Signature collection, including the Rose Athonite ROS.
Imagine fighting through a thick thorn bush forest to get to that one magical black rose, this is the inspiration behind Black Rose! Deep, mystical, sensual - this is a serious masculine scent!
output: Signature Halfeti Black Rose by Zaharoff is a Floral fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Signature Halfeti Black Rose was launched in 2024. Top notes are Black Pepper, Bergamot and Basil; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Black Rose, Cedarwood, Amber, Musk and Tonka Bean; base notes are Vetiver, Frankincense, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Musk, Oud and Labdanum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Ruy Lopez captivates as a distinctive and enthralling fragrance, designed for inquisitive visionaries. Harmoniously blending black tea and exotic spices with tantalizing undertones of succulent black cherry, supple leather, and aged oakwood, this perfume scent exudes an air of inscrutable sophistication. Celestial whispers of rose and davana bestow an added layer of opulence and refinement, weaving together an olfactory tapestry that is simultaneously reminiscent of the familiar, yet undeniably extraordinary.
"Ruy Lopez paints a picture of dark and mysterious sophistication. Black Tea leads the fragrance with kisses of black pepper and cherry, delivering a deep, wine-like fruitiness with a hint of spice. A thread of patchouli and notes of dark plum come together along with rich leather to wrap the fragrance in an aura of boozy, elegant suede." -Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Ruy Lopez by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ruy Lopez was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Cherry, Black Pepper and Black Tea; middle notes are Davana, Rum and Rose; base notes are Oak, Leather and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Icon is a captivating perfume belonging to the Fougere Marine fragrance family. This family is typically known for their fresh and aquatic characteristics, making them ideal for individuals who enjoy the refreshing and clean scents reminiscent of the sea. It opens with an invigorating burst of apple and cardamom, reminiscent of a brisk sea breeze, while the clary sage adds a touch of herbal complexity.
The heart reveals a harmonious blend of aquatic accords, jasmine, and lily of the valley, creating a serene and elegant aura. As the fragrance evolves, warm amber, woody cedar, and sumptuous leather create a rich and inviting base that lingers on the skin, leaving a lasting impression of elegance and allure.
This combination of fruity, herbal, floral, and woody notes creates a dynamic olfactory experience that can be worn on various occasions, making it suitable for both daytime and evening wear for any occasion.
output: Icon by MAISON ASRAR is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Icon was launched in 2023. Top notes are Clary Sage, Cardamom and Apple; middle notes are Lily of the Valley, Aquatic notes and Jasmine; base notes are Cedarwood, Leather and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
SPICEBOMB INFRARED Eau de Parfum is the most carnal and intense fragrance in the Spicebomb collection. This highly captivating scent for men is the result of a collaboration between three renowned perfumers: Jean Christophe Herault, Carlos Benaim, and Nicolas Beaulieu. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum is an erotic explosion of spices built around a seductive leather accord.
From the first whiff, your senses will be ignited by a combination of chili pepper, pink pepper, and the aphrodisiac essence of cinnamon. The heart of the fragrance reveals a fiery red habanero pepper that arouses the skin with its scorching touch. At its base, the fragrance is grounded by notes of resinous wood and the animalistic allure of leather, adding infinite sensuality to the scent. Unapologetically bold, Spicebomb Infrared is more than just a sensual and carnal fragrance; it is truly erotic.
Housed in the collection's signature grenade-shaped bottle, the design is enhanced with a powerful red hue for this edition. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum is available in 50ml and 90ml sprays, ready to be unleashed for an explosive fragrance experience.
output: Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum by Viktor&Rolf is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. Spicebomb Infrared Eau de Parfum was created by Carlos Benam, Nicolas Beaulieu and Jean-Christophe Hrault. Top notes are Cinnamon, Chili Pepper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Chili Pepper and Leather; base notes are Resins and Woodsy Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
The Feeling: You and your date sit at a small round table illuminated by candlelight, enjoying old fashioneds and each others company. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tom Ford launched Grey Vetiver in 2009 as a woody-spicy scent in Eau de Perfume concentration. In 2014, the house introduced its fresher, more luminous and lighter versionGrey Vetiver Eau de Toilette. In 2023, the collection ins expanded by the new edition - Grey Vetiver Parfum.
Described as a bolder iteration of the original, Grey Vetiver Parfum is inspired by Tom Ford's impeccable tailoring and styling. A trio of sustainably sourced vetivers are used to exude intense radiance. The notes of fresh orange blossom give way to saffron, as the world's most expensive spice. The fragrance elicits the essence of debonair masculinity, merging natural, sustainably sourced vetiver with warm orange flower and rich spices.
"If you go into our stores, grey is the color of the packaging, our carpets, and our walls; in a sense it's the Tom Ford color. The idea was to convey a cool, silvery, very refined vetiver." -TOM FORD.
Available in bottles of 50 and 100 ml.
output: Grey Vetiver Parfum by Tom Ford is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Grey Vetiver Parfum was launched in 2023. Top note is Orange Blossom; middle note is Saffron; base note is Haitian Vetiver.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
WHO IS ELIJAH is thrilled to announce the launch of their latest olfactory masterpiece, "OCEAN EYES," a unisex fragrance designed to captivate the senses and transport individuals to the depths of the crisp, blue ocean. OCEAN EYES is set to make waves in the fragrance industry, embodying a unique blend of citrusy, salty, and fresh notes that evoke the sensation of a deep plunge into the invigorating depths.
Unveiling a harmonious fusion of grapefruit and mandarin orange, OCEAN EYES opens with a burst of brightness, enlightening the senses with an exhilarating citrus symphony. The addition of Sea Salt and Juniper encapsulates the essence of a refreshing oceanic experience, stimulating the energy that courses through the body. As the fragrance unfolds, lingering notes of musk and amberwood provide a gentle warmth, akin to the caress of the sun on the skin during moments lost in the deep blue eyes of the ocean.
I love the ocean, and I love the feeling of home  both have always been so intertwined to me growing up and living in the coastal town of Cronulla, Sydney, my whole life, said Raquel Bouris, Founder & Creative Director. My Dad has always asked me for a fragrance that was more his type of scent (less wood heavy), and OCEAN EYES pays tribute to and is inspired by both my home and my Dad.
output: Ocean Eyes by Who is Elijah is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ocean Eyes was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Raquel Bouris.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Queening is a celebration of achieving one's goals, symbolizing a journey through challenges, and overcoming obstacles to emerge stronger and renewed. This exquisite perfume fragrance combines the royal scent of Orris with the sweetness of vanilla, creating an uplifting opening, followed by aged rum and saffron. Dedicated to daily successes, major accomplishments, and the rewards they bring, this captivating scent empowers all current and aspiring Queens.
"Undeniably loved by all, Queening brings the most desirable notes of clean cotton, creamy orris and vanilla together in a dreamy, cocooning blend. Fluffy musks, rum and coconut embody the enveloping gourmand elements of comfort and nourishment." - Christelle Laprade, Perfumer.
output: Queening by Mind Games is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Queening was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christelle Laprade. Top notes are Cotton Flower, Apple and Cypress; middle notes are Orris Root, Rum and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla, Coconut and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A distinguished rose combining power and gentleness.
Rose Amira is a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
The Allegoria fragrance collection celebrates the wonders of the world. Each creation pays tribute to natures beauty and sweeps us up in a discovery of exceptional raw ingredients and notes, beautifully enhanced by our perfumer-explorers. Discover Rose Amira, a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
"Rose Amira is my vision of rose, sumptuous and sensual within the secrecy of the night. A rose stood upright, turned towards the moon, within a poetic, nocturnal fragrance. - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer   Absolus Allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the worlds wonders once night falls fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.
A powerful symbol of Guerlain's commitment to the planet, Absolus Allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural origin. The French beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.  Rose Amira comes in the Allegoria collections emblematic bottle made in France using 15% recycled glass. Featuring a removable spray pump and transparent lacquer finish, its design can be easily recycled. 90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, by ISO 16128, the calculation includes water.
output: Rose Amira by Guerlain is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rose Amira was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Isola Blu is a five-star vacation captured in a fragrance; just one spritz of this sophisticated citrus perfume surrounds you in the scent of endless summer.
Luminous Citrus notes shine upon warm Oriental and Pink Pepper, feeling like a day spent beneath the Mediterranean sun. A coastal breeze billows across a verdant lemon grove as fresh Herbs an juicy Fruits freshen a garden of green, earthy notes. Bringing an indulgent quality, creamy Champaca, Jasmine and Coconut melt into a hint of leather - a nod to fine Italian craftmanship. - ROJA DOVE.
Top Notes: Lemon, Bergamot, Lime, Lavender, Thyme
Heart Notes: Apple, Blackcurrant, Coconut, Orange Blossom, Jasmin de Grasse, Lily, Champaca
Base Notes: Cut Grass, Mat, Galbanum, Pink Pepper, Aniseed, Patchouli, Oakmoss, Cedarwood, Juniper Berry, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Oriental, Orris, Birch, Leather, Orientalgris, Musk

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Electimuss Caspian Cherry is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. Caspian Cherry is a rich and seductive fragrance, evoking the lush allure of cherries framed by an elegant gourmand accord. It opens with the playful charm of almond liqueur and the juiciness of black cherries, balanced by the depth of bittersweet dark chocolate. As the fragrance unfolds, a warm note of spiced honey drizzles over soft coconut, adding complexity. The gourmand richness intensifies with a bold hit of coffee, softened by the gentle warmth of vetiver. Powdery tonka keeps the cherry note alive throughout, while creamy sandalwood and smooth white chocolate create an irresistibly delectable drydown.
output: Caspian Cherry by Electimuss is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caspian Cherry was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Kevin Mathys. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
In the midst of darkness that dances with light, a fragrancecaptures the essence of a genius who challenged his Time,turning contrasts and passions into eternal masterpieces.
IN EXTREMIS is dedicated to Caravaggio, observer of humanity, imperfect Master. A tribute to his art, a journey that delves into the depths ofexpression. For those who live passionately, embracingcontrast as a source of inspiration.
Our love for Caravaggio pays homage to his revolutionaryart, his restless spirit, and his ability to transform thecanvas into a mirror of the soul. A genius that transcendstime, an artist who has left an indelible mark on the heartsof those, like us, who find continual inspiration in his work.
This perfume is an invitation to travel beyond the boundaries of the known, to explore the depths of the humanspirit, to live every moment with fierce passion..
output: In Extremis by Astrophil & Stella is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. In Extremis was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Giuseppe Imprezzabile. instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This fragrance is a fougre amber scent that is magnetic and vibrant, designed to encourage individuals to show their authentic selves to the world. The inspiration behind the AUTHENTIC SELF perfume line is to empower people to be confident in their uniqueness and express it boldly.
The fragrance opens with refreshing cardamom, adding depth to the geranium flowers, while the Fve Tonka provides a rich and infinite dimension to the scent. The resulting aroma is invigorating and uplifting, perfect for those looking for a fresh and dynamic fragrance.
According to Frank Voelkl, the Master Perfumer who created this fragrance, it was inspired by the "luminosity of a summer morning" and the energy it brings for new perspectives. The fragrance itself is described as a "revigorating" scent with bold amber accents, and a mix of cardamom and geranium for added depth. The fve tonka note gives the fragrance an "infinite richness".
The AUTHENTIC SELF men's perfume bottle is designed with the brand's signature elegance, featuring a thick and heavy blue glass bottle that is both modern and timeless. The metallic and magnetic cap adds to the sophistication of the design, while the cork-inspired label with the Abercrombie & Fitch logo adds a touch of uniqueness and originality to the overall aesthetic.
The overall message of the Authentic Self fragrance is to encourage people to be themselves without hesitation and to embrace their unique experiences and achievements.
TOP NOTES: Chinese ginger, cypress, Guatemalan cardamom
MIDDLE NOTES: freesia, violet leaf, Egyptian geranium
BASE NOTES: Madagascar vanilla, cedar from Virginia, tonka bean from Brazil.
output: Authentic Self Man by Abercrombie & Fitch is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Authentic Self Man was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Frank Voelkl. Top notes are Cypress, Ginger and Cardamom; middle notes are Violet Leaf, Freesia and Geranium; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Virginia Cedar and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Discover This Is Really Him!, the new men's fragrance from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE. A juice for lovers who engage in a passionate adventure, continuing through the streets of Paris as night falls and gives way to a new day.
The most intense men's perfume from ZADIG&VOLTAIRE With This Is Really Him!, perfumer Nathalie Lorson (the nose behind the This Is Him!) collection brings to life ZADIG&VOLTAIREs most intense fragrance to date. The fragrance opens with a refreshing cocktail of top notes, combining intense grapefruit and sparkling lemon. This refreshing intensity then gives way to the captivating heart of the juice: a metallic accord of orange blossom. As the fragrance evolves on the skin, lively notes of palo santo accord and amber woods create a seductive trail, for a magnetic and powerful scent that will follow you day and night.
A perfume bottle that breaks conventions As luxurious as it is subversive, the bottle of This Is Really Him! is bathed in a bold silver hue, inspired by the lively shadows of an unforgettable Parisian night. The iconic ZADIG&VOLTAIRE label has a metallic finish, which echoes the metallic accord of the composition and fits with Zadig's signature bold and elegant aesthetic.
Available as 50ml and 100ml Eau de Toilette Intense starting mid-January 2024.
output: This Is Really Him! by Zadig & Voltaire is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. This Is Really Him! was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are Graperfuit and Lemon; middle notes are Metallic notes and Orange Blossom; base notes are Palo Santo and Amberwood.

The scent is intensified by the use of OrientalXtreme, providing a long-lasting and sensual trail. The bottle design is inspired by extreme sailing boats, lacquered in a deep blue to represent the ocean depths and features the iconic Prada red line, symbolizing innovation. The elegant night-black cap is finished with a red dot, referencing Luna Rossa, the red moon.
Prada's Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum for men is a seductive fragrance that blends strength and refinement, using advanced technology and natural elements. The composition starts with a refreshing burst of grapefruit essence, paired with the robust essence of frankincense and a luxurious vanilla bean accord to create a woody and captivating aroma.
Available as a 50 and 100 ml EDP.
output: Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum by Prada is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. Top note is Grapefruit; middle notes are Woody Notes and Frankincense; base notes are Vanilla and Amber Xtreme.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Triumphant by The Dua Brand is an exquisite fragrance crafted by the same renowned nose who brought us iconic scents like Davidoff's Cool Water and Creed's Green Irish Tweed. This fragrance pays homage to the timeless Kouros by Yves Saint Laurent, a statuesque release from 1981 that continues to captivate fragrance enthusiasts today. Although there have been reformulations over the years, resulting in decreased performance, at The Dua Brand, we ensure that every fragrance we release showcases our traditional strength. Triumphant, our inspired expression of this aromatic fougre fragrance, outperforms the original with its opening of bright aldehydes and smooth coriander. Its heart of aromatic carnation and artemisia exudes class and sophistication, while base notes of oakmoss and leather evoke the greatness that characterized perfumes in the 1980s. With Triumphant, you will feel elevated to victorious heights, encompassing pride and dignity.
Key Notes: Aldehydes, Coriander, Clary Sage, Artemisia, Bergamot, Patchouli, Carnation, Vetiver, Cinnamon, Geranium, Jasmine, Orris Root, Civet, Honey, Leather, Musk, Oakmoss, Oriental, Tonka Bean, Vanilla. Triumphant belongs to the olfactory group of Aromatic Fougre fragrances.
output: Triumphant by The Dua Brand is a Leather fragrance for men. Triumphant was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Zelen translates to green in Serbian. This scent is Vetiver, as it was meant to be celebrated.
It is refined, elegant, and classic. Teeming with balanced bittersweet Pink Peppercorn and Italian Bergamot spice, underscored by effervescent Green Cardamom. Delicate yet demanding. Transcendent Mexican Lime and fragrant Beeswax Absolute bound in the warm, musky embrace of Haitian Vetiver, Mysore Sandalwood and Virginia Cedar. Capped with Italian Carrara marble, Zelen is perennial and epicene.
Perfume is often cited as the most intense form of memory. It conjures images and events, a cinematic experience all of your own making.
The Serbian heritage of our founder and perfumer, Boris Zrnic, defines Bokas entire lexicon. Boka is the affectionate childhood nickname used by his family and immediately became the working title of our scent collection.
Boris spent much of his childhood in naturethe other primary pillar of the brand. The worlds natural wonders seep heavily into our scents, as nearly every fragrance note derives from an element found in nature.
We hope these scents spark your sense of nostalgia in nature.
TOP NOTES: Italian Bergamot, Mexican Lime, Japanese Yuzu
HEART NOTES: Pink Peppercorn, Green Cardamom, Beeswax Absolute
BASE NOTES: Haitian Vetiver, Virginia Cedar, Mysore Sandalwood

Zelen is available as a 100ml Extrait de Parfum.
output: Zelen by Boka is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Zelen was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Boris Zrnic. Top notes are Lime, Yuzu and Bergamot; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Beeswax and Cardamom; base notes are Haitian Vetiver, Virginia Cedar and Mysore Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"The evocation of sweetness, an invitation to the tenderness of childhood, the age when the senses awaken, where a child's laughter enchants and dreams reign. In 1970, a fragrance line called Baby Dior was born: today, it is reborn with a collection full of softness, inspired by the "Bonne toile" (Lucky Star).

Bonne toile is the scented water for babies and children from Baby Dior, a poetic co-creation born of the encounter between Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, who composed the fragrance, and Cordlia de Castellane, Artistic Director of Baby Dior, who imagined the dreamy decor of the bottles.

This scented water is formulated without alcohol and with 98%* natural-origin ingredients. It is a childhood memory that comes to life in soft notes of pear, wild rose, and white musks.

The pastel-coloured bottle of Bonne toile is adorned with an imaginary and fantastical garden of Granville, featuring a menagerie and colorful hot air balloons, a Toile de Jouy pattern specially created for the occasion.

More than a scented water, it is an object imbued with reverie that can be personalised with the colored ribbon of your choice to accompany your child like their lucky star."
Pear Note: A juicy, dewy, and green note.
Wild Rose Note: A soft floral note.
White Musk Note: A cottony, velvety note.
"For Baby Dior, I wanted to create a scented water for little ones that is as simple as they are. A child says 'yes,' says 'no,' 'I like' or 'I don't like.' A formula imposed itself, like an impulse, a smile. I wanted to bypass the inevitable orange blossom, which has long been the signature scent of childhood, and find a soothing fragrance in a different formula: a dewy and green pear note, brightened by wild rose, wrapped in soft, cottony, protective musks.

Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior
Available in two shades (pink and green) as 100 ml Eau de Senteur.
output: Bonne toile Baby Dior by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bonne toile Baby Dior was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Green Pear; middle note is Wild Rose; base note is White Musk.

My scent, MYSLF.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Scouring the smoldering sands of the Western Sahara, Moroccan truffle hunters came across an awe-inspiring discovery.
Scattered in the sand, a lunar meteorite whose name has been given to the latest perfume in the Shooting Stars collection was found: Aridal.
Aridal opens to soft spicy nutmeg and pink pepper specks, distinguishing yet graceful, alluring the senses to a charismatic heart of orris, cashmere wood, and jasmine that caresses the skin. Papyrus, benzoin and dry woods at the base perfectly round up this dusty, dreamlike scent.
Aridal is enthroned in a luxurious case embedded with a certified meteorite fragment.

output: Aridal by Xerjoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aridal was launched in 2023. Top notes are elemi, Cypress, Nutmeg and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Patchouli, Orris Root, Cashmere Wood and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Papyrus, Benzoin and Dry Wood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
... is like looking for spaces in a hand
In the mushy squares of red loneliness
In the keys of a love changed in the night,
in the stones that stain life,
in that barefoot polished asphalt.
Because the skin has flown
Into a blue smoke
And in a moon that moves a sea
that cries.

When the sun sets and the heat of the day gives way to the coolness of night, the atmosphere is charged with an energy with a taste of mystery.
The city lights come on, but the adventures and excitement are far from them... we search for them by walking by the sea, where the figures are undefined and where we sense only the sea and a few car in the distance.
Time passes, and the summer night invites us to get lost and let ourselves be carried blend with the tar of a newly renovated street next door.
Everything is made possible under the reflections of the moon, sitting and looking at an undefined landscape that turns black to blue.
They are passions of everyone, for everyone, of a minute or an entire night...those that are fixed forever, for the usual sip of memory.
SUBJECT: Oak Mosses, Musk, Oriental
COUNTER SUBJECT: Coconut Cream, Iris Rhizome
TAIL: Pine Tar, Tangerine
output: La Voglia d'aMare by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. La Voglia d'aMare was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Pine tar and Tangerine; middle notes are Coconut and Orris; base notes are Oakmoss, Musk and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

The heart of the new fragrance is characterized by creamy notes of fig, already the protagonist of K Eau de Parfum, embellished by the addition of warm and spicy facets of saffron and enhanced by the unforgettably elegant woody base, built on deep and sensual tones of a leathery accord  says Daphne Bugey . The combination of these elements lays the foundation for an even more powerful olfactive journey.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Zoologist Penguin by Chiaki Nomura
Top Notes: Antarctic Air, Ice Accord, Juniper Berry
Heart Notes: Pink Pepper, Saffron, Ciste Absolute
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Musks, Seamoss, Suede
Emperors they may be, but when a massive cyclone unleashes its merciless austral winds, the colony of penguins bow to its power. It's from such extremes that the male penguin must guard his precious bundle. Passed tenderly from mother to father, the egg is their shared purpose. She embarks on a perilous odyssey to the sea for food. He begins his own monotonous march, packed tightly in a circle of trudging penguins. So intent is he on protecting his egg that even the dazzling aurora australis against a lonely night sky escapes his notice.
Zoologist Penguin opens with saffron caught upon a salty blast of crisp antarctic air. Against the cool desolation, anticipation glimmers as lively aromas of pink pepper and sea moss swirl over musks, suede and sandalwood. Brace yourself for a vibrant scent that Is always invigorating, a reminder of natures harsh reality in a welcome blast.
output: Penguin by Zoologist Perfumes is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Penguin was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Chiaki Nomura. Top notes are Ozonic notes, Ice and juniper berry; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Saffron and Labdanum; base notes are Suede, Moss, Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
This is a story of grief, luck and grind. Everything is a part of me and my message can be perceived by all senses that touch your soul: visual, tactile, flagrant and musical.
The story of the name is a mystery that you can read only on the back of the label, through the oil. My grandmas passing had a strong impact on me, as a 7 year old boy and the feeling of grief inspired me to create this perfume.
The smell of incense and summer flowers that are slowly drying in the sun are remembered in the fragrance.
The leather label represents the pain that I endured and overcame, becoming stronger every day.
The peppercorn smell compliments the aroma well and 7 of them can be found in the bottle as my lucky number is 7. The motto is placed casually on the front of the bottle but delivers the strongest message: God is everywhere and I believe in Him.

The box has been packed with the same attention to detail that characterize the product, containing 6 hand made postcards. Each image was crafted by my tattoo artist and is imprinted in my skin.
You can also find my favorite playlist to fully immerse you in the experience.
output: Take me to Church by Toskovat' is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Take me to Church was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is David-Lev Jipa-Slivinschi. Top notes are Elemi resin, Dust, Black Pepper, Aldehydes, Solar Notes, Pink Pepper, Saffron and Cloves; middle notes are elemi, Pepper, Olibanum, Frankincense, Candle Wax, Myrrh, Resin, Flowers, Leather, Cedar and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha; base notes are Stone, Tar, Ambrette, Guaiac Wood, Musk and Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that captures the essence of a specific place or sentiment, expertly crafted by renowned French brand Stphane Humbert Lucas. Released in 2022, this fragrance is an amber vanilla composition that is both boozy and citrusy, with sweet undertones and a richly exotic aroma. The opening notes feature a generous spice from the whiskey accord, while the cacao adds a gentle sweetness alongside the tonka beans. Earthy tones of cedar and patchouli complete the base, providing a natural finish that leaves a lasting impression. Dancing Sand is available in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intense scent experience. The notes of Dancing Sand include whiskey, mandarin orange, coriander, cashmeran, cacao, sandalwood, tonka beans, cedar wood, benzoin, and patchouli. This fragrance offers a complex and multi-dimensional scent profile that combines the warmth of whiskey with the freshness of mandarin orange and the spice of coriander. The cacao adds a touch of sweetness, while the sandalwood and cedar wood contribute to the woody aspect of the fragrance. With its unique blend of notes, Dancing Sand falls under the olfactory group of Oriental Vanilla, offering a harmonious balance between warm amber accords and creamy vanilla undertones.
output: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. Dancing Sand was launched in 2023.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
We went back in time, to one of the oldest desserts-BAKLAVA. Yes, that is correct, baklava!
The origins of baklava date back to ancient times. Around the eighth century B.C.E., people in the Assyrian Empire (which spread across parts of modern-day Iraq, Iran, Kuwait, Syria, and Turkey) arranged unleavened flatbreads into layers, with chopped nuts in-between, to be enjoyed during special events. Centuries later, the Ancient Greek and Roman baklava was a dish consisting of many layers of dough, filled with cheese and honey, and flavored with bay leaves. However, the earliest versions of baklava as we know it today came around 500 years ago, during the Ottoman Empire. In fact, one of the oldest Baklava stores still exists and claims to be 130 years old!
output: Signature AURUM by Zaharoff is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature AURUM was launched in 2023. Top notes are Honeycomb, Cinnamon and Clove; middle notes are Walnut, Hazelnut, Almond and Coconut Milk; base notes are Praline, Vanilla, Tonka Bean and Amber.
