instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
A daring, innovative scent inspired by the lightness and delicacy of the famous dessert of the same name, Pavlova is a celebration of sweetness and freshness, evoking the grace of a dance between sweet and sour flavours.
Pavlovas theatrical opening is an invitation to discover the tangy gourmet notes of sparkling pineapple, passion fruit and coconut, creating an unapologetic sense of the exotic.
There is also a raspberry note whose rich, fruity nuances have a surprising depth. This sweet and slightly bitter red berry adds a fascinating intricacy, balancing the lightness of other fruity notes such as peach.
Pavlova is a fragrance enhanced by a combination of woody notes like cedar and sandalwood, a reassuring contrast to the light, fruity notes. Vanilla and musk harmoniously entwine to sign this original composition recalling the airy, melting meringue of the Pavlova.
A sparkling sensory experience evoking joy, youth and freedom, Pavlova is a nod to the limitless creativity of perfumery.
Available as 30ml, 100ml and 250ml Eau de Parfum.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Caf Tabac - A hedonistic scent that celebrates the undocumented moment.
A sumptuous party that goes on for days. Endless dinners and all-night merengue dancing under charcoal skies. Smoke meets flower and spice settles in for the next inhale. This is CAF TABAC.
Before Aedes de Venustass newest scent was realized in a bottle, it had a name: CAF TABAC, inspired by the iconic 90s bar in the East Village. Upstairs at Cafe Tabac was where Kate met Johnny, Madonna picked up the phone, Leo picked up supermodels. It was a place where the truly glamorous could be truly off-duty, an unselfconscious, pre-cell phone era that feels so far away as to be longed for again.
Its the deep mood of a place to be, creating its own legend, says perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. The deep blue smoke of cigarettes, cigars, weed  whatever. Were exploring other paradises: laughs, desires, and pleasures, again and again.
That spirit was also present when Duchaufour and Gerstner went to visit the Dominican Republic last year for another scented project. It was an explosion of vibrant and chic people from Mexico, France, Rio, New York; different cultures and conversations and ideas and opinions, says Gerstner. We went from a tropical forest to the coast together, but it wasnt until we were standing in a cigar factory that I looked at Bertrand and said, Can you put this in a bottle?
The result is as dazzling, sexy, and complex as the trip: It opens with sparkling notes of expected (bergamot) and unexpected (apple, tamarind) fruits but the overall perfume is an homage to tobacco in many forms. Dry leaves, humid flowers, and a cigar lit by fire are represented thanks to herbal clary sage and davana, a tint of mango with dried fig and date, and a rough smokiness using tobacco absolute, tar, cade, and cedarwood. An amber accord of secretions and sugars from cistus and labdanum, ambergris, oakmoss, vanilla, cacao accord and Peru balm at the heart gives way to a darkly rich and resinous base. There is no saccharine here. Instead, distinctive burnt sugar and fresh clove and cardamom are infused with vapors that keep CAFE TABAC multilayered instead of perfectly round. It is blended at a twenty percent concentration made in the old school haute parfumerie style, including a month-long maceration in France.
With CAFE TABAC, there is a mad sensuality that feels like the olfactive equivalent of a twist of orange atop a demitasse of espressorich with a touch of freshness and tang. To wear it is to maintain a state of heightened emotions that are sooner remembered than they are recorded.
output: Caf Tabac by Aedes de Venustas is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caf Tabac was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.

Like skilled cellar masters, Guerlain Perfumers create a new blend from their secret reserve to elevate the elegance of Habit Rouge, making it more refined than ever. A masterful reinterpretation of the myth, an exceptional fragrance with hints of spirits. In the utmost secrecy, the facets of vanilla become liqueur-like, thanks to an accord known only to the house of Guerlain.
For the precious Habit Rouge Rouge Priv edition, this contrasting olfactory journey takes on a more noble and exclusive character than ever before. A splendid homage by Guerlain Perfumers to the first amber fragrance for men, this new composition reinvents its legendary patchouli, vanilla, and leather accord in a more sensual and intense blend. Notes of tanned leather mingle with the warmth of vanilla and captivating patchouli to reveal an exceptional interpretation of Habit Rougean outstanding Rouge Priv.
"Rouge Priv reinterprets the Habit Rouge myth with a new exceptional blend. The signature leather facet, played in overdose and combined with bergamot and patchouli, becomes even more sensual and intense." - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer Product Benefit.
Inspired by the world of spirits, Habit Rouge Rouge Priv is an extraordinary reinterpretation of the original Habit Rouge. Notes of tanned leather blend with the warmth of vanilla and captivating patchouli to reveal an exceptional interpretation of the myth.
output: Habit Rouge Rouge Priv by Guerlain is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Habit Rouge Rouge Priv was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Bergamot and Ginger; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Iris; base notes are Leather, Vanilla and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
We combined four types of jasmine oils, each offering a distinct olfactory journey, and blended it with a base of incense oils. This is BLOOM; a feminine sweetness accompanied by a masculine wildness.
White jasmine, with its sweet and floral notes. Unlike others in the family, it has a slight animalic edge that gives a musk experience.
Arabian jasmine used in alternative medicine for its healing and soothing properties, gives a fruitier, almost vanilla experience. Considered the most fragrant jasmine.
Egyptian jasmine lends a timeless elegance to the blend, with its sophisticated floral bouquet and subtle hints of earthiness, evoking visions of ancient gardens steeped in history and tradition.
Star jasmine stands out from the other types. While it shares the classic jasmine features of a five-point flower, it belongs to the "dogbane" family; unlike white, Arabian, and Egyptian jasmine, which are part of the olive family. Star jasmine has a distinct appearance resembling a "pinwheel" and takes center stage on the front of the BLOOM box. Unlike other jasmines, it has a sweeter scent and lacks the typical indolic or animalic notes.
Together, these four jasmine oils create a harmonious fusion of scents, inviting the wearer on a captivating olfactory voyage through the lush gardens of the imagination.
"Zaharoff Signature BLOOM, a jasmine incense, opening with the heady embrace of jasmine, its intoxicating aroma filling the air like a floral symphony. Each spray carries with it the essence of a thousand whispered secrets, a thousand forgotten dreams, as if the very soul of the collective world itself were captured within its petals.
As the scent unfolds, it reveals a heart of sacred resins - myrrh and frankincense mingling with the warm embrace of oud, their smoky tendrils weaving a tapestry of ancient wisdom and divine mystery. It is as if the fragrance itself is a portal to another world, a gateway to the realms of the gods.
For within its depths lies the promise of renewal, of new beginnings and endless possibilities. For in the heart of BLOOM, where jasmine and resin intertwine, lies the key to unlocking the mysteries of the universe - a fragrance so powerful, so intoxicating, that it has the power to change the course of destiny itself."
output: Signature BLOOM by Zaharoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature BLOOM was launched in 2024. Top notes are Gardenia, Star Jasmine and Coconut; middle notes are Egyptian Jasmine, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Red Peony and Amber; base notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Myrrh, Oud, Olibanum, Sandalwood, Sugar Cane and Bourbon Vanilla.

The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Bergamot, Fig Leaf and Petitgrain; middle notes are Neroli, Fig and Rose; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Sandalwood by Viking Revolution is a cologne designed for men. This fragrance features a blend of warm and woody notes, making it a distinctive and masculine scent.
output: Sandalwood by Viking Revolution is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Sandalwood was launched in 2024. Top notes are Coriander and Nutmeg; middle notes are Sandalwood, Vetiver and Cedar; base notes are Ambergris and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: An intoxicating fusion that awakens the senses. A woody fragrance with floral notes of iris, accompanied by coffee and black pepper. The base reveals notes of rosewood, tonka bean and amber woods.
output: WO/03 Caf Et Cdre by Zara is a Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. WO/03 Caf Et Cdre was launched in 2023. Top notes are Black Pepper, Bergamot and Coffee; middle notes are Orris Root, Frankincense and Clary Sage; base notes are Amberwood, Palo Santo, Tonka Bean and Cashmeran.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: No much wordsdiscover the best aromatic fougre out there. Introducing SEXIEST FOUGERE, seamlessly blending sensuality and timeless elegance. Lavender from Grasse, Rosemary, and Petitgrain create an invigorating journey, leading to a full-hearted fusion of Neroli, Clary Sage, and exquisite Geranium from Egypt. As it settles, a gourmand base emerges with Tonka Beans and Vanilla, forming a seductive alliance. This olfactory masterpiece, enriched by Vetiver, Sicilian Lemon, Calabrian Bergamot, and Cedarwood Texas, is a captivating dance between balance and power. An aromatic vanguard that combines a traditional fougre feel with a slightly gourmand base, and a short touch of sensual pineapple. Immerse yourself in the sophistication of passion and undeniable charm
output: Sexiest Fougere by Theodoros Kalotinis is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sexiest Fougere was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Theodoros Kalotinis.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
With Pure Perfumes, Louis Vuitton imagines a way of personalizing one's fragrance signature with a gesture of absolute refinement. Inspired by the tradition of layering several fragrances, these intense compositions can be used as a finishing touch to your perfume ritual. Woven from exceptional essences and concentrated to the extreme, they celebrate the raw beauty of legendary ingredients in perfumery.

Sacred in many cultures, sandalwood is a key ingredient in the perfumer's palette: powerful yet delicate, its creamy, velvety scent can evoke that of the skin itself. Fascinated by its rare sophistication, Jacques Cavallier Belletrud elevates it majestically in Pur Santal, which combines an extraordinary Sri Lankan essence with two ethereal, musky floral notes endowed with exceptional diffusion. In their radiant presence, sandalwood reveals the incomparable elegance of its character.
output: Pur Santal by Louis Vuitton is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Pur Santal was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
"An explosion of olfactory sensations, of joy, of serenity, which lift our spirits and isolate us from everyday life, in a precious moment that brings us well-being: Sweet Explosion is just this."
TOP NOTES
lime, grapefruit, coconut milk, white honey
MIDDLE NOTES
Taif rose, ylang ylang, argan oil, broom, davana, mallow
BASE NOTES
coffee beans, sweet vanilla, tonka bean, patchouli, benzoin, musk
output: Sweet Xplosion by Lorenzo Pazzaglia is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sweet Xplosion was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Lorenzo Pazzaglia. Top notes are White Honey, Coconut Milk, Lime and Grapefruit; middle notes are Davana, Argan, Ylang Ylang, Broom, Malva and Taif Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Coffee, Benzoin, Patchouli and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Old Fashioned is a new fragrance of heritage and sophistication, with whisky accords inspired by the complex taste structure of an 18-year-old single malt.
Created in collaboration with perfumer Sidonie Lancesseur, Kilian Hennessy wanted Old Fashioned to evoke only the purest and finest whisky: a single malt, that is, a liqueur cultivated in a single distillery, and aged to perfection with a richness of at least two decades, according to the best Scottish tradition.
output: Old Fashioned by By Kilian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Old Fashioned was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sidonie Lancesseur. Top notes are Wheat and Davana; middle notes are Immortelle and Cedar; base notes are Tolu Balsam and Styrax.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: In the hands of Destiny  cruel puppeteer  she becomes a ballerina Yet, without being its toy, through her magical fingers, she also directs her luck! Cruelty, fragility, what are we made of? The truth is often hidden behind appearances. Graceful, delicate and ethereal, a ballerina seems manipulated like a doll, by an elegant puppeteer. Slender dandy with spider fingers, the fate of the little one is in his hands. Precarious balance, fatally inevitable destiny! However, between the executioner and his intended victim, are things so obvious? On closer inspection, wouldn't she also be pulling the wires on her side, giving direction to the emaciated fingers? The orphan, fascinating actress of our illusions! When reality resurfaces, letting doubt settle in, it evaporates into a mystical and disturbing incense. Serge Lutens
output: L'Orpheline Edition Limite by Serge Lutens is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. L'Orpheline Edition Limite was launched in 2024. Top note is Incense; middle note is Castoreum; base note is Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Van Cleef & Arpels Ambre Imprial Le Parfum is a new fragrance for women and men launched in 2024. This scent is a luxurious blend of creamy sandalwood, golden amber, and the pungency of leather, offering a complex and opulent leathery, ambery experience.
output: Ambre Imprial Le Parfum by Van Cleef & Arpels is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ambre Imprial Le Parfum was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top note is Leather; middle note is Amber; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Black Leather by Rasasi is a fragrance for men, launched in 2024. This scent features juniper as the top note, amber as the middle note, and leather and tonka bean as the base notes.
output: Black Leather by Rasasi is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Black Leather was launched in 2024. Top note is Juniper; middle note is Amber; base notes are Leather and Tonka Bean.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Teriaq Intense by Lattafa is a fragrance that dares to be unapologetically unique. Created by master perfumer Quentin Bisch, it offers a raw intensity through a blend of luxurious notes.
Top Notes: Bergamot, Saffron
Middle Notes: Plum Liquor, Cinnamon
Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Amber, Benzoin
output: Teriaq Intense by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Teriaq Intense was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Saffron and Bergamot; middle notes are Plum Liquor and Cinnamon; base notes are Amber, Tonka Bean and Benzoin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Powered by your inner confidence, enter the 1 Million Royal kingdom with the ultimate fragrance of defiant self-expression, made for you by Paco Rabanne.
Unconstrained by convention, find the freedom to live by your own rules with 1 Million Royal: a flamboyant fresh woody blend that collides with a distinctive sensuality to unleash what makes you uniquely you.
Claim the stage; youre the king. Its time to rise - with 1 Million Royal.
output: 1 Million Royal by Rabanne is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. 1 Million Royal was launched in 2023. 1 Million Royal was created by Quentin Bisch and Christophe Raynaud. Top notes are Cardamom, Tangerine and Bergamot; middle notes are Lavender, Violet Leaf and Sage; base notes are Benzoin, Cedar and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Created by Anne Flipo, this scent uses the finest of ingredients to reconstruct the luscious gardens of the master French perfumer's childhood. Distilling her recollections and passionate love of nature into a modern composition, this fragrance has fresh, floral and woody notes, blending rich basil with bouquets of jasmine and lily of the valley, which are then balanced out by balsamic notes of galbanum and spiced jasmine.
output: Synthetic Nature by Frederic Malle is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Synthetic Nature was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Black Currant, Lily of the Valley and Basil; middle notes are Hyacinth, Jasmine and Ylang Ylang; base note is Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Iconic footballer Cristiano Ronaldo launches his newest fragrance, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless, the second from the 7 Collection.
Cristiano invites us to take a deep dive into his mind, his Mental Field, a universe of ambition and discipline at the root of a fearless and determined man.
Mental Field, the short film takes place on a planet resembling a floating pitch. We see Ronaldo frenetically chasing a ball of fire. Never giving up, he jumps, dodges and slides between the celestial elements. Reaching for the ball of fire, it transforms into the new Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless: the encapsulation of the aim for perfection.
Fearless is more than just a fragranceit's an attitude. With my new fragrance, I want to inspire my fans to keep chasing their dreams and to remember that every accomplishment starts in the mind says Cristiano.
At the heart of Fearless lies the hero ingredient, Longozaa remarkable plant cultivated in Madagascar. Just like Ronaldo who comes back stronger after defeats and challenges, Longoza possesses the extraordinary ability to regenerate itself, making it an everlasting plant.
The top notes of violet leaf, Longoza, apple, and bay leaf intertwine to create an invigorating opening, while the heart notes of geranium and violet add depth and complexity. The final notes of tonka, vanilla, cashmeran, cistus labdanum, and Ambrostar leave an intense and sensual impression, enveloping you in a woody spicy embrace.
Housed in a sleek orange bottle, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless was developed in collaboration with Eden Parfums.
output: CR7 Fearless by Cristiano Ronaldo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. CR7 Fearless was launched in 2023. Top notes are Red Apple, Longoza, Bay Leaf, Grapefruit and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Nutmeg, Geranium and Violet; base notes are Amrostar, Cashmeran, Labdanum, Vanilla and Tonka.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Absolue de Mousse by Rogue Perfumery is an olfactive journey that delves into the essence of Mousse Illuminee. This fragrance unveils intoxicating layers, opening with an invigorating burst of olibanum and artemisia, followed by spicy floral notes paired with clary sage, and leading to an earthy dry-down of spikenard and musk.
output: Absolue de Mousse by Rogue Perfumery is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Absolue de Mousse was launched in 2024.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: This fragrance is an ode to well-being, inspired by a summer getaway to the Mediterranean. Chrome Azure is the scent of a Mediterranean breeze on a beautiful summer day, somewhere between Cassis and Capri. A unique blend of ingredients that invites you to escape and enjoy the harmony of a fresh, aquatic scent.
output: Chrome Azure by Azzaro is a Aromatic Aquatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Chrome Azure was launched in 2024. Top note is Bergamot; middle note is Lavender; base note is Sea Notes.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
One day, a long time ago, I thought or dreamed of being able to create a perfect woody perfume, where the different woods would tell the story of time, of the passing of life itself, again a challenge, a perfume that could be unique, exciting and involving.
Sogni is the realisation of my desire, an immediate experience, incredibly close to reality and the nature of things. Aesthetic devotion to nature.
output: Sogni by Meo Fusciuni is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sogni was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Giuseppe Imprezzabile. Top notes are Rice, Tatami, Pine Tree Needles, Bamboo and Peony; middle notes are Incense and Cedar; base notes are Sandalwood, Incense, Japanese Green Tea, Musk, Oak, Guaiac Wood, Tobacco, Vetiver and Amber.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Daniel suffered a heart attack in July 2021, and with his signature sense of humour, he wanted to pay tribute to that moment. The three phases are created around the initial moments of the attack, the hospital admission, and the rest at home. The perfume is unisex and for any season, since a heart attack can happen to anyone at any time.
output: Signature Heart Attack by Daniel Josier is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature Heart Attack was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Josier. Top notes are Lime, Chili Pepper, Aldehydes, Pepper, Mandarin Orange and Green Pear; middle notes are Cypress, Sage and Frankincense; base notes are Cedar, Patchouli, Sandalwood and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Nero by French Avenue is an extrait de parfum that offers a sophisticated citrus-vanilla scent. It opens with invigorating top notes of bergamot, nutmeg, date, and apple, leading to a warm heart of cinnamon, saffron, and dry wood. The base notes of vanilla, benzoin, tonka beans, and musk create a long-lasting, comforting finish.
output: Royal Blend Nero by French Avenue is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. Royal Blend Nero was launched in 2024. Top notes are Nutmeg, Apple and Bergamot; middle notes are Cinnamon, Dry Wood and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka, Benzoin and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Detour Noir Intense is a bold and daring fragrance that ignites the senses and redefines luxury with its rare intensity. It features a sophisticated blend of notes that create an exhilarating sensory journey. The fragrance opens with top notes of cardamom, heliotrope, pink pepper, and bergamot. The heart unfolds with bitter almonds, lavender, geranium, and jasmine, adding depth and boldness. The base is robust, composed of vanilla, guaiac wood, agarwood, sandalwood, and amber, completing this aromatic masterpiece.
output: Detour Noir Intense by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Detour Noir Intense was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cardamom, Heliotrope, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Bitter Almond, Lavender, Jasmine and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood, Vanilla, Amber, Sandalwood and Guaiac Wood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Maison Guerlain presents an exclusive, limited-edition Christmas rendezvous: Imagine Guerlain, in collaboration with Shourouk Rhaiem, the renowned French jewelry designer. To celebrate the festive season with sparkle and magic, Shourouk Rhaiem unveils her dazzling, multi-colored world. For the 2024 vintage, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a radiant jewela wearable cuff bracelet that can be worn on the wrist. This exceptional piece encases the Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum, an amber-colored nectar with floral and woody notes, perfect for adding a festive touch to the holiday season. This exclusive fragrance is available only on Guerlain.com and in select Guerlain boutiques.
The Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum is an extraordinary creation designed to capture the magic of Christmas with grandeur. Luxurious and timeless, it opens with majestic floral notes, highlighted by a hint of zesty orange. As the fragrance develops, it reveals rich, vibrant woody notes, culminating in an intense, magical scent with a warm and sensual composition.
For 170 years, the Flacon aux Abeilles has been a symbol of craftsmanship and artistry. Produced by the glassmaker Pochet du Courval, the bottle is decorated with intricate festoons and golden bees, meticulously enhanced with fine gold detailing. The signature cord, tied by hand by the skilled Dames de Table at the Guerlain Workshops, adds a final touch of elegance. This year, the shimmering jewel envisioned by Shourouk Rhaiem elevates the bottle's design, allowing wearers to take a piece of this exceptional creation with them.
For the first time ever, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a striking creation that doubles as a wearable accessory. The large cuff, encrusted with sparkling rhinestones, features an imaginary flower at its center, with Guerlain's double G emblem blooming from its heart. The petals of this enchanting flower shimmer in bluish hues, making the jewel an embodiment of festive magic and sparkle.
Shourouk Rhaiem, a jewelry designer who began crafting her first crystal-covered pieces in her Parisian studio over fifteen years ago, draws inspiration from her Tunisian roots, the pop culture of the 1980s, and the glamour of Hollywood films. Her playful and poetic approach to design transforms ordinary objects into extraordinary creations, embellished with a myriad of crystals in various sizes and colors.
This exclusive, limited-edition release consists of 3,310 numbered pieces. Each 125 mL bottle comes with a 30 mL spray and a funnel, allowing you to carry this exceptional fragrance with you wherever you go.
output: Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem by Guerlain is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Thierry Wasser. Top notes are Orange Blossom and Orange; middle note is Benzoin; base note is Sandalwood.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Mid-fifties, North of India, the Sivaliks, on the foothills of the Himalayan Mountains. From a vanguard vision will rise an ideal city: Chandigarh. Union between India and France where, alike bandmasters, visionary architects designed, ex nihilo, this modernist utopia in the midst of a tropical jungle.
CHANDIGARH EXPRESS is a journey through secular traditions and modernity. An immersion into a wide palette of exotic colours, textures and smells.
output: Chandigarh Express by Ex Nihilo is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Chandigarh Express was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Gal Montero. Top notes are Cardamom, Mandarin Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Leather, Balsam Fir, Davana, Mahonial and Jasmine; base notes are Vetiver, Benzoin, Tonka and Patchouli.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Introducing our unique creation that combines the refreshing and familiar notes of Cola with the exotic and luxurious scent of Oud. Pure Hindi Oud and Indian Oud are used in this composition that only real oud lovers will truly admire. This fragrance is further enhanced by the sweet and tart Black Currant Absolute and Raspberry, balanced with the subtle spice of Pink Peppercorn. The floral notes of Jasmine Sambac Absolute add a touch of elegance while the woody and earthy Hiba Japanese Cedar Wood grounds the fragrance. Our Cola Accord is composed of mostly natural materials and is as close to the real cola as you could get!
output: Cola Oud by Aromas de Salazar is a Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cola Oud was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Michael Salazar. Top notes are Coca-Cola, Cherry, Raspberry, Black Currant and Bitter Almond; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Geranium, Rose, Heliotrope and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Indian Oud, Agarwood, Oakmoss, Black Pepper, Cloves, Cedar, Hiba and Papyrus.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Nusuk Al Mukhtalif Signature is a luxurious fragrance that embodies elegance and individuality. It opens with a vibrant blend of citrus and spice, immediately capturing attention with its fresh and invigorating notes. As the fragrance unfolds, a rich heart of florals and warm woods emerges, adding depth and complexity. The base is a sumptuous combination of amber, musk, and oud, creating a lasting impression of opulence and sophistication.
output: Al Mukhtalif Signature by Nusuk is a fragrance for women and men. Al Mukhtalif Signature was launched in 2024. Top note is Citrus; base notes are Oud, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Cherry Cherry stands as a refined and modern alternative to other iconic classics in the world of perfumery. While many fragrances captivate with playful femininity and sweet gourmand notes, Cherry Cherry sets itself apart through its intensity and depth. Its composition is richer and more nuanced, offering a complex and enveloping olfactory experience that appeals to those seeking something beyond the ordinary.
Where other perfumes charm with their sweet and floral dominance, Cherry Cherry embraces a more mature and sensual intensity. The cherry note, reimagined as a luxurious liqueur, delivers an addictive richness from the first spray, while floral and musky undertones add layers of depth that evolve beautifully on the skin. This pronounced intensity makes it an ideal choice for those who desire a fragrance that not only allures but also leaves a strong, lasting impression.
Cherry Cherry is a bold statement of modern elegance, meticulously crafted to be an unforgettable fragrance that lingers in memory and transcends time. It is an indispensable addition to the collection of those who appreciate true luxury and sophistication.
Head notes: Black Cherry, Sparkling Bergamot & Lemon from Calabria.
Heart notes: Orris & Lush Jasmine, Sweet Heliotrope, Earthy Patchouli from Sumatra.
Base notes: Vanilla Pods from Madagascar, White Musk
output: Cherry Cherry by Mancera is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cherry Cherry was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Patchouli, Heliotrope, Orris Root and Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla Pod and White Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Edesia was the Roman goddess of luxury and feasting, so this fragrance was inspired by celebrations of extravagance, excess and epicurean pleasures.

This opulent creation is a cornucopia of the gastronomic delights of creamy vanilla, exotic fruits, citrus and bitter almond seasoned with exotic spices cinnamon and pink pepper, scattered with ylang-ylang, heliotrope and sweet rose centifolia florals, all underpinned with an addictive, carnal base of amber, musk, leather, gourmand and woody accents.
output: Vanilla Edesia by Electimuss is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Vanilla Edesia was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Ccile Zarokian. Top notes are Frankincense, Heliotrope, Pink Pepper, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Cumin, Cinnamon, Coriander, Rose and Ylang Ylang; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Haitian Vetiver and Virginia Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Signature Seraphim Blue by Zaharoff is a new aquatic-fresh fragrance for men, released in 2024. This scent features a blend of apple, eucalyptus, French lavender, rosemary, blue cypress, coconut, Florentine iris, immortelle, marine notes, Mugane, orange blossom, amber, cistus, Ethiopian frankincense, musk, and red kelp.
output: Signature Seraphim Blue by Zaharoff is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature Seraphim Blue was launched in 2024. Signature Seraphim Blue was created by Claude Dir and Mane. Top notes are Lavender, Rosemary, Apple and Eucalyptus; middle notes are Marine notes, Coconut, Iris, Orange Blossom, Mugane, Cypress and Immortelle; base notes are Frankincense, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input:
Tmraire, from Givenchy's Private Collection, embodies audacity and intrepidity. Its main note,  tuberose, dares to venture into the darkness of an unexpected ink accord. It also features spicy notes of cardamom and clove leaf which exacerbate the intensity of tuberose.
This carnal and narcotic bouquet blends with iris and jasmine before bonding with inky scents  a blend of leathery, woody, and smoky notes  warmed by amber cade and benzoin.
L'Accord Particulier, the signature fragrance of the collection, amplifies the personality of Tmraire, intensifying the contrast between luminous tuberose and the darkest ink accord.
Tmraire is also distinguished by its new case. Its bottle features a deep black cap, adorned with a metallic ring, which accentuates its architectural silhouette.
Available as a 100ml Eau de Parfum.
output: Tmraire by Givenchy is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tmraire was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Nicolas Bonneville. Top notes are Clove Leaf and Cardamom; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine and Iris; base notes are Ink, Cade oil and Benzoin.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: A charming slice of paradise can be found at the southernmost tip of Corsica - Sperone. When the land breeze picks up in the evening, the fragrances of the maquis are heightened, and the bushes of labdanum cistus and immortelles release their scents, both lively, warm, and sensual. At this point, one can simply relax and be soothed by the gentle lapping of the waves against the rocks.
output: Sperone by Le Couvent Maison de Parfum is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sperone was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Claude Ellena. Top notes are Thyme and Bergamot; middle notes are Pepper and Immortelle; base notes are Labdanum and Cedar.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
output: Aqua Memorabilis by Jovoy Paris is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Aqua Memorabilis was launched in 2024. Top notes are Bitter Orange, Clementine and Grapefruit; middle notes are Clementine, Black Pepper and Violet; base notes are Vetiver, Cedarwood, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk.

instruction: Summarize the description of the entered perfume.
input: Bois Imprial Extrait by Essential Parfums is an aromatic fragrance designed for both women and men. Launched in 2024, this scent is crafted by perfumer Quentin Bisch and features a blend of woody, fresh spicy, and green notes.
output: Bois Imprial Extrait by Essential Parfums is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bois Imprial Extrait was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Black Pepper; middle note is Rose; base notes are Balsam Fir, Atlas Cedar and Labdanum.

Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Parfums de Marly launches Althar, a masculine fragrance that pays homage to French haute parfumerie and the woody-vanilla-amber fragrance family.
This modern tribute features high-quality Bourbon vanilla blended with citrus, spices, and noble woods for a balance of warmth and freshness. Created collaboratively by Julien Sprecher and perfumers Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis, Althar boasts a captivating contrast between traditional and disruptive notes, delivering distinct opulence.
Top Notes: Orange Blossom Absolute, Bergamot From Italy, Cinnamon From Ceylon, Cardamom From Guatemala Heart: Bourbon Vanilla From Madagascar, Elemi From The Philippines
Base: Ambrox, Guaiac Wood Praline, Musk
Encased in an opaque, warm-toned brown bottle, the fragrance's imagery invites a multisensory experience.. Sentence B: Althar by Parfums de Marly is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Althar was launched in 2023. Althar was created by Hamid Merati-Kashani and Ilias Ermenidis. Top notes are Cinnamon, Cardamom, Orange Blossom and Bergamot; middle notes are Bourbon Vanilla and elemi; base notes are Praline, Musk, Ambroxan, Guaiac Wood, Tonka and Candied Almond..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Welcome on board!
The new sailor Le Male Elixir will induce burning cravings and drive your senses crazy. Burning desire spreads with the irresistible notes of fresh lavender, warming tonka bean, and gentle benzoin. With a gilded torso, this fiery novelty from Jean Paul Gaultier embodies radiant power and seductive charisma.
It is finished! You melt away with burning desire.
This intense fragrance ignites the fire of the senses on his upper body and gives the soft skin a burning sensuality. After a refreshing breeze of mint, the tide rises to addiction, becoming a glowing elixir. In this breath of fresh air, dashing lavender quickly takes on lusty proportions, enhanced by the balsamic richness of benzoin with syrupy vanilla accents. The tonka bean trumps with its warm and sweet tones between honey and tobacco. The time has come: You jump!
Radiant at first sight, glowing with masculinity, more fiery than ever. The torso is bursting with muscles, the skin is bathed in copper color by the sinking sun. What a Gaultier body... what accomplished style. Finely chiseled grooves stand out on its muscles dipped in gold and merge with the amber stripes of the sailor shirt, which plays with transparency effects in a highly sexy way.
Available as 75ml and 125ml Parfum.. Sentence B: Le Male Elixir by Jean Paul Gaultier is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Male Elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Lavender and Mint; middle notes are Vanilla and Benzoin; base notes are Honey, Tonka Bean and Tobacco..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: The experience: a passion fruit tasting in remote oud wood forests.
The surprising contrast: the richness of oud wood, contrasted by exotic and luminous passion fruit notes.
Fragrance family: exotic, woody and fruity (vegan).
Key raw materials: passion fruit accord, saffron, rose absolute from Turkey ORPUR, oud accord, benzoin from Laos ORPUR, cistus absolute from Spain ORPUR, leather accord, patchouli oil from Indonesia ORPUR, vanilla, akigalawood.
The ORPUR label brings together the finest natural perfume ingredients from the Givaudan perfume house.. Sentence B: Oud Maracuj by Maison Crivelli is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Maracuj was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jordi Fernndez. Top notes are Passionfruit, Fruity Notes, Saffron and Turkish Rose; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Indonesian Patchouli Leaf and Benzoin; base notes are Leather, Akigalawood, Amber, Vanilla and Labdanum..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input: Sentence A: BOSS Bottled Absolu is a bold Eau de Parfum featuring an irresistible roasted signature. This woody-leathery scent is crafted by Annick Menardo in collaboration with Suzy Le Helley. It opens with a textured Leather accord harmonized with invigorating Incense essence. At the heart, Patchouli essence and Myrrh absolute elevate the scent, while warm Cedarwood and fruity Davana essences at the base leave a lasting trail.. Sentence B: Bottled Absolu by Hugo Boss is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Bottled Absolu was launched in 2024. Bottled Absolu was created by Annick Menardo and Suzy Le Helley. Top notes are Incense and Leather; middle notes are Patchouli and Myrrh; base notes are Cedarwood and Davana..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: MYSLF is the expression of the man you are, with all of your emotions and nuances.
A twist of the traditional woody fragrance family with flowers. A statement of modern masculinity to celebrate your true self.
The expression of the man you are, with all your nuances. A statement of modern masculinity, embracing all his facets and emotions.

The first YSL BEAUTY woody floral for a contrasted trail of modernity.

At first, a fresh & vibrant accord made of bergamot heart from Calabria and vert de bergamot.
At heart, a raw & beating orange blossom absolute heart from Tunisia crafted for YSL beauty.
At last, a sensual & textured woods accord made of Indonesian patchouli heart and Ambrofix.

A YSL silhouette in a bottle. Sleek. Fluid.
A black lacquered monolith in nuances where you can see yourself. At its heart, embedded in the glass, is the iconic YSL Cassandre logotype.

My scent, MYSLF.
Available as 40ml, 60ml 100ml Eau de Parfum. Refil bottle is available in size of 150ml Eau de Parfum.. Sentence B: MYSLF Eau de Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is a Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. MYSLF Eau de Parfum was launched in 2023. MYSLF Eau de Parfum was created by Christophe Raynaud, Antoine Maisondieu and Daniela Andrier. Top notes are Calabrian bergamot and Bergamot; middle note is Tunisian Orange Blossom; base notes are Ambrofix and Patchouli..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Guerlain launches Tobacco Honey in September 2023 as a part of the  L'Art & La Matire collection. The fragrance combines delicious amber tobacco accord with vanilla, tonka bean, and sesame, that come alive under the glow of intoxicating honey, enhanced by clove and anise accord. At the base, the precious accord reinforces its trail with woody notes combining the creamy softness of sandalwood and the power of oud wood.
"I've wanted to combine honey and tobacco for a long time. On the one hand, we have the dried tobacco leaves with their swirls of powdery aroma; on the other, we have honey as a delicious, enveloping nectar," said Delphine Jelk, Perfumer and Creative Director at Guerlain.
Available in 100ml and 200ml Eau de Parfum.. Sentence B: Tobacco Honey by Guerlain is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Tobacco Honey was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk. Top notes are Honey, Cloves and Anise; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Tonka and Sesame; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Sandalwood..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Drawing inspiration from the Autumn/Winter fashion collection of 2010-2011, imagine a lush, enchanting garden named "Le Beau Paradise Garden" and "La Belle Paradise," a haven of intense delights and fervent desires.
Picture a bottle of striking beauty: an emerald-green glass ornately embroidered with a vibrant vine leaf, boasting exquisite, high-fashion details. This alluring, unclothed bottle is impossible to overlook, inviting you to succumb to its charm.
This bottle is a masterpiece, unforgettable in its presence. It's like a tropical beacon, with a Couture-styled embroidered vine leaf artfully obscuring a secret garden where the naked, emerald-green bottle resides. Its magnetic allure draws you into the depths of a hypnotizing and sensuous masculine scent, both mysterious and compelling.
This fragrance is a woody, green aquatic symphony crafted by Quentin Bisch. It encapsulates the heavenly essence of a tropical paradise, replete with radiant flowers and alluring aromas directly from the Garden of Gaultier. The scent intertwines fresh, salty coconut with green fig and the warmth of sandalwood. Accents of spicy ginger, refreshing mint, and sun-warmed Tonka bean add to the fragrance's green aquatic and woody notes, perfectly embodying the passion of the vigorous men who embrace it.
LE BEAU PARADISE GARDEN will be available as 75ml and 125ml Eau de Parum.. Sentence B: Le Beau Paradise Garden by Jean Paul Gaultier is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Le Beau Paradise Garden was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Green Notes, Watery Notes, Mint and Ginger; middle notes are Coconut, Fig and Salt; base notes are Tonka Bean and Sandalwood..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Discover Invictus Victory Elixir, the pinnacle of Invictus intensity. The new powerful mens fragrance by Paco Rabanne. A powerful elixir that transcends all boundaries. Now is the time to experience your moment of immortality. A rich, powerful and long-lasting fragrance composed of spicy woods and intense freshness. The fragrance for absolute winners. The ultimate expression of victory. Never stop winning!
The new fragrance reveals its true nature with its intense blue to black lacquered bottle. The imposing central golden V is the deciding factor.. Sentence B: Invictus Victory Elixir by Rabanne is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Invictus Victory Elixir was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lavender, Cardamom and Black Pepper; middle notes are Incense and Patchouli; base notes are Vanilla Pod and Tonka Bean..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Gucci Guilty Pour Homme Elixir de Parfum is a woody, ambery leather fragrance for men. Guilty Elixirs are a daring assertion, a colorful extraversion: captivating and sophisticated scents that extend a loving invitation to accept who we are and let our authentic selves be seen while celebrating the countless iterations of love.
Perfumers Quentin Bisch and Nathalie Cetto sign the composition. It opens with accents of peppery pimento and smoky nutmeg. A flamboyant and noble heart of orris butter, orange flower, and sensuous osmanthus is followed by a sensual base of vanillin, ambrofix, and benzoin, which is intensified by an overdose of patchouli.
Extending a loving invitation to explore, create, and connect with our truest selves, Gucci Guilty Pour Femme and Pour Homme fragrances launched with a campaign starring A$AP Rocky, Julia Garner, and Elliot Page.
Available in a 60ml bottle.. Sentence B: Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme by Gucci is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Guilty Elixir de Parfum pour Homme was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Quentin Bisch. Top notes are Orange Blossom, Nutmeg and Pimento Seeds; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Orris and Osmanthus; base notes are Vanilla, Ambrofix, Benzoin and Patchouli..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input: Sentence A: Noble materials and pronounced opulence, unlimited sensuality: Scandal Absolu, the absolute scandal. What is the scent of this intense Scandal perfume that warms up Jean Paul Gaultiers nights? The latest rumors say that this Scandal is incredibly free, mysteriously charismatic and very undisciplined. It is even said that its woody scent is absolutely sensual and that you will never tire of it again.... Sentence B: Scandal Pour Homme Absolu by Jean Paul Gaultier is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Scandal Pour Homme Absolu was launched in 2024. Scandal Pour Homme Absolu was created by Quentin Bisch, Natalie Gracia-Cetto and Christophe Raynaud. Top note is Mirabelle; middle note is Chestnut; base note is Sandalwood..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Eau d'Ombr Leather is described as a wildly radiant composition with leather notes made smoother and milder, mixing accords of rich amber, vanilla, glowing leather, and refreshing spices. The composition opens boldly with fresh ginger, coriander, and cardamom. The note of vanilla tincture stokes a glowing leather accord, a sensual flame grounded in a landscape of rich amber and honeyed woods.
Eau dOmbr Leather is packaged in a translucent black bottle with a faux-leather plaque. It is available in quantities of 10ml, 50ml, and 100ml.. Sentence B: Eau d'Ombr Leather by Tom Ford is a Leather fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Eau d'Ombr Leather was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sonia Constant. Top notes are Cardamom, Ginger and Coriander; middle notes are Vanilla and Leather; base note is Ambrofix..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: MYSLF Le Parfum is a more intense interpretation of the men's fragrance "MYSLF Eau de Parfum." This new version has evolved to offer a deeper and more powerful experience. The signature blend of soft orange blossom and textured wood in MYSLF is enhanced by spicy black pepper and sweet vanilla bourbon, culminating in a sensual amber finish.
The packaging features a black color scheme and a slender silhouette, capturing the essence of YSL. The glossy "Cassandra logo" is prominently displayed on the bold matte black glass, creating a design that is both powerful and sophisticated.
MYSLF Le Parfum will be available from late August 2024 in 60ml and 100ml sizes.. Sentence B: MYSLF Le Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. MYSLF Le Parfum was launched in 2024. MYSLF Le Parfum was created by Daniela Andrier, Antoine Maisondieu and Christophe Raynaud. Top note is Black Pepper; middle note is Orange Blossom; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Amber, Woody Notes and Patchouli..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Givenchy invites the most unstoppable Gentlemen to join the edgiest society with its new Eau de Parfum Extrme. This masculine fragrance combines a dark iced coffee accord with a powerful woody floral fragrance and a spicy scent for the most extreme Eau de Parfum. The perfect match for men who set their own rules and go beyond limits in their relentless pursuit of excellence.
In our quest to craft the perfect men fragrance, Givenchy carefully selected exceptional raw materials, harnessing its savoir-faire. This masculine Eau de Parfum opens with an immediate aromatic and spicy twist, a blend of Clary Sage, ice-cold Peppermint, and fiery Nutmeg. The heart reveals the original Gentleman Society accord, a fusion of Narcissus Absolute, Iris Concrete and quartet of Vetiver which enhances the Coffee Extract Absolute and Peppermint Essence. The base, rich with Cedar, Sandal, Patchouli Essence, and Vanilla Absolute, leaves a deep and lasting impression.
The bottle, inspired by couture, is revisited to embody the new extreme facet. A deep black lacquer finish is adorned with the 4G logo in a bold gunmetal finish, giving a contemporary edge to the iconic design.
Additionally, the Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme bottle is made from 15% post-consumer recycled glass.
Gentleman Society. Not a place, a state of mind. Come and join us.. Sentence B: Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme by Givenchy is a fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum Extrme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni. Top notes are Nutmeg, Peppermint and Clary Sage; middle notes are Coffee, Orris Root, Madagascar Vetiver, Haitian Vetiver, Vetiver and French Narcissus; base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Australian Sandalwood and Himalayan Cedar..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: KILIAN launches the latest addition to its Smokes Collection called Smoking Hot in late September 2023. The fragrance offers a fusion of sweetness and smokiness, reminiscent of delectable caramel.
With a contemporary take on the smoky essence, this creation not only redefines the genre for modern sensibilities but also encapsulates an element of scorching allure. The heart of the fragrance is steeped in the lusciousness of caramel, blending the robust depth of Kentucky tobacco absolute and apple shisha. The bold undertones of Bourbon vanilla further contribute to the untamed and opulent nature of this olfactory composition.
The scent opens with apples, and the warm cinnamon bark essence is added to the mellow apple hookah. Then, slowly over time, smoked Kentucky tobacco absolute emerges. A rich tobacco absolute blends with oak moss, followed by Bourbon vanilla with balsamic notes. Orkanox is added to Bourbon Vanilla, also known as Pure Jungle Essence, to express its powerful and sensual charm with a scent.
The exquisite "Smoking Hot" is elegantly presented as a 50ml Eau de Parfum, encapsulating the essence of this alluring fusion within its meticulously crafted formulation.. Sentence B: Smoking Hot by By Kilian is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Smoking Hot was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Mathieu Nardin. Top notes are Apple, Smoke and Cinnamon; middle notes are Tobacco, Vanilla and Moss; base notes are Bourbon Vanilla, Licorice, Orcanox, Iso E Super and Clary Sage..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: "For this even more celebratory incarnation of Jubilation XXV Man, Amouage called on the talents of its original creator, Bertrand Duchaufour. While keeping the essential structure of his composition intact, the perfumer emphasised and highlighted key aspects to construct an even more striking blend of styles. Jubilation 40 Man reaches new heights of expressiveness, offering an extraordinarily compelling presentation of masculinity.
Retaining the instantly recognisable blackberry opening, the scent now also reveals dry, tart hints of Blackcurrant This makes way for the perfumes majestic heart: Genet unfurls within a burst of honeyed Tobacco notes while regal Frankincense cuts through the narcotic warmth of Balsams and Resins. Eventually, the scent settles on an enveloping, heart-stopping dry-down of Patchouli, Cistus, and Opoponax. Flaming with magnificence and a lust for adventure, Jubilation 40 Man captures the absolute essence of masculine sophistication."
Top notes: Blackberry, Blackcurrant, Rosemary, Labdanum, Orange, Davana
Heart notes: Scotch Broom, Frankincense, Cinnamon, Clove, Bay St Thomas, Rose, Celery Seeds
Base notes: Patchouli, Cistus, Opoponax, Myrrh, Cedarwood, Guaiac Wood, Musks, Moss, Orientalgris, Oud
Available in a 100 ml bottle, extrait de parfum containing 40% pure perfume oils.. Sentence B: Jubilation 40 Man by Amouage is a Woody Chypre fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Jubilation 40 Man was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour. Top notes are Blackberry, Black Currant, Labdanum, Orange, Rosemary and Davana; middle notes are Frankincense, Bay Leaf, Cinnamon, Broom, Cloves, Celery Seeds and Rose; base notes are Opoponax, Patchouli, Myrrh, Agarwood (Oud), Guaiac Wood, Moss, Cedar, Ambergris, Musk and Cistus Incanus..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: "A Sensual Shot of Provocation. It set its sights on the erogenous VANILLA BEAN, electrified by PINK PEPPER, drenched in a draught of COGNAC, before finally succumbing to the intoxicating swirls of a cigar. A cheeky twist of plump and juicy CHERRY celebrates the indulgence of a polished proposition."
Available as 90ml EDP.. Sentence B: Narcotic Delight by Initio Parfums Prives is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Narcotic Delight was launched in 2024. Top notes are Cherry, Pink Pepper and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cognac, Hedione and Rose; base notes are Tobacco, Vanilla, Tonka, Cedar and Patchouli..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Old Fashioned is a new fragrance of heritage and sophistication, with whisky accords inspired by the complex taste structure of an 18-year-old single malt.
Created in collaboration with perfumer Sidonie Lancesseur, Kilian Hennessy wanted Old Fashioned to evoke only the purest and finest whisky: a single malt, that is, a liqueur cultivated in a single distillery, and aged to perfection with a richness of at least two decades, according to the best Scottish tradition.. Sentence B: Old Fashioned by By Kilian is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Old Fashioned was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Sidonie Lancesseur. Top notes are Wheat and Davana; middle notes are Immortelle and Cedar; base notes are Tolu Balsam and Styrax..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: TOM FORD BEAUTY will release the new fragrance from the Private Blend collection, the new edition of Oud Wood Eau de Parfum from 2007, called Oud Wood Parfum in March 2024.
Oud Wood is enriched with fresh spices of cardamom and pink pepper, mixing with the essence of rosewood. Various woods including intense patchouli, sandalwood, vetiver, and oud are icombined into the underlying tones of amber, tonka bean absolute, and vanilla.
The sleek and sophisticated bottle, emblematic of Private Blend, is adorned in black paint and embellished with a platinum-colored plaque. Offered in 50ml bottles.. Sentence B: Oud Wood Parfum by Tom Ford is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Oud Wood Parfum was launched in 2024. Sentence A: Penhaligons presents The Dandy, a woody ode to whiskey, tinged with impertinence. Surrounded by a cloud of smoke, here we are, the mischievous spirit coming from all sides, following the decadence of rowdy heels. Cast aside all inhibitions, my friends, because once youre down those steps, the party will never, ever end.

Run shoulders with visionaries, rub shoulders with artists, loosen that tie, ready for a thousand faces. Lipstick marks on mirrors (and collars), sip amber liqueur.  In crystal glasses, under convoluted chandeliers. Suddenly the stroke of midnight rings out, to the tempo of the brass orchestra, trumpets and saxophones beating time, in the dazzling reflection of your glass. Here we are in the land of jazz, of swing that surges to the rhythm of whiskey, of bebop that gallops to the beats of bourbon. Oh, what tumultuous memories in this den, the spirits cheerful, the cocktails flowing freely. In the misty steam, if the speakeasy stage, in this place the dandy, which will forever be oursto dance to infinity. Sentence A: Simple. Solar. Smiling. It is the scent of everlasting summer. Of holidays that never end. Of long lazy lunches with friends, out in the countryside, around a big wooden table. Of flowers that just keep on blooming.

Tender verdancy, pollen, honey from the linden tree with its lovely heart-shaped leaves, an emblem of softness and flexibility for the Celts. The honeyed, apricot inflexions of broom. The tender powder of heliotrope. A bucolic bouquet made still richer with a sprig of velvety jasmine Sambac. Underlined, like a stroke of shade intensifying the radiance of an afternoon in the sun, by the smoky earthiness of vetiver...

The first of a constellation of floral fragrances, Tilia is also, for its creator Marc-Antoine Barrois and his long-time accomplice, the perfumer Quentin Bisch, the name of an imaginary star. The one that shines on happy days. An ode to simplicity and optimism.. Sentence B: Tilia by Marc-Antoine Barrois is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Sentence A: "Infused with the sweet and sensual scent of tobacco, this is a poetic ode to those who burn life at both ends.

Living dangerously has its limits, and disenchantment is inevitable. When the party ends and the smokescreen falls, lost illusions resurface. A tragic and fascinating reality check."

Shackled in a cage of dark woods, the Citrus fight with a newfound strength, their light shining brighter as delicate notes of Elemi and a heavenly touch of Hojari Frankincense burst open.

Sentence A: Intoxicating aromas of exotic greenery infuse the ancient Indian forest. Yet a snake on the trail of its next meal can isolate the scent of a plump rat. But a flick of its slithering tail betrays the snake, sending the rodent darting away. Thwarted, the snake curls back upon itself, only to feel the cool touch of a menacing shadow of a towering King Cobra witnessing its failure. Now the predator becomes prey and theres no escape. Intent on a breakfast devoured whole and without mercy, the hooded king strikes. Fangs sink deep, their venom coursing through the body of the snake. Instantly paralyzing heart and lungs, the toxins set to work dissolving the flesh from the inside out.
King Cobra from Zoologist is driven by danger and a desire to dominate. It hypnotizes with camphorous notes of Ganja and petitgrain, radiating coils of aromatic spices and damp mossy soil around a body heavy with incense. Finally, after shedding a delicate green leather, the powerful king ascends to his throne. A coronation of scent, King Cobra gives you license to rule.. Sentence B: King Cobra by Zoologist Perfumes is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. King Cobra was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Prin Lomros. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: "There can be no mistaking his deep gaze. His eyes are fixated to the intangible and he moves forward peacefully. At first sight, this piquant character pulls you in. The brightness of his smile, and the pink Pepper come to pick you up. Cross his path and you immediately turn away from your routine. The space around him becomes his, permeated by a purple wave of Plum and black Cherry that whisper of its sweet origin and touch your soul.
Its a beautiful summer, a summer echoing its temperance and made of the suns caresses under the light sheets, of fresh Flowers opening in the morning and of starry nights in the souvenir of the scorching day.
The soft Indian Rose gently balances the Leather and black Oud in a semi-hypnotic pendulum where Sandalwood and Vanilla mingle without excess. You are touching a rare, ambered and deeply oriental feeling, a sensation whose genesis you would not know: who from the message or the messenger, who from the wake one has been left in or its wearer? Who from the top note or the heart will take you to your own immensity?
It doesnt matter, because in the end, all roads lead to Infinity." - Montale
NOTES
Black Cherry, Plum, Peruvian Pink Pepper, Cardamom & Saffron.
Black Oud & Leather, Indian Rose & Solar Tuberose, Sandalwood & Vetiver.
Vanilla Sugar, Intense Oriental, Tobacco Leaves, Tonka Beans & Musk.. Sentence B: Infinity by Montale is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Infinity was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Black Cherry, Plum, Saffron, Pink Pepper and Cardamom; middle notes are Oud, Leather, Sandalwood, Rose, Vetiver and Tuberose; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla Sugar, Tonka, Amber and Musk..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: THE FRAGRANCE OF A NEW DAWN
Obsidian, coal, earth, rocks, crystals, the stormy sea, and the fiery dawn on a volcanic island. Emerging from the core of the earth is a primitive and powerful treasure: Trussardi Primo. A tribute to resilient masculinity, it is powerful, explosive and simultaneously the precursor of a new olfactory saga. It is the dawn of a new day, full of promise. The man imagined by the Trussardi maison is intrepid and confident in the future, a pioneer in a new world. Trussardi Primo rewrites the codes of men's perfumery starting from the courageous and innovative olfactory pyramid to the packaging, a work of art with a green heart. The composition is like a flower warmed by the first rays at dawn: it opens slowly and celebrates the daily miracle of rebirth with its fragrance. Its bold, virile notes evoke the freshness of the sea air mixed with the heat of volcanic lava, creating a unique olfactory harmony that reflects the duality of the island itself: the untamed
power of nature and the beauty of its landscape. Wearing Trussardi Primo is like wrapping yourself in a cloak of courage and confidence, ready to face any obstacle. Trussardi Primo is the invitation to embrace the light of day with primitive, powerful energy. It is the exhortation to discover your inner strength and potential.
Trussardi Primo is an unexpected fougre with a persistent sillage and "noir nuances obtained from an accord of bergamot, geranium, musk, lavender, vetiver, and tonka beans. The liquid contains organic ingredients from Italy, extracted with highly technological processes that respect the characteristics of the raw material in order to capture every olfactory nuance. Here is how perfumer Violaine Collas describes it: "The last time I was in Sicily was immediately after an eruption of Mount Etna. It was a truly inspiring scene that compelled me to recreate a similar sensation: the sensation of heat, like that of an eruption of incandescent lava. This image gave me the idea of using a maple syrup accord, super addictive with its golden nuances. I also wanted a dash of pepper to convey a sensation of danger and restore the hypnotic beauty of the volcano, intertwined with a dark, mineral black lava accord. Thus, a warm and sexy fragrance was born."
THE BOTTLE AND PACKAGING
At the center of a volcanic island, shrouded in the mists of dawn and surrounded by a tumultuous sea, stands a totem-like bottle, a work of art in glass with iridescent nuances that start from black, so typical of the night, and veer towards a shade of red that tinges the early hours of a new day. Like a reflection of dawn that slowly rises on the horizon, the bottle mesmerizes with its chromatic metamorphosis, conveying the promise of a bold, new beginning.
The glass bottle, substantial in weight and compact to the touch, transmits a sensation of power and solidity as a tangible sign of the wearer's inner determination. Like lava that runs down the sides of the volcano and carves out the landscape, the glass is transformed into an elegant and sculptural swirl that captures the essence of primordial fire. The design of Trussardi Primo is a revolution in packaging for perfumery, thanks to a few elements like the threading under the dispenser and the reusable magnetic cap. Solid, refined and refillable, the bottle combines high-level ecological green solutions without compromising its aesthetics. All components are non-toxic, recyclable or reusable. Likewise, the refill bottle follows the same ethics and aesthetics. The Trussardi Primo box is made of recyclable materials like FSC paper from forests managed according to rigorous environmental and social criteria. It echoes the same colors of the bottle with gradient shades passing from black to red and features embossed lettering with a vinyl finish.
"I'm excited by novelty. I believe that people who seek new things are unwilling to repeat what they've seen
before... Fabien Baron.
For over three decades culminating in illustrious accolades and awards, Fabien Baron has dominated the industrial design landscape with a proactive mind and unparalleled creativity, defining the success of some of the most prominent global brands. His boundless artistic conception unfolds through myriad facets, drawing from art to nature. During his career, Baron was the catalyst for the revival of famous magazines and brands, and he also created his own furniture line. Baron embodies the immense fervor that only true masters possess, shaping ideas and projects and making them a reality. For Trussardi Primo, he curated the design of the bottle and packaging, paying great attention not only to the aesthetic aspects of the latter, but also to its environmental impact.
ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN  THE CONCEPT
An epic, nocturnal escape in search of oneself in the volcanic landscape of Lanzarote, the lava island. Dark rocks and wild nature, majestic and exciting, are the backdrop of this primitive night. The mystery of nature demands respect, contemplation, and total dedication. The senses expand between the images, visions, smells, and sounds of a captivating and evocative night. It inebriates and confounds, but also sends signals that transform into symbols for the protagonist's journey guided by the stars and the light of the imminent dawn. The shadow of a man accompanied by his noble greyhound merges with the landscape in a deep connection with the surrounding natural elements.. Sentence B: Primo by Trussardi is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Primo was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Violaine Collas. Into a blue smoke
And in a moon that moves a sea
that cries.

When the sun sets and the heat of the day gives way to the coolness of night, the atmosphere is charged with an energy with a taste of mystery.
The city lights come on, but the adventures and excitement are far from them... we search for them by walking by the sea, where the figures are undefined and where we sense only the sea and a few car in the distance.
Time passes, and the summer night invites us to get lost and let ourselves be carried blend with the tar of a newly renovated street next door.
Everything is made possible under the reflections of the moon, sitting and looking at an undefined landscape that turns black to blue.
They are passions of everyone, for everyone, of a minute or an entire night...those that are fixed forever, for the usual sip of memory.

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Caf Tabac - A hedonistic scent that celebrates the undocumented moment.
A sumptuous party that goes on for days. Endless dinners and all-night merengue dancing under charcoal skies. Smoke meets flower and spice settles in for the next inhale. This is CAF TABAC.
Before Aedes de Venustass newest scent was realized in a bottle, it had a name: CAF TABAC, inspired by the iconic 90s bar in the East Village. Upstairs at Cafe Tabac was where Kate met Johnny, Madonna picked up the phone, Leo picked up supermodels. It was a place where the truly glamorous could be truly off-duty, an unselfconscious, pre-cell phone era that feels so far away as to be longed for again.
Its the deep mood of a place to be, creating its own legend, says perfumer Bertrand Duchaufour. The deep blue smoke of cigarettes, cigars, weed  whatever. Were exploring other paradises: laughs, desires, and pleasures, again and again.
That spirit was also present when Duchaufour and Gerstner went to visit the Dominican Republic last year for another scented project. It was an explosion of vibrant and chic people from Mexico, France, Rio, New York; different cultures and conversations and ideas and opinions, says Gerstner. We went from a tropical forest to the coast together, but it wasnt until we were standing in a cigar factory that I looked at Bertrand and said, Can you put this in a bottle?
The result is as dazzling, sexy, and complex as the trip: It opens with sparkling notes of expected (bergamot) and unexpected (apple, tamarind) fruits but the overall perfume is an homage to tobacco in many forms. Dry leaves, humid flowers, and a cigar lit by fire are represented thanks to herbal clary sage and davana, a tint of mango with dried fig and date, and a rough smokiness using tobacco absolute, tar, cade, and cedarwood. An amber accord of secretions and sugars from cistus and labdanum, ambergris, oakmoss, vanilla, cacao accord and Peru balm at the heart gives way to a darkly rich and resinous base. There is no saccharine here. Instead, distinctive burnt sugar and fresh clove and cardamom are infused with vapors that keep CAFE TABAC multilayered instead of perfectly round. It is blended at a twenty percent concentration made in the old school haute parfumerie style, including a month-long maceration in France.
With CAFE TABAC, there is a mad sensuality that feels like the olfactive equivalent of a twist of orange atop a demitasse of espressorich with a touch of freshness and tang. To wear it is to maintain a state of heightened emotions that are sooner remembered than they are recorded.. Sentence B: Caf Tabac by Aedes de Venustas is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Caf Tabac was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Bertrand Duchaufour..

Sentence A: The extrait de musique collection aims to describe with incense the many sounds of the registers of the Great Organ of Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris.
The sixth new fragrance to be presented speaks synaesthetically of the trumpet register, belonging to the reed family, one of the oldest organ registers. The first documented attestation of this register is found in a description of a large organ from the first century B.C., placed in a gladiator arena.
Reed registers the sound due to the vibration of a tab (the reed) on two walls.
Characterized by a particularly metallic and scratchy sound just like real trumpets, they enrich and complement the instrument.
The cap, like the previous extrait de musique, faithfully reproduces the stops of the registers of the Parisian Grand Organ.
Trompette 8 is enclosed like its predecessors inside an entirely handmade wooden box, reminiscent of the wooden case of large pipe organ soundboxes.. Sentence A: We went back in time, to one of the oldest desserts-BAKLAVA. Yes, that is correct, baklava!
The origins of baklava date back to ancient times. Around the eighth century B.C.E., people in the Assyrian Empire (which spread across parts of modern-day Iraq, Iran, Kuwait, Syria, and Turkey) arranged unleavened flatbreads into layers, with chopped nuts in-between, to be enjoyed during special events. Centuries later, the Ancient Greek and Roman baklava was a dish consisting of many layers of dough, filled with cheese and honey, and flavored with bay leaves. However, the earliest versions of baklava as we know it today came around 500 years ago, during the Ottoman Empire. In fact, one of the oldest Baklava stores still exists and claims to be 130 years old!. Sentence B: Signature AURUM by Zaharoff is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: I would like to get dirty slowly,
precious useless angel
slow sun fire
where the water rests with me
and caress the song of the skin.
A watch made of honey
with the hours marked by a warm wind
shadows of cicadas
silence of the prickly pear
in an orange
that stings the loneliness.
What does it mean today: "there is no hurry"?
In the obsession of the speed paradoxically the cognition of the time is lost. Here then the desire to stop to recognize and build the solitude of a sunny afternoon.
Slowness then becomes a necessary Caress, almost like boredom, to sink into the limits of silence and continue to listen to life in a way that has now become unknown.
Relying on the arms of a wind without running, which moves the earth burned by memories, is a courage of few, because bathing in this value revolutionizes and repairs.
Lentezza Carezza is a summer smell where loving each other becomes a tool for addressing others with new eyes and a reconstructed soul.
A perfume that transforms the perception of remaining motionless, becoming a new form of resistance, in a world where everything is too fast. And where the greatest power is to decide what to do with one's time, as Seplveda says.. Sentence B: Lentezza Carezza by Filippo Sorcinelli is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Lentezza Carezza was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are prickly pear, Myrrh, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Green Accord, Cedarwood, Cyclamen and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Benzoin, Vanilla, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean..

Sentence A: Presenting an exclusive signed edition of the second chapter of the almighty collaboration between the greatest riff master of all time, Black Sabbaths legendary guitarist and rock composer, Tony Iommi, and Xerjoffs esteemed founder, Sergio Momo.
The Xerjoff Blends Deified experience plays on the palindromic nature of sound, scent, and sensorial sequences.
Deified Tony Iommi Perfume
Step into a parallel universe where mystery possesses the mind in a dark and decadent experience that casts subliminal shadows on the wearer.
Created on a duality of leather and spice, Deified plays in a loop with no beginning and no end, accompanying the wearer with its omnipresent aura.
Authentic and warm accents of saffron meet powdery and leathery facets that dance with the delicate touch of gourmand freshness. Cinnamon exalts spicier notes, complemented by gentle rose at the heart.
The woody base of papyrus and patchouli leaves the senses longing for more in a rhythmic exchange of back and forth.
Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition
A true collectors edition, Deified Tony Iommi Signed Edition features the finest black crystals on the flacon, including a rare skull crystal.
Tony Iommi and Sergio Momo have signed 100 Deified flacons, available while quantities last.
This limited edition of Deified perfume is available on Xerjoff.com and in selected stores.
OLFACTORY NOTES
