instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: I hope you will turn into an obsession,
because you aid life.
You block false reality,
acting in the shadows,
erasing limits.
The twelfth fragrance in the monolithic UNUM collection is designed to confront the most heightened of emotions: fear. Almost as per tradition, the starting point inspiring it is an extract from the Gospel of Matthew, the parable of the ten virgins. The story  which also gives the fragrance its name  is that of ten women who prudently save oil so they can burn their lamps as they await the bridegrooms arrival. We know that of the ten, only five  described as very wise - participate in the wedding party; the others, having gone to find more oil for their lamps, find the door closed to them. Lord, open to us, they say upon arriving, receiving the response: Truly I say to you: I do not know you. We also know that, while they were awaiting the grooms arrival, they too fell asleep, but were ready to wake up and rejoice: "stay awake, therefore, because you know neither the day nor the hour", we read in Matthew.
This is just the start. The idea is to go beyond the evangelism of these words and face our fears on a deeper, more intense level, evoking conflicting emotions and experiencing the seductive charm of danger  an "amor fati" as Nietzsche claimed  or at least, the presence of things beyond our control. This is a characteristic feature of horror literature (and more); its the power of the uncontrolled over us. Yet the existence of fear always requires something else: not lack of courage, but the presence of what we most desire. What remains most mens highest aspiration is also a harbinger of trouble: freedom.
The perfume conveys the idea of destruction, the choice to be silent, and the introspection needed to delve into the depths of the skins most remote existence.
Yet seeking to control it stirs attraction and even feelings of pleasure towards that sought-after, desired fear.
Man is caught in a horrific fate, and our society, with the violent approval of the mob, tries to daze itself and deny the truth, or rather Being-for-death.
Only in this way does man become I in his darkest, unspoken shadow, displaying his true nature made up of contradictions and desires. Faced with fear, seemingly chaotic primordial needs composed of dormant, hidden, and dangerous eroticism are triggered, making the impossible possible.
The packaging is in line with the UNUM collection; this time it is sealed with a cold transparent film and a silver label. The bottle (also silver) is placed in a "silent" black velvet bag, sealed in a heat-shrunk sheath which needs to be cut physically using the metal scissors contained in the box.
Following his religious fall into the realm of dust, faced with life on a fragile planet, and having lost all his bearings, man is inextricably connected to fear, forced to wander in the dark side of the soul. Inside that room, he perceives a dim light that reveals deformed limbs sharing monstrous things that seek to destroy respectability and take pleasure in suffocating souls, no longer reckoning with lifes balance sheets but with a form of salvation thats ever more distant.. Sentence B: N Il Giorno N L'Ora by Filippo Sorcinelli is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. N Il Giorno N L'Ora was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Filippo Sorcinelli. Top notes are Cardamom, Lemon, Bergamot, Lily of the Valley, Galbanum and Cedar; middle notes are Marine notes, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Musk, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Amber..

Sentence A: I barely remember small fragments of those frosty winter days, with the snow as you can only see today. It was my first vacation as a schoolboy, back home in my childhood village with my grandparents. I was just a child who was just beginning life with shy steps, not knowing that soon the great storm of change will spread over the whole country. An old radio placed on one of the walls of our old room, where we sat by the stove, told us about the street fights from all over the country. All I remember is a big snowman I made in the yard with charcoal eyes, a morocov nose and the old store in the village of the cooperative. An old house with a high ground floor and old wooden counters dulled by time and dusty, which for me seemed like a paradise from another world. It was the first year when I saw and ate oranges and chocolate, which I kept on our old dresser, and for me they were worth their weight in gold. Those smells remained imprinted in my memory, being transposed now in an olfactory journey like no other.
Life passes, the beautiful moments and everything we once loved with them disappear in the mist of time.. Sentence B: Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir by Adi Ale Van is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Decembrie 89 - Freedom elixir was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Jimmy Bodin. Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Following the remarkable success of Arabians Tonka, Montale proudly unveils the next addition to its Arabians collection: Arabians Musk. This fragrance, while staying true to the captivating magic of the Orient, highlights the sensual and mysterious essence of musk. As with Montales previous creations, Arabians Musk is more than just a scent; it is a journey through the Moroccan desert, where each moment offers as much enchantment as the final destination.
The Fragrance Notes:
Arabians Musk is a sophisticated composition that artfully blends rare and luxurious ingredients, creating a fragrance experience that is both powerful and delicate. The journey begins with the golden sweetness of Sweet Honey, capturing the warmth of the day, while Bergamot Zests add a fresh, citrusy burst that awakens the senses. The richness of Tasty Medjool Dates evokes the caramelized scent of sun-drenched dates, grounding the fragrance in an opulent warmth.
A delicate floral breeze comes through with Tunisian Orange Flower, inspired by the blossoms found in a Moroccan oasis, adding a touch of lightness and elegance. The comforting sweetness of Vanilla Sugar follows, evoking a sense of indulgence. Venezuelan Tonka Beans bring a balsamic richness to the composition, enhancing its depth and sophistication. At the heart of the fragrance lies Warm Musksensual, enveloping, and unforgettabletying together the luxurious notes and leaving a lasting impression.
Arabians Musk transports you to a summer evening on a winding road through the Atlas Mountains, leading toward the vast Sahara desert. The air is tinged with the familiar, glycerine-like scent of leather care products, evoking memories of horse-riding gear from a nearby stable. At the foot of the Atlas lies a stable owned by a dear friend, where the legendary horse CALAFETE, a stunning figure known worldwide from Montales Arabians Tonka campaign, is cared for. As daylight fades and the mystical blue hour sets in, you stop in front of an endless palm grove. The scattered dates on the ground, nearly caramelized under the days scorching sun, release a deep, intoxicating aroma. Nearby, an oasis emerges, surrounded by orange blossoms, their delicate fragrance filling the twilight air. This journey, much like the fragrance itself, serves as a metaphor: sometimes, the destination is less important than the path taken, where every moment becomes a source of joy and wonder.
The bottle of Arabians Musk is an elegant work of art, offering a striking contrast to the deep-toned bottle of Arabians Tonka. This new release is encased in a soft lacquered brown, reminiscent of the smooth sweetness of ripe dates and the delicate white flowers found in Moroccan oases. This lighter hue reflects a balance between strength and softness, subtly connecting the robustness of horse-riding leather gear to the fragrances delicate sensuality. The bottles soft, glycerine-like finish mirrors the tactile smoothness of leather cared for with fine oils, a nod to the noble equestrian world. This smooth texture, combined with the warm, luminous brown, evokes both the sweetness of dates and the light floral notes of orange blossom, creating an object that is as sensual to the touch as the fragrance is to the senses.
Arabians Musk is not merely a fragrance; it is an invitation to a sensory journey, where each olfactory note is a new step on the path to discovery. Inspired by magical Moroccan nights and the world of noble horses, this fragrance is a captivating blend of musky sensuality and floral, sugary notes, offering a deeply luxurious and evocative experience. The bottle, with its soft lacquered brown hue, perfectly encapsulates the contrast between the rugged nobility of purebred horses and the delicate sweetness of the scent. Arabians Musk celebrates freedom, sensuality, and elegance, reminding us that the beauty of the journey is as much in the moments along the way as in the final destination.. Sentence B: Arabians Musk by Montale is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Arabians Musk was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Honey and Bergamot; middle notes are Dates and Orange Blossom; base notes are Musk, Sugar, Tonka Bean and Vanilla..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: The night was not yet over, and the first rays of sunlight delicately enveloped the colourful stalls. A loud, cozy aroma filled the air, heightening the excitement. These are the moments when simplicity takes on a mystical meaning and everyday life becomes a unique experience. The  market, which looked like a stage with a variety of crops, was the heart of the local community - every Wednesday it pulsated to the rhythm of trade. Every Wednesday morning, local farmers and craftsmen gathered, creating a magical space that came to life. These moments were like journeys deep into the soul, where every scent brought a new discovery.
As a child, I loved these ritual trips to the market with my grandparents. It was not everyday shopping, but an incredible journey where every colour, every energy, every scent, every hue and every selection of the best crops radiated magic. , the golden treasures of the  countryside, rested in jute sacks and wicker baskets. Their earthy skin, still damp from the morning dew, radiated a deep, sensual chord. Every touch of these tubers reminded me of my connection with nature, of the cycle of life that goes on forever. I captured these in the    composition, which transports me back to those special memories, sensual experiences, and the unique magic of simplicity. - Micha Gilbert Lach | Creative Director
TOP NOTES | Leather, Grass, Wheat, Beetroot, Pine
HEART NOTES | Polish Potatoes, Rose, Heliotrope, Clove
BOTTOM NOTES | Patchouli, Birch, Soil, Earthy Notes, Oud, Amber, Vanilla, Honey, Hay, Labdanum, Benzoin. Sentence B: Polish Potatoes by Bohoboco is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Polish Potatoes was launched in 2024. Top notes are Beetroot, Leather, Wheat, Pine and Grass; middle notes are Potato, Clove, Rose and Heliotrope; base notes are Earthy Notes, Soil Tincture, Patchouli, Amber, Oud, Benzoin, Vanilla, Honey, Birch, Hay and Labdanum..

Sentence A: Zelen translates to green in Serbian. This scent is Vetiver, as it was meant to be celebrated.
It is refined, elegant, and classic. Teeming with balanced bittersweet Pink Peppercorn and Italian Bergamot spice, underscored by effervescent Green Cardamom. Delicate yet demanding. Transcendent Mexican Lime and fragrant Beeswax Absolute bound in the warm, musky embrace of Haitian Vetiver, Mysore Sandalwood and Virginia Cedar. Capped with Italian Carrara marble, Zelen is perennial and epicene.
Perfume is often cited as the most intense form of memory. It conjures images and events, a cinematic experience all of your own making.
The Serbian heritage of our founder and perfumer, Boris Zrnic, defines Bokas entire lexicon. Boka is the affectionate childhood nickname used by his family and immediately became the working title of our scent collection.
Boris spent much of his childhood in naturethe other primary pillar of the brand. The worlds natural wonders seep heavily into our scents, as nearly every fragrance note derives from an element found in nature.
We hope these scents spark your sense of nostalgia in nature.
TOP NOTES: Italian Bergamot, Mexican Lime, Japanese Yuzu

Sentence A: Alchemy is an influential philosophical traditional from antiquity  the magic sense of transformation. Based on this philosophy, Kemi is the collection of unique perfumes created from pure natural raw elements through cryptic distillation techniques. Perfume as we know it could not have taken shape without alchemic studies and practices or skilfully converting ordinary inputs into noble substances. Kemi straddles the line between the tangible and the intangible, the earthly and the ethereal, the real and the magical.
Taking its name from the Arabic word for knowledge, Ilm is a tribute to the golden age of chemistry. A simple yet intoxicating blend of aged Indian Assam oud, Laotian oud and Bangladesh oud, Ilm is warm and sweet set alight with flaming balsamic notes. Sentence A: Oud has always been the favorite perfume of the heroes of ancient mythologies due to its scarcity, difficulty in extracting it and its magical scent. That is why the perfumer, Ibrahim Al Zouabi, used to call it the liquid gold.
On a cold Swedish winter night, while the perfumer was sitting by the fireplace and reading an ancient myth, he decided to design a warm fragrance that reduces stress, calms the heartbeat, restores inner peace, and stimulates the hormones of happiness. At the same time, it's inspired by the scent of princes, kings, and nobles of the Middle Ages.
He planned to build an Oud fragrance, but with a unique and different feeling from all the existing Oud perfumes. The blending of jasmine and saffron with Bulgarian roses and amber, in addition to oud, musk, and vanilla, took the fragrance to a sensual, imaginative, exciting, and attractive space, to be the new imaginary woody perfume from the house of Pana Dora.. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Rauque - the French word for hoarse - because like a somnolent voice, I answered with foggy scenes the silences of a daily life that prohibitions let out of breath. January 2021, in my Parisian flat the time was numb, the days uncertain to the point of losing touch with our senses and with the others because they meant danger; in that enclosure I brought spontaneity into play to create a diversion and belie my thoughts. From this introspection  sometimes feverish, sometimes exhilarating, Rauque was born: a series of photographs blending suspended compositions and captured portraits. A?er all, freedom is not asked for, it is searched for and seized like an antidote.

With a glass plate device that dissolves the contours of my subjects, I wanted to engage in a dialogue with absence and presence, indoor and outdoor. The obliteration of the object which, through the viewer's imagination, takes shape, stimulating peripheral awareness. A struggle then begins between the image and its disappearance

The image is a flat envelope, not enough for me to fully translate the essence of my allegories. So, since 2014, I've been incorporating an olfactory dimension into my photographic series. This allows the viewer to access sensory perceptions additional to those of sight. Thus, Rauque  LObjet parfumant - the perfuming object - created in close collaboration with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake, comes to dress, or be dressed by, the photographic series.

Rauque  LObjet parfumant was born from my encounter with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake. We have elaborated the olfactive creation as I was working on my visual creation. Not forbidding ourselves anything, we wanted to be driven by artistic baldness, and if our alphabet was made up of words and images, it sometimes included music and taste as well.  I would like the smell of a body about to implode!  this is how our olfactory exchange started. The waxy basement of a mushroom farm, a doughy Alep soap, a sticky piece of leather left in the back of a stable, the muzzle of a cow, an old box of Japanese incense smelling of ancient and dust, flowers marked by the patina of time or forgotten fruits with carnal accents, we censored nothing to best convey the idea of a feverish body surrounded by sleepy lives. Odd ideas and risky materials abound, but Christophers mastery was the safeguard, nothing was to fear, everything would be enhanced.. Sentence B: Rauque by Roberto Greco is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rauque was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake. Top notes are Violet Leaf and Cassia; middle notes are Narcissus, Myrrh, Accia, Mushroom and Osmanthus; base notes are Leather, Ambrarome and Pine tar..

input:
Sentence A: Jimmy Choo introduces a bold new chapter in its mens fragrance collection with Jimmy Choo Man Extreme, an intensified reinterpretation of the original Jimmy Choo Man, first launched in 2014. Rooted in the brands signature aromatic-woody DNA, this dynamic scent takes sophistication to the next level.
Designed for the modern adventurer, Jimmy Choo Man Extreme embodies strength, confidence, and an unrelenting thirst for new experiences. This powerful fougre composition is crafted for men who take control of their destiny, embrace challenges, and seek excitement in the great outdoors.
At its core, the fragrance ignites with fiery red thyme and black pepper, creating an exhilarating opening. The heart unfolds into an aromatic blend of fresh geranium and clary sage, adding depth and refinement. Finally, the base lingers with the warmth of amber woods, the creamy richness of tonka bean, and the earthy intensity of vetiver, resulting in a seductive, long-lasting masculine signature.
Jimmy Choo Man Extreme is a fragrance that captures intensity and passion, inspired by the rich, dynamic shades of red.
"When creating this fragrance, I imagined different shades of red and thought about how to represent them in the fragrance. One ingredient immediately came to mind: red thyme oil, with its burning freshness, which brings incredible intensity to the fragrance."  Anne Flipo, Master Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
With a modernized take on the classic fougre structure, the composition balances fiery and sensual elements for a bold and unforgettable scent.
"Our intention was also to modernize the classic fougre composition, using the sensual warmth of tonka bean and amber woods to create a real signature."  Tanguy Guesnet, Perfumer, Jimmy Choo
The fragrance is housed in a striking bottle that reflects its powerful essence. Retaining the original square silhouette of Jimmy Choo Man, the flacon is now enveloped in a vibrant scarlet lacquer, symbolizing its bold intensity. The silver-embossed name, along with a red leather-effect cap, adds the finishing touch to this daring and dynamic design.
Available as 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum.. Sentence B: Jimmy Choo Man Extreme by Jimmy Choo is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Jimmy Choo Man Extreme was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: "The evocation of sweetness, an invitation to the tenderness of childhood, the age when the senses awaken, where a child's laughter enchants and dreams reign. In 1970, a fragrance line called Baby Dior was born: today, it is reborn with a collection full of softness, inspired by the "Bonne toile" (Lucky Star).

Bonne toile is the scented water for babies and children from Baby Dior, a poetic co-creation born of the encounter between Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, who composed the fragrance, and Cordlia de Castellane, Artistic Director of Baby Dior, who imagined the dreamy decor of the bottles.

This scented water is formulated without alcohol and with 98%* natural-origin ingredients. It is a childhood memory that comes to life in soft notes of pear, wild rose, and white musks.

The pastel-coloured bottle of Bonne toile is adorned with an imaginary and fantastical garden of Granville, featuring a menagerie and colorful hot air balloons, a Toile de Jouy pattern specially created for the occasion.

More than a scented water, it is an object imbued with reverie that can be personalised with the colored ribbon of your choice to accompany your child like their lucky star."
Pear Note: A juicy, dewy, and green note.
Wild Rose Note: A soft floral note.
White Musk Note: A cottony, velvety note.
"For Baby Dior, I wanted to create a scented water for little ones that is as simple as they are. A child says 'yes,' says 'no,' 'I like' or 'I don't like.' A formula imposed itself, like an impulse, a smile. I wanted to bypass the inevitable orange blossom, which has long been the signature scent of childhood, and find a soothing fragrance in a different formula: a dewy and green pear note, brightened by wild rose, wrapped in soft, cottony, protective musks.

Francis Kurkdjian, Perfume Creative Director, Parfums Dior
Available in two shades (pink and green) as 100 ml Eau de Senteur.. Sentence B: Bonne toile Baby Dior by Dior is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bonne toile Baby Dior was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Francis Kurkdjian. Top note is Green Pear; middle note is Wild Rose; base note is White Musk..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Founded by Sheikha Hind Bahwan, OJAR is a masterful tribute to the ancient artistry and rituals of MiddleEastern perfume craftsmanship. It weaves a passionate and inspiring tapestry, a sensorial experience, that transcends time and borders, achieved through a fusion of fragrances from both the East and West.
This niche perfume Maison takes its name from "HOJARI" signifying the purest essence of Frankincense found exclusively in the Sultanate of Oman. Frankincense, steeped in profound history, serves as a revered cornerstone of OJAR's fragrant collection. This sacred resin is renowned not only for its captivating perfumed scent, but also for the powerful and elevating impact it bestows upon the body, mind, and spirit when burned. Introducing ENCENS CUIVRE, the latest gem in OJAR's captivating Frankincense collection a fragrance that melds the enchantment of Arabian tales with modernity, culminating in an oneiric masterpiece. Inspired by age-old legend, Encens Cuivre embarks on an olfactory journey, crafting a narrative from three treasures from the depths of the Earth, captivating all who dare to explore the mystical realms of the East: Frankincense, Myrrh, and Gold. These rare gifts encapsulate ancient stories of spirituality and opulence, across centuries. Imagine the fusion of these precious natural resins: Frankincense, a sacred offering from Oman's landscapes; Myrrh, a mystical gem from the heart of Africa; and Elemi, a secret treasure from the depths of Asia. This harmonious symphony of notes unfolds on your skin like a majestic coronation. Combined with the finest natural Vanilla essence, also referred to as 'the Gold of the perfumers', and a base of Musk, this fragrance transforms into an elixir of unparalleled luxury, enveloping you in a warm, comforting embrace that evokes an everlasting allure. Encens Cuivre is an exquisite unisex Vanilla fragrance, magnetized by smoky Incense notes and caressed by the velvety touch of Musk. Born in Asia, where considered a sacred fruit to be offered to Gods, Grapefruit, as most citrus fruits, first appeared in Spain, in Seville, around the XII-XIII century during the Arab domination.
Probably, one of the greatest citruses, I particularly appreciate Grapefruit for its bitter flavour.
Unlike sweet scents which I find to be obvious and uninspiring, bitter represents, in my opinion, one of the brightest scents. This may be the result of my Italian background, where several beverages celebrate bitterness.
To make Pompelmo a unique and different fragrance, I have worked on both the lively and sour freshness of Grapefruit, while stressing its bitter scent. Jean-Claude Ellena. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: We are in the Valley of the Moon, a ghostly, mystical and unusual landscape in northern Chile.
The warmth of the red earth blends with the alcoholic reminiscence of the Pisco sour (a typical South American cocktail) and the bitter notes of coca leaves (a plant that is legally and habitually used by the native populations to
make up for the lack of energy due to the high altitude of the Andean plateau).
Numerous paranormal phenomena of the most disparate nature occur here. WEON, an ancient word coming from the Indian language, and widely used throughout Chile: its primary meaning is that of "friendship". A bit like saying
"comp" in southern Italy.

Weon is a hymn to the spiritual mysteries of a memorable place that can generate very strong internal shocks.
The subsoil of the Atacama desert is rich in lithium, a mineral used in drugs that stabilize mood. In the sky of this red desert, it is common to observe lights and strange shapes moving quickly in space. A specific area of this desert has been used to listen to the "sounds of the universe" through numerous receptive phono dishes, the purpose of which is to go in search of the primordial sound of the bigbang, or perhaps, who knows what other unknown mysteries.. Sentence B: Weon by Spiritica is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Weon was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniele Muratori Caputo. Top notes are Pisco Sour cocktal and Coca; middle notes are Ice cream, Mint, Milk, Vanilla and Copahu Balm; base notes are Ozonic notes, Sea Salt, Metallic notes and Earthy Notes..

Sentence A: Occident' 90 is inspired by the early 1990s, when most Romanians dreamed of leaving the Country for a better life in the West. Many of them left everything behind in order to try to send to their families all that they had laboriously collected in those foreign lands, but many feel homesick and homesick for their native places. The design of this perfume, as of the entire Mirrors of time collection, is based on my childhood in my grandparents' house in the country, where on the walls hung some old mirrors made by my great-grandfather Tica Vanu, which I reinterpreted. Each mirror is like a time machine, looking in it you will go back in time and it makes you think, how many other generations before you have looked in it, which you only got to know from stories.
Nose: Jimmy Bodin
Artistic vision, story & craft: Adi ale Van.
Concentration  extrait de parfum 27%
Each piece is hand made and unique in Romania, like all Adi ale Van products.

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Lorenzo Pazzaglia x House of Merlo: Incenso Notturno perfume is an olfactory sacred, the most sublime fragrance in the artist's achievements to date, filled with an electrifying aura of mystery. Anyone who got to know House of Merlo a little better quickly noticed our fascination with mysticism and everything mysterious. It will therefore come as no surprise that the result of this unique Polish-Italian cooperation is an incredibly enigmatic scent, thoroughly incense-like, completely enveloped in wisps of thick smoke.
From the House of Merlo diary: The dreamlike opening looms like a dreamy priest just after dusk, looking at the smoking elemi resin in which fragments of refreshing bergamot and lemon peel have congealed. The first aromas announcing the beginning of the ancient ritual quickly gain intensity when freshly ground pepper enters the censer, first a slightly more subtle, white variety, and then giving space to a much more wild and untamed black variety. The all-encompassing darkness encourages you to look towards the infinite universe, from the depths of which the ancient starlight illuminates the gray ribbons rising towards them, emerging from the glowing noble agarwood resin covered with damask rose petals, intricately combined with patchouli, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Just before dawn, when the night becomes darkest and everything around is pitch black, powerful, dark Frankish incense supports the ceremonial vigil. Arranged on cedar and sandalwood, wrapped in vanilla, sensual amber, and seductive musk, it recalls ancient times when man discovered fire and simultaneously experienced the extraordinary phenomenon of escaping smoke. Since the dawn of time, we have associated it with divinity, spirituality, and energy, and by observing it we believe that man is part of something bigger, not only the universe perceived through the senses. We are no longer surprised that in most parts of the world, the rite of incensation has become part of the most important ceremonies and rituals. The synergy of these completely spectacular essences brings scent-provoking metaphysical experiences, for all initiated hearts who have always "see more", but also for open minds who dare to break conventions and constantly look for answers hidden in the universe.
Top note
white pepper, elemi resin, lemon peel, bergamot
Heart note
black pepper, patchouli, oud (agarwood), cinnamon, nutmeg, damask rose
Base note
incense, cedar tree, sandal tree, vanilla, ambergris, musk

Sentence A: Guccis The Alchemists Garden is a Luxury Collection of sophisticated Eau de Parfums, Perfumed Oils, and Acque Profumate inspired by the art of alchemy. Captivated by the star-studded sky, the Gucci alchemist dreams of a new olfactory Gucci fragrance honouring the brightest star from the Lion constellation - Gucci The Heart of Leo. Guided by his brightness, the lion leaps from the sky in search of the worlds most precious ingredients. Knowing that resinous incense brings opulence to those who possess it, the lion jumps to the Arabic peninsula where Olibanum grows. Here, the noble creature encounters the tears of weeping trees, the bark exuding an unexpected, spicy scent that warms his heart. A symphony of balsamic resin traverses continents through golden winds, beckoning the lion to return to his homeland, Africa. As he follows the scent to yet another tree, he encounters the balsamic nectar of myrrh and its liquorice smoky undertones that liberate his soul. To sweeten his journey back to the moon, the lion garlands his mane in a blood-red blackcurrant accord. With the promise of dawn nearing, harmony returns as the lion resumes his position in the sky. Happy with the lions fabled journey, the Gucci alchemist carefully encases the fruity, ambery elixir and its night-sky-inspired story  in a black lacquered bottle. Much like the alchemist's ability to transform all that he touches into newfound wonders, this unisex Gucci fragrance is manufactured using alcohol made from 100% recycled carbon emissions.
Capturing the spirit of nature and distilling it into exquisite elixirs, The Alchemists Garden collection is composed of customisable Gucci fragrances intended to be layered together.

The beauty of alchemy lies in the transformation: layered aromas that become new expressions of art and unfold the magic of unseen worlds.

Sentence A: Maison Guerlain presents an exclusive, limited-edition Christmas rendezvous: Imagine Guerlain, in collaboration with Shourouk Rhaiem, the renowned French jewelry designer. To celebrate the festive season with sparkle and magic, Shourouk Rhaiem unveils her dazzling, multi-colored world. For the 2024 vintage, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a radiant jewela wearable cuff bracelet that can be worn on the wrist. This exceptional piece encases the Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum, an amber-colored nectar with floral and woody notes, perfect for adding a festive touch to the holiday season. This exclusive fragrance is available only on Guerlain.com and in select Guerlain boutiques.
The Imagine Guerlain Eau de Parfum is an extraordinary creation designed to capture the magic of Christmas with grandeur. Luxurious and timeless, it opens with majestic floral notes, highlighted by a hint of zesty orange. As the fragrance develops, it reveals rich, vibrant woody notes, culminating in an intense, magical scent with a warm and sensual composition.
For 170 years, the Flacon aux Abeilles has been a symbol of craftsmanship and artistry. Produced by the glassmaker Pochet du Courval, the bottle is decorated with intricate festoons and golden bees, meticulously enhanced with fine gold detailing. The signature cord, tied by hand by the skilled Dames de Table at the Guerlain Workshops, adds a final touch of elegance. This year, the shimmering jewel envisioned by Shourouk Rhaiem elevates the bottle's design, allowing wearers to take a piece of this exceptional creation with them.
For the first time ever, the iconic Flacon aux Abeilles is adorned with a striking creation that doubles as a wearable accessory. The large cuff, encrusted with sparkling rhinestones, features an imaginary flower at its center, with Guerlain's double G emblem blooming from its heart. The petals of this enchanting flower shimmer in bluish hues, making the jewel an embodiment of festive magic and sparkle.
Shourouk Rhaiem, a jewelry designer who began crafting her first crystal-covered pieces in her Parisian studio over fifteen years ago, draws inspiration from her Tunisian roots, the pop culture of the 1980s, and the glamour of Hollywood films. Her playful and poetic approach to design transforms ordinary objects into extraordinary creations, embellished with a myriad of crystals in various sizes and colors.
This exclusive, limited-edition release consists of 3,310 numbered pieces. Each 125 mL bottle comes with a 30 mL spray and a funnel, allowing you to carry this exceptional fragrance with you wherever you go.. Sentence B: Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem by Guerlain is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Imagine Guerlain by Shourouk Rhaiem was launched in 2024. Kamikura is a tribute to spiritual and physical purification, Nordic tradition, and masculine beauty rituals. In Japanese culture, "Kamikura" is a sacred place and a home for gods and spiritual beings. At these sacred sites, purification rituals are held, dances and songs are performed, and offerings are made to Kami, the human's higher state after death. The perfume was created with the intention of bringing hope of happiness, success, and peace, and by spraying the perfume, the place you find yourself in transforms into a sacred Kamikura. Therefore, it is a fragrance that is meditative, spiritual, and calming with a natural minimalism.
Kamikura opens with fresh, crisp citrus notes and balsamic Ezo-pine and Todo-pine (Abies sachalinensis). The heart features hints of aromatic camphor and lavender, along with soapy oakmoss, while the base consists of woody, earthy accords. It is a scent that initially reveals the typical Japanese roots of Di Ser but then evolves into a classic woody perfume with a European touch, as a nod to Swedish nature and the culture of purity.. input:
Sentence A: Hexensalbe is a dark floral fragrance, rooted in the botanical underworld of witchcraft.
Hexensalbe, also known as witches flying ointment, was a hallucinogenic salve used in witchcraft in the middle ages. It was a mixture of extremely poisonous ingredients that produced an ecstatic trance with powerful sensations of flying, images of otherworldly creatures and a primal sexual hunger.
The ointment was so poisonous that eating it would be directly fatal, instead it was applied to other soft membranes of the body, armpits and more commonly the genitals. Because of the erotic effects of the high, the salve would often be rubbed directly onto a phallic object like the end of a staff or a broomstick. And so the popular image of witches riding on broomsticks has survived into our times, even if they rode them in a rather different sense. There are records from the 1200s and forward where women have been found naked in a delirious trance, pleasuring themselves with the spicy devils dildo.. Sentence B: Hexensalbe by Stora Skuggan is a Aromatic Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Hexensalbe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Anna Barkne. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Discover absolute freedom with BLACK THRILL, one of three new fragrances from AMG Parfums. BLACK THRILL is the meeting of leather, addictive tonka, the aromatic thrill of clary sage and the sparkling ardor of ripe mandarin, an intoxicating amber woody composition, an ode to the feeling of pure freedom. With its inaugural trilogy, AMG Parfums arouses the thrill of desire and announces the advent of a new icon.
The line that gives you the ultimate thrill. Back to 1967, the year the legend was born. Two daring young men  Hans Werner Aufrecht and Erhard Melcher  unite their talents and will revolutionize motor racing. Famous for its one man, one engine concept, the audacious duo with a wild spirit will imagine cult creations that are still at the forefront of the industry today. This philosophy of raw excellence and intense sensations has brought AMG fragrances to life. Carefully selected ingredients. Original and daring compositions. Born from the belief that nothing is impossible, AMG Parfums unites high performance and pure emotion to infuse the spirit of racing into the heart of the Mercedes-Benz universe. Taking its name from the intense sensations provided by the power of AMG, THRILL enters the arena with three signature creations. SILVER THRILL, BLACK THRILL AND RED THRILL.
Composed by master perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin, each version of THRILL calls upon a key element of the AMG universe  technology for SILVER, luxury for BLACK, and passion for RED  while accelerating a specific masculine mood and moment. Born in Grasse, the cradle of high perfumery, the creator-perfumer of the collection demonstrates all his talent for the composition of perfumes and the supply of raw materials. This is one of the many reasons why the THRILL collection brings together the finest ingredients sourced with rare precision, for which "sustainability" is the watchword.
A single chassis, a heart that looks like an engine. Like an instantly recognizable homage to AMG, each bottle features a beating heart protected by a fascinating metallic shell. The raw character and apparent mechanism reflect the legendary audacity of AMG engines and the feeling of bravery that each THRILL fragrance evokes in you. Made of recycled glass and aluminum, AMG's eco-responsible commitment is at its peak.. Sentence B: AMG Black Thrill by Mercedes-Benz is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. AMG Black Thrill was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Fabrice Pellegrin. Top note is Mandarin Orange; middle note is Clary Sage; base notes are Tonka Bean, Leather, Amber and Woody Notes..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: This creation originates from the memory of a trip to the heart of the French Riviera, between the shimmering blue of the Mediterranean and the hills dotted with olive trees, in Saint-Tropez.
Paolo and Tiziana visited this town with its timeless lifestyle of gentleness and freedom and were inspired by the joyful and vibrant character of this seaside resort.
Saint-Tropez was a fascinating journey through the golden age of life on the Riviera in the 1960s.
In those years, the Italian and French Rivieras were the protagonists of an extraordinary cultural transformation: the life of the all-Italian playboys, known as Les Italiens, who were taking over the Riviera in the 1960s to the cry of Bare feet, jeans, hair in the wind and go!
This iconic image perfectly captures the defiant attitude and desire for freedom of the time.
These young people took over the Riviera with a daring spirit and a liberating attitude, embracing a lifestyle of relaxation and fun, while a blazing fire of passion burned within them, driving them to live every moment to its fullest.
When the film And God Created Woman hit the big screen, it captured the hearts of audiences around the world thanks to the unforgettable young Brigitte Bardot.
Torp is a tribute to the timeless glamour of that period, when Saint Tropez became a popular destination for the international jet set. Torp, on the other hand, was the name used by the resorts trendiest rebels in the 1960s. This creation is a fresh, vibrant fragrance whose marine notes remind us of unforgettable summer evenings full of laughter with not a care in the world. Each note is dedicated to the sea and its magic, a journey of the senses to one of the most fascinating places in the world. Anyone wearing it can close their eyes and find themselves transported to the cobbled streets of Saint Tropez, amidst the laughter of children at play, the scent of the salty air and the warmth of the sun on their skin.
The fragrance opens with a fresh, citrusy bouquet, thanks to Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sorrento Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin, and combines with Marine notes, which add depth to the perfume.
The heart of the fragrance, the true essence of this creation, opens with the muted scents of Bulgarian Rose, Cte dAzur Lavender, French Iris and Provenal Violet, intertwined with the delicate elegance of Saint Tropez Peony, the sweetness of Sicilian Orange and juicy Romagna Peach.
The entire creation is built on a solid foundation of fine woods such as African Ebony and Australian Sandalwood combined with Musk, Orientalgris, Indian Patchouli and Tuscan Oakmoss, creating a beguiling and sensual base that envelops the wearer like a lasting embrace.
Torp captures the vibrant, lush essence of the Mediterranean coastline.
Its accords are reminiscent of when the turquoise sea meets the sun-kissed olive groves, creating an unforgettable olfactory experience.
TOP NOTES: Reggio Calabrian Bergamot, Sicilian Mandarin, Sorrento Lemon, Marine Notes
MIDDLE NOTES: Bulgarian Rose, Cte d'Azur Lavender, French Iris, Provenal Violet, Saint Tropez Peony, Sicilian Orange Blossom, Romagna Peach
BASE NOTES: Orientalgris, Musk, African Ebony, Australian Sandalwood, Indian Patchouli, Tuscan Oakmoss. Sentence B: Torpe by Tiziana Terenzi is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Torpe was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Marine notes, Calabrian bergamot, Lemon and Sicilian Mandarin; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Peach, Sicilian Orange, Lavender, Peony, Violet and Iris; base notes are Ebony, Ambergris, Musk, Australian Sandalwood, Oakmoss and Indian Patchouli..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: We combined four types of jasmine oils, each offering a distinct olfactory journey, and blended it with a base of incense oils. This is BLOOM; a feminine sweetness accompanied by a masculine wildness.
White jasmine, with its sweet and floral notes. Unlike others in the family, it has a slight animalic edge that gives a musk experience.
Arabian jasmine used in alternative medicine for its healing and soothing properties, gives a fruitier, almost vanilla experience. Considered the most fragrant jasmine.
Egyptian jasmine lends a timeless elegance to the blend, with its sophisticated floral bouquet and subtle hints of earthiness, evoking visions of ancient gardens steeped in history and tradition.
Star jasmine stands out from the other types. While it shares the classic jasmine features of a five-point flower, it belongs to the "dogbane" family; unlike white, Arabian, and Egyptian jasmine, which are part of the olive family. Star jasmine has a distinct appearance resembling a "pinwheel" and takes center stage on the front of the BLOOM box. Unlike other jasmines, it has a sweeter scent and lacks the typical indolic or animalic notes.
Together, these four jasmine oils create a harmonious fusion of scents, inviting the wearer on a captivating olfactory voyage through the lush gardens of the imagination.
"Zaharoff Signature BLOOM, a jasmine incense, opening with the heady embrace of jasmine, its intoxicating aroma filling the air like a floral symphony. Each spray carries with it the essence of a thousand whispered secrets, a thousand forgotten dreams, as if the very soul of the collective world itself were captured within its petals.
As the scent unfolds, it reveals a heart of sacred resins - myrrh and frankincense mingling with the warm embrace of oud, their smoky tendrils weaving a tapestry of ancient wisdom and divine mystery. It is as if the fragrance itself is a portal to another world, a gateway to the realms of the gods.
For within its depths lies the promise of renewal, of new beginnings and endless possibilities. For in the heart of BLOOM, where jasmine and resin intertwine, lies the key to unlocking the mysteries of the universe - a fragrance so powerful, so intoxicating, that it has the power to change the course of destiny itself.". Sentence B: Signature BLOOM by Zaharoff is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Signature BLOOM was launched in 2024. Top notes are Gardenia, Star Jasmine and Coconut; middle notes are Egyptian Jasmine, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Red Peony and Amber; base notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Myrrh, Oud, Olibanum, Sandalwood, Sugar Cane and Bourbon Vanilla..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Mane, hooves, neighing, galloping, jumping Kicking. Kick the animal's ass for a punchy scent. It is all the passion of the horse that distills this exceptional perfume built around an excess of natural oud wood.
A souvenir scent, that of returning to the stables after a weekend of show jumping competitions. A discipline that Marc-Antoine Corticchiato has practiced for a long time, and which he evokes here  the adrenaline of competition, the joy of returning to the stable
A perfume-universe, that of the equestrian world, when the horses have been taken down from the truck and return to their box. We then take the canteens from the van, these large trunks from which a mixture of strong animal odors emerge: leather from the harness and gaiters, saliva from the bits, sweat from the saddle cloths, tar with which we coat the hooves, remains of straw and hay on the blankets...
To capture the scent of opening the trunks, Marc-Antoine chose the most difficult material in perfumery: the essence of oud wood. Distilled since the year 1000, its fragrant resin results from an attack on the Aquilaria wood, after a very slow process evolving over several decades. This sumptuous liquid gold, used here in overdose, then displays all its panache.
Wild floral, narcissus exalts the insolent character of Ruade with its mane note and its straw effects. The absolute of cut hay lends its power to the evocation of hay fetuses whose scent saturates the air and panics the horses.
An intrepid perfume with precious materials in overdose, saturated with animality and rebellious like a kick.. Sentence B: Ruade by Parfum d'Empire is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Ruade was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Marc-Antoine Corticchiato..

input:
Sentence A: "This first appeared at a perfume making workshop here in our Acton studio. Sarah was demonstrating the way that Hedione helps materials smell as if you've just walked outside into a garden and are standing right next to the real thing.
In honour of both Peter Rabbit and his arch nemisis, Mr McGregor, and in further honour of the master of translucence in perfumery, Jean Claude Ellena, creator of the Hermes Jardin series of fragrances, we set about making the scent of a cottage garden in the Lake District, complete with shed.
For batch two, if we make it at all, we'll have to tweak the formula because we did get a bit carried away with the materials: orris, tobacco (Mr McGregor has a pipe), blackcurrant bud, jasmine, parsnip, hay, lavender, cedar moss, vetivert and patchouli for a nice muddy base, cucumber and mushroom.
Equally evocative but not that expensive, notes of cut grass, leather, strawberries, lily of the valley, blackberries, celery and musk, because we think that musk smells like freshly washed bunnies.
We know that these don't all grow at the same time, but we're quite imaginative." -Brand website.. Sentence B: Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor by 4160 Tuesdays is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Le Jardin de Monsieur McGregor was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Sarah McCartney. Top notes are Strawberry, Grass and Mint; middle notes are Hay, Rose and Lavender; base notes are Tobacco, Moss and Mushroom..

Sentence A: "First, youll probably feel a slight acidity, but then sweetness will follow Werent those white candies pineapple-flavored? But wait! Theres a hint of tobacco, did grandpa carry them in his pocket along with his pipe? You close your eyes, trying to reassure yourself about their taste, and suddenly the time machine starts.

Time Machine is an exception in the entire Le Frag collection. This time, Im not taking you on a journey through my memories or childhood fascinations, but I invite you on your own journey through time.

Take a sniff and let the Time Machines gears run

Perhaps it will remind you of the workshop where Dad repaired the cabinet, the one Mom constantly nagged him about. Or an old wooden trunk with brass fittings, which hid everything your imagination suggested. A small-town pharmacy, where your pharmacist aunt hid secret potions in hundreds of wooden drawers. Or maybe your beloved grandfather, who was a craftsman and spent every spare moment in his workshop. So often, that he soaked up the scent of the tools, and the space soaked up his cologne, which you will forever associate with love and a sense of security."
Notes: lime, lavender, pineapple, cardamom, oud Vietnam, rum, immortelle, hamamelis, amber, tobacco, musk, ambrette seeds and gear train.. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Iconic footballer Cristiano Ronaldo launches his newest fragrance, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless, the second from the 7 Collection.
Cristiano invites us to take a deep dive into his mind, his Mental Field, a universe of ambition and discipline at the root of a fearless and determined man.
Mental Field, the short film takes place on a planet resembling a floating pitch. We see Ronaldo frenetically chasing a ball of fire. Never giving up, he jumps, dodges and slides between the celestial elements. Reaching for the ball of fire, it transforms into the new Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless: the encapsulation of the aim for perfection.
Fearless is more than just a fragranceit's an attitude. With my new fragrance, I want to inspire my fans to keep chasing their dreams and to remember that every accomplishment starts in the mind says Cristiano.
At the heart of Fearless lies the hero ingredient, Longozaa remarkable plant cultivated in Madagascar. Just like Ronaldo who comes back stronger after defeats and challenges, Longoza possesses the extraordinary ability to regenerate itself, making it an everlasting plant.
The top notes of violet leaf, Longoza, apple, and bay leaf intertwine to create an invigorating opening, while the heart notes of geranium and violet add depth and complexity. The final notes of tonka, vanilla, cashmeran, cistus labdanum, and Ambrostar leave an intense and sensual impression, enveloping you in a woody spicy embrace.
Housed in a sleek orange bottle, Cristiano Ronaldo Fearless was developed in collaboration with Eden Parfums.. Sentence B: CR7 Fearless by Cristiano Ronaldo is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. CR7 Fearless was launched in 2023. Top notes are Red Apple, Longoza, Bay Leaf, Grapefruit and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Nutmeg, Geranium and Violet; base notes are Amrostar, Cashmeran, Labdanum, Vanilla and Tonka..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: When Spanish sailors first explored Cuba in 1492, they returned with accounts of tall forests, chattering birds and men and women going from place to place with a firebrand of weeds in their hands to take in the fragrant smoke. Before long, Spanish colonists were growing and smoking tobacco too. As the demand for tobacco spread, the weeds became profitable. Cuba opened its first cigar factories in the early 1800s. Cuban Tobacco is an oriental, fruity scent. It embodies the smell of a tobacco aroma at its best. Starts with Mandarin Orange, Vanilla, and Mojito. Jasmine and Plum Wine unite with Tobacco and woody notes to create an olfactive journey through the history of Cuba. Salt is a note that you can notice throughout the whole experiment.
Funny Fact, Honey was used with cigars as a natural filter, adding a sweet flavor to the tobacco.
MANDARIN ORANGE  VANILLA  MOJITO
JASMINE  PLUM WINE  SMOKE  TOBACCO
TOBACCO BLOSSOM  WOODY NOTES  SALT. Sentence B: Cuban Tobacco by Alghabra Parfums is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Cuban Tobacco was launched in 2023. Top notes are Vanilla, Mojito and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Tobacco, Smoke, Plum Wine and Jasmine; base notes are Woody Notes, Tobacco Blossom and Salt..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.

Middle notes are Madagascar Vanilla, Syrian Royal Jasmine, Orchid, and Turkish Rose

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Turath belongs to the Oriental Orientaly fragrance family, offering a captivating olfactory experience that combines rich and luxurious notes.
The fragrance opens with a burst of sophistication, as the spicy warmth of black pepper intertwines with the luscious sweetness of red fruit. Saffron adds a touch of exoticism, creating an initial impression that is both inviting and intriguing. The heart notes reveal a rich and indulgent blend. Decadent chocolate weaves its way through the composition, intertwining with the resinous and spiritual aura of incense. The velvety softness of rose petals adds a floral elegance, balancing the intensity with a delicate touch. The fragrance concludes with Orientalgris, with its deep and golden warmth, forming the foundation of the fragrance, leaving an indelible impression of luxury. Moss adds an earthy complexity, while musk contributes a sensual and lingering trail, enveloping you in an aura of timeless sophistication.
Turath, with its Oriental Orientaly character, is a timeless and evocative fragrance that captures the essence of tradition and luxury. It is a symphony of notes that come together to create a sensorial experience that is both opulent and inviting.. Sentence B: Turath by MAISON ASRAR is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Turath was launched in 2023. Top notes are Saffron, Black Pepper and Red Fruits; middle notes are Chocolate, Rose and Incense; base notes are Ambergris, Musk and Moss..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input: Sentence A: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a fragrance that captures the essence of a specific place or sentiment, expertly crafted by renowned French brand Stphane Humbert Lucas. Released in 2022, this fragrance is an amber vanilla composition that is both boozy and citrusy, with sweet undertones and a richly exotic aroma. The opening notes feature a generous spice from the whiskey accord, while the cacao adds a gentle sweetness alongside the tonka beans. Earthy tones of cedar and patchouli complete the base, providing a natural finish that leaves a lasting impression. Dancing Sand is available in an Extrait de Parfum concentration, ensuring a long-lasting and intense scent experience. The notes of Dancing Sand include whiskey, mandarin orange, coriander, cashmeran, cacao, sandalwood, tonka beans, cedar wood, benzoin, and patchouli. This fragrance offers a complex and multi-dimensional scent profile that combines the warmth of whiskey with the freshness of mandarin orange and the spice of coriander. The cacao adds a touch of sweetness, while the sandalwood and cedar wood contribute to the woody aspect of the fragrance. With its unique blend of notes, Dancing Sand falls under the olfactory group of Oriental Vanilla, offering a harmonious balance between warm amber accords and creamy vanilla undertones.. Sentence B: Dancing Sand by The Dua Brand is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. Dancing Sand was launched in 2023..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is an enchanting amber-sweet gourmand fragrance that exudes playful sophistication. The scent opens with a warm blend of cinnamon, sugar, and rum, creating an inviting sweetness that instantly captivates. The heart reveals a rich and indulgent mix of cacao, coffee, caramel, and oakmoss, adding depth and complexity. Finally, the base notes of tonka bean, cashmere, labdanum, and vanilla linger on the skin, offering a luxurious, lasting finish. Whether worn alone or layered, Lattafa Pride Artisan Ethnique is a must-have for anyone who appreciates the perfect balance of sweetness and elegance in their fragrance collection.
Top Notes: Cinnamon, Sugar, Rum.

Middle Notes: Cacao, Coffee, Caramel, Oakmoss.

Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Cashmere, Labdanum, Vanilla.. Sentence B: Artisan Ethnique by Lattafa Perfumes is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Artisan Ethnique was launched in 2024. Top notes are Rum, Cinnamon and Sugar; middle notes are Caramel, Cacao, Coffee and Oakmoss; base notes are Vanilla, Cashmere Wood, Tonka Bean and Labdanum..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: Sauvage Eau Forte by Dior is a fresh and spicy fougre fragrance. This innovative scent features an alcohol-free formula, blending cold spices, bleached lavender, and musky woods. The fragrance is inspired by the symbolic power of water, creating a highly concentrated and milky-colored eau.
"The emblematic freshness of Sauvage intensified and extended by the power of water. A striking blend of cold spices and blanched lavender, deepened by the strength of musky woods in an exclusive water-based formula."
Available in bottles of 60 and 100 ml.. Sentence B: Sauvage Eau Forte by Dior is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. Sauvage Eau Forte was launched in 2024. instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: "The women and men in these pages are lovers and brawlers, bullfighters and boxers, soft talkers and hard drinkers. They inhabit dusty Spanish villages and dank, dark brothels. At the heart of these unforgettable characters is a determined and undying passion that pushes them to make extraordinary decisions in the face of fear. Their fates are varied but the outcome is always the same, these are stories that grip you by the throat and dont let go until you profess your devotion. Seductive and steadfast, this classic is not for the faint of heart but for the full of heart."
NOTES: Geranium, Spanish Rose, Patchouli, Black Musk, Tobacco, Sandalwood, Bulls Blood.
"No other fragrance in our line balances brutality and elegance like this beast. Ignore the glares, take the bull by horns, and show the world whos boss. "
Available in 50ml Eau de Parfum.. Sentence B: Bull's Blood 2nd Edition by Imaginary Authors is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Bull's Blood 2nd Edition was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Josh Meyer..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: A distinguished rose combining power and gentleness.
Rose Amira is a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
The Allegoria fragrance collection celebrates the wonders of the world. Each creation pays tribute to natures beauty and sweeps us up in a discovery of exceptional raw ingredients and notes, beautifully enhanced by our perfumer-explorers. Discover Rose Amira, a nocturnal tribute to the queen of flowers, an essential scent and perfumery icon. In this journey to the heart of a Persian garden, rose reveals its most sensual fragrance. Shot through with the sacred swirls of frankincense and the warmth of patchouli, the majestic flower unfolds with a blend of strength and softness in a halo of musks.
"Rose Amira is my vision of rose, sumptuous and sensual within the secrecy of the night. A rose stood upright, turned towards the moon, within a poetic, nocturnal fragrance. - Delphine Jelk, Guerlain Perfumer   Absolus Allegoria, the absolute fragrance collection, is an enchanting and mysterious journey to the heart of the worlds wonders once night falls fragrance trails celebrating deep and powerful nature, revealed by striking contrasts by moonlight.
A powerful symbol of Guerlain's commitment to the planet, Absolus Allegoria fragrances contain up to 90% natural origin. The French beetroot alcohol used in their formulas comes from a network committed to responsible farming.  Rose Amira comes in the Allegoria collections emblematic bottle made in France using 15% recycled glass. Featuring a removable spray pump and transparent lacquer finish, its design can be easily recycled. 90% to 94% of ingredients are of natural origin, by ISO 16128, the calculation includes water.. Sentence B: Rose Amira by Guerlain is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Rose Amira was launched in 2024. The nose behind this fragrance is Delphine Jelk..

instruction: Determine the relationship between the following given sentence A and B.
input:
Sentence A: The olfactory identity of BORDERLINE NEROLI takes inspiration by the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self.
THE FIGHT BETWEEN TWO OPPOSITE WHITE FLOWERS: the clean kindness of NATURAL NEROLI against the violence of NATURAL TUBEROSE essential oils.
The first is supported by a COMFORTABLE SOAPY CLEAN SMELL of NATURAL BERGAMOT CALABRIA OIL, while the second is sharpened by a GREEN FRUITY note of FIG.

We have taken inspiration from an aspect of the Borderline Personality Disorder which is the struggle for balancing the self-image and sense of self..
